11211122221111.content:
***Authors Note: I'm going to refer to people as the body they are inhabiting. So, now that Sally has swapped bodies with Geminia, she is now called Geminia unless they swap back or with someone else***

Geminia looked aroud frantically. She suddenly saw that the necklace was still around her neck, so that was a relief. She also saw that she had swapped bodies with Geminia. This WASNT a relief. Suddenly, the door to Sally's Locker room opened up, and in stepped Sally.

As it turns out, the necklace wasn't exactly sure on how the body swap thing should have worked, so it went with what it thought was kinda right. Sally was swapped with Geminia, and she retained all her personality traits and memories. Geminina who swapped with Sally however, DIDNT keep her personality traits and memories. It was kinda like there was two Sallys now, except one looked like Geminia.

Sally wasnt happy.
"Why the heck are you wearing my necklace?" She yelled at Geminia.
"Ummmm... You mean this one?" Geminia said, holding it up innocently.
"Yes! Give it back! You dont know what it means to me!" Sally yelled, and tried to grab it. Geminia stepped back.

'Freeze her!' Thought Geminia, now getting used to this necklace.
Sally suddenly stopped in midstride, unable to move any part of her body.
"Okay, now reverse the swap' She thought.

The necklace did this and...
11211122221111.title: The swapping of the swaps..

choices: Everything turns more and more into cheerleading...
112111222211112.content:
Everything went totally black.

When everything focused back into view, the familiar face of Steven appeared. This time without a bucket.
"Dangit. Never thought she would try THAT trick. Good job with getting the world to hate her and all. But she countered it. Just like she counters everything" He said, unhappy.
"What the heck happened?" Sally asked. She was beginning to get used to being here.
"Well, basically everyone in a 10 mile radius attacked her. Except, she created a sort of forceshield which protected her from them, and allowed her to move freely unchallenged" He said.
"Are you going to help me at all?" Sally asked.
"Sorry, we cant because of her" He shrugged.
"Fine. I have a plan anyway" She said.
"Well, I hope it works" Steven says.

Everything blacked out, and then refocused back in Sallys locker room.
Sally made sure she had the necklace on and did her work.

Suddenly, everyone on the planet, turned into a Sally. Even Sally made some physical changes to herself.
They all had long brown hair. They were wearing white T-Shirts with a dark blue lining, the shirt didn't cover their belly button. They all wore white miniskirts and white shoes. They were all the same height that Sally originally was. And the final touch was that every single one of them wore a necklace identical to the one that Sally wore, except without the powers.

"This will stop her" Said Sally.
112111222211112.title: I'm me, your me, we are all me!

choices: Sally stands her ground and fights Sylvia!
1121112222111121.content:
However, due to the fact that this story is based on random changes by the Necklace, thats exactly what will do.

The necklace kept going at its work, changing more and more of the world. Every single school in the world was turned into a cheerleading school.

Infact, every house contained at least a dozen Sally's, who all looked the same, and who all thought the same way (With the exception of the necklace) and who all did the same thing.

Our Sally was amused at this change, and even kinda liked what the necklace was doing... kinda.
Except heres were everything changed, not for the better, but for worse. You see, Sylvia truely wasnt expecting this, but made a plan for it. After the almighty wreckage of her own dimension, she decided to go on a sort of dominating rampage. The necklace was now a part of her, it was bonded to her, and was as easy to be taken off as it was safe to do a brain transplant. The only difference was that she could control it's power much more effectively.

Sylvia turned herself into a copy of Sally, to blend in much better. She could still tell which Sally was the real one, to an extent, by the power eminating from the real necklace. It was only a matter of time before the 'real' Sally was found and a confrotation began.

Sally walked down the road, still trying to get used to the fact that everyone was now her. Except, this wasnt enough... she wanted... she wanted more. So the necklace did just that, before she had time to expand her thoughts.

Every movie was now about cheerleading, every T.V show was related to cheerleading, every picture was about cheerleading and every magazine and book was about cheerleading. It was insane, yet, somehow, Sally liked it. She then expanded her thoughts into more of what she wanted. She wanted to be a dominating figure over the other Sally's, she wanted to be taller than them, faster than them, stronger than them.

The necklace did just that. Her height increased so she was now a head taller than every single other girl on the planet. Her bust dramatically increased, not to a rediculously large amount, but certainly bigger. Her hips enlarged and her muscles became stronger. Not only that, but every single Sally on the planet looked up to her. Well, in two ways anyway, not only because she was taller, but they felt like she was their master, their leader, and they loved it to bits.

However, Sylvia eventually found Sally, and a final confrontation was about to begin.
"So, what took you so long?" Sally asked.
Many other Sallys gathered around to watch the scene unfold, many of them took out their identical looking phones and started taking photos to put on the internet. Sylvia reverted to her original form.
"Easier than I expected" Said Sylvia. "Your necklace gives off energy that I can detect with mine"
"Mmmm... Thought something like that might happen. Oh, alright, what do you want?" Asked Sally.
"I want the power of this dimension. I need you for it. Specifically, your necklace" She said, monotone.
"Well, from what I have heard, you have completely crushed about 40 other dimensions... so, no. From what I have been told, your kind of a slutty jerk" Sally said mockingly.
Many of the other Sally's whooped and cheered Sally at this.
"You may have turned a planet against me, but dont think that will work" Sylvia said. She lowered her head and her eyes darkened.
"Yea yea yea, whatever" Said Sally.
1121112222111121.title: Cheerleading for da world!

choices: Sally takes advantage of being bonded with the necklace...
11211122221111212.content:
"Alright, now, if its okay with you, your going to die right here, right now" Said Sally.
"You do realise that nothing that the Necklace can do is able to affect me? My Necklace can counter it all" Said Sylvia, forming an evil grin. Having destroyed 40 dimensions, this would probably be a pushover for her.
"Who says that 'I' am going to be the one who defeats you? What if 'they' defeat you?" Asked Sally, forming her own innocent, yet evil smile.
"Eh?" Asked Sylvia. She probably thought that Sally was mad. Who was 'they'?

"Oh, just a couple billion friends of mine. Say hi to the grim reaper for me Sylvia!" Said Sally, tilting her head back laughing maniaclly. You see, she had made preperations for this, and as she laughed, every single Sally in the world pulled a AK-47 out from behind them, pointing it at Sylvia.
"These bullets have been modified to get through that petty shield of yours. Once they penetrate it, their standard bullets, tearing you apart" Explained Sally.
Sylvia maintained her expressionless face.
"And if you miss?" She asked.
"WE wont... We wont" Said Sally.
"Aww heck yea! Time ta die Sylvia!" Yelled another Sally.
"You better say your prayers!" Cried another, raising her fist in the air.
"Say hi to the folks in heaven!" Yelled yet another Sally.
"You prepared for some serious OWNAGE time Sylvia?"
"Because your gonna die!"
"Alright girls, alright, calm down, lets just quickly knock her off the living side, and return to cheerleading" Said Sally. The girls whooped and cheered at this.

"You wont get away with this!" Yelled Sylvia.
"And why not?" Asked Sally.
"Did Steven tell you the whole story?" She asked.
"Yea, he told me that you had some sort of lust for power and domination and to become a god and blah blah blah, you destoryed... 40...? Yea, 40 dimensions and now mine is the last in the chain before you become the ultimate god... or, something along those lines" Sally said.
"Thats not the whole story. Do you know how I bonded with my necklace?" Sally asked.
"Well, normally I hate pre-war speeches, but I'll let you have this one" Said Sally, mockingly.
"Just do me one thing, take yours off" Said Sylvia.
There was something about Sylvia which made Sally feel unsure about herself. She gave off the feeling that, despite being throughly evil, she fought evenly matched battles and didnt have tricks hidden up her sleeve unless they were completely obvious.

Sally pulled at the Necklace.
It refused to budge from her neck, in fact, it almost seemed to be part of her somehow.
"Huh?" Said Sally, looking down at it. "It wont budge!"
"Thats what happened to me" Said Sylvia.
"So... what the heck do I do now?" She yelled.
"You'll learn to control it. In the mean time, lets get back to the battle, shall we?" Asked Sylvia.

"Oh, right... Ummm, yea, okay" Said Sally.
"Kill me" Said Sylvia.
"You make it sound so easy" Said Sally, mockingly.
"I assure you it is easier than you think" Said Sylvia.

The girls took aim, and let rip at least twenty bullets from each gun. Sally was shocked at seeing Sylvia's body get mutilated and fall to the ground, as if she WANTED to die. Wait, her last words, did she mean that?

The rest of the girls packed up their stuff, and returned to their cheerleading lives of being exactly the same as everyone else.
11211122221111212.title: Is this the end? Probably not...

112111222211112121.content:
***Authors note: This kind of an 'intermission' chapter which basically explains alot about Sylvia and the Necklace, you can probably skip it if you want***

Everything blacked out for Sally, and she found herself yet again, in the dark place, with Steven in front of her.
"Well, I have to admit. After 40 failed attempts, you actually managed to kill her!" Said Steven, smiling.
"Yea... actually, were you seeing the last part?" Sally asked.
"Sorry, went to get a coke for the big shootout" Said Steven.
"WHAT THE FLIPPIN HECK!!!! YOU JUST MISSED SOMETHING TOTALLY IMPORTANT!!!" Sally screamed at the top of her lungs, Steven had to hold his ears.
"Whoa girl! Back up, back up! What happened!" He said worried.
"This flippin necklace is now bonded with me like with how it happened to her!" She yelled.
"Wait, what?" He asked, getting more worried.
Sally took a deep breath and attempted to remove the necklace, it wouldnt budge.

"Well, thats... thats unexpected" He said, looking at it intently.
"So, what, now I have to take up her role as being the sole evil person in the entirety of existence?" She asked, now officially worried.
"No one ever said that, although, be my guest if you want to, not that me or the 39 other us's care" Said Steven.

"What was up with Sylvia in the first place, like, how did it bond to her or whatever?" Sally asked.
"She had it on for far too long, and she was a girl who liked being dominant, in power, having control. Eventually, it consumed her and the only way for her to get more power was outside her dimension..." Said Steven, looking away sadly.
"You loved her, didnt you?" Asked Sally.
"Provided you were still Steven, I dont know how you wouldnt have liked her at all" Said Steven. "But, regardless, this is the end"

"Wow... this ending sucks" Said Sally.
"Go do something, that will bring up another plot" Said Steven.
"You really have a word with things, dont you Steven..." Said Sally, amused.
"Yes... Oh yes" Said Steven. "I'll see you later Sally" He said.
"Sure" Said Sally.
"Oh, and one more thing... if your gonna have a world of cheerleaders, don't make them all look like you" He said, winking, then fading.
Sally just raised an eyebrow and reality refocused.

Actually, it would eventually get annoying, so Sally made each cheerleader different, different personality, different looks, different everything... except... except one thing.
They all knew her, and all loved her, and were all devoted to her.

You cant remove that part can you?
112111222211112121.title: The explanation.

choices: Popularity on the extra large scale...
1121112222111121211.content:
Sally returned home for a good rest, she was tired after the events that had happened during the past day or two.
She flopped down onto her bed, millions of thoughts racing through her mind. Except, she hadn't quite mastered the power of the necklace yet, and it went with the best thought it could pick out.

Suddenly, everything went black... again... This was becoming a familiar concept. Except, suddenly, Sally found herself in an endlessly large room with many, many computer screens on desks. There were no computer terminals, no keyboards, no mouses, no chairs, just the screen. Each one displayed the sight of someone different.

"Okay, this... this is werid" Said Sally. She walked around alot of them, but didn't recognize any of the places on the screens. She looked down at one of them, it showed someone at school at cheerleading practice. Sally bent down further for a closer look and put her hand on the top of the monitor. Suddenly, everything faded in an explosion of colours, and Sally found herself in the exact position of what was on the monitor screen.

Except, she was a completely different looking girl.
And she now lived in England.
And she was right at the bottom of a cheerleading Pyramid.
At the bottom center.

Sally groaned at this, regretting what she had done, there were at least 50 people stacked on top of her and it was infuriatingly difficult to hold her position perfectly.

"Alright girls! That's good!" Yelled a cheerleader a couple of meters away. "You can come down now!"
Sally gave a sigh of relief at this. Once most of the girls had either climbed off or fallen off, she stood up, rubbing her sore back.
Suddenly, she freaked out, and felt for the necklace. Oh, it was still there, phew.

Rather than completely reverting this sudden change of life, she went into the girls changing room to see what she had become.
She certainly didn't see her usual self in the mirror. Instead, she saw a 19 year old english girl with short, light blonde hair, a slightly larger than average bust, strong arms, strong legs, and a set of hips to die for. Sally laughed at what she saw, and the girl in the mirror laughed back. Suprisingly, with a few modifications, she might actually consider making herself look like this.

"Oi! Veronica! Get over here!" Yelled a girl from another side of the changing room. Since there were only four other girls in here, and none of them budged, Sally assumed that her new name must be Veronica. Well, thats not a name to die for...

Veronica (Possessed by Sally) walked over to the girl who called for her.
"Yea?" She asked.
The girl, who was slightly shorter with dark brown hair, threw a pile of clothes at her.
"Here's your gear back, make sure you don't lose it again!" She said.

By the demeaning tone of this girl, Veronica decided that she didn't exactly like being here. So, she 'depossessed' the body, and returned to her mansion in the U.S... with a few adjustments.
She now phyiscally looked like Veronica, with a slightly larger bust and stronger muscles. The original Veronica now looked like a slightly less attractive Sally, but kept her own memories and personality.
Sally, in her new form, actually liked this change.

Although, the Necklace was still not fully bonded with her, and it made another random change without her knowledge...

OPTION LINE...

1. Sally suddenly turns etheral, and possesses whoever she touches. She can't be seen, but she can depossess anyone she wants at any time.

2. All the cheerleaders in the world start to like her too much, and begin fighting over her...
1121112222111121211.title: Sally's new image.

11211122221111212111.content:
Suddenly, the necklace took affect.
Within seconds, Sally turned light blue and transparent. She gasped at this, not expecting such a thing to happen. Although, she immediately knew what this could do after having read about possession and stuff.

"Oh well, might as well try it out" She said, shrugging her shoulders.
Sally walked... well 'glided' down the stairs and outside. A few cheerleaders were walking by, talking about some upcoming tryouts. Sally decided that the best thing to do, was to try it out on one of them.

She glided right in front of them, just to see if they could see her. They could not. Sally stayed in front of them, looking at them and gliding backwards.

One girl was probably about 16, she was wearing a light blue cheerleaders outfit, had a slightly smaller than average bust, dazzling blue eyes and short, well cut, black hair.

Another girl was probably 18. She was wearing the exact same clothes and had an average bust. She had... wait, RED eyes? WHOA! Freaky! She must wear contacts. Her hair was curly and went down to her shoulders.

The last girl was a head taller than the other girls. She had a slightly larger than average bust, had brown eyes and light, short brown hair. She was probably 18 as well but could easily pass off as 20 or more.


Considering she still had the mind of a man, A.K.A, the personality traits of Steven, it was obvious who Sally would go for.

All of them.

But not at once. If anything, she wanted to get inside the minds of all three, do some rewriting, exit, and watch the fun unfold.
First, she went for the girl who was about 16. Within seconds, she was walking alongside the other two girls. She let the girl maintain full control without her knowing, and got to work.

She gasped as she looked upon the insides of this girls mind. She was standing in a small black, well lit room. In front of her was a computer. Sitting down at it, she got used to the controls.

She looked at everything that it could do. From what she could deduce, she could literally change anything about this girl, physically and mentally. The changes would take affect immediately, but everyone would not automatically assume that was normal.

Well firstly, Sally made a few changes. Firstly, tonight at 5:00 she had to turn up at Sallys house. Then she made her a little stronger in the muscles (Not a noticeable effect, but definately a change). Then, she left.

Sally then moved to the next girl, the one with the freaky red eyes. She made the exact same changes and left.
Lastly, she went to the older girl. This time, she made the changes, but stayed inside and took control. (She also made it so that this girl would happily accept being taken over, and would not have any negative thoughts to the idea)

"Hey, I got to go now, sorry girls" Sally said, in possession of the girl.
"What? Oh, okay, seeya at the tryouts!" Said the one with red eyes.
"Yea, dont be late!" Called the other, and they walked off down the streets.

Meanwhile, Sally walked off in the opposite direction. She had some plans of her own.

After cruising around for a while, seeing stuff through a different perspective and all, Sally was home by 4:00 to prepare for the girls. At exactly 5:00, the doorbell rang and Sally, now depossessed, let them in. The older girl was... errr... unconscious... in Sallys room. She led the girls upstairs and as soon as they entered her room, Sally knocked them out.
The plan was to combine them. After all, Sally had like all three, why not have a 3-in-1?

Her subject to be altered was the older girl. Firstly, she transferred the eyes from the red eyed girl onto her. Red eyes looked SO awesome. She then pulled off the hair of the other girl and put it on her subject. Sally then made her subject a new name: "Kelly"

Kelly was the combination of three girls. The rest of the girls that Sally had ripped bits off were still lying there, looking disfigured because of missing parts.

Actually, the girl who had red eyes looked like she had nice hands, so she removed them and put them on Kelly. By now, the other two girls were looking more and more disfigured as Sally made a few more changes. Afterwards, she made the other two bodies dissappear, leaving Kelly and her alone in the room.

At this point, Kelly was beginning to stir, and she probably wasnt prepared for looking a little more different than usual. So, Sally repossessed her, and walked outside.

A few more cheerleaders were walking along the street, and Sally, now Kelly, had two interesting ideas she wanted to try.

1. Turn them into clothing for 'Kelly' to wear.

2. Turn them into mind slaves. Sally's mind is linked with them and although they will continue acting normally, she could give them orders and they would obey without hesitation.
11211122221111212111.title: Possession-a-holic...

choices: Kelly swaps minds with the cheerleader...
112111222211112121111.content:
Kelly walked up quietly and discreetly behind them, preparing to turn them into items of clothing.

Unfortunately, as this story goes, the necklace, well, doesnt exactly ALWAYS do as it is told...
Kelly's thought was on turning one of the girls into a dark green tubetop.

EXCEPT...

The necklace suddenly turned Kelly into the girls cheerleading clothes, and the cheerleader was WEARING HER! Kelly wanted to scream when she suddenly noticed what had happened to her. All her clothes and the necklace had dissappeared, but she was NOW an item of clothing! The only reason why she couldn't scream was because she didn't exactly have a mouth. Oddly enough, she actually had a full 360 degree perspective of the world, being able to see all the way round her.

The girls continued walking on, talking about all sorts of things and being oblivious to any changes. Kelly desperately wanted out, like, SERIOUSLY wanted out, but she couldn't do anything.

Kelly sighed. Well, she thought she gave a sigh, it wasn't exactly possible due to not having either a mouth or lungs to breathe with. She hoped that the cheerleader that was wearing her would go somewhere private, and more quiet so she could think alot easier on how to get out of this mess.

After about an hour of mindless walking, the cheerleader wearing Kelly went off home. During the mindless walking, Kelly had come up with a few ways to get out of this mess...
Firstly, she wondered if she could somehow, like, 'move' the body. Was she still 'connected' to the necklace? Probably not.
She tried moving an 'arm', but failed.
Wait, what the heck? The cheerleaders right arm just randomly moved around! Kelly was suprised as this... was it her? Probably not... But, lets try it again... just in case.
Kelly tried again, and funnily enough, it moved. The cheerleader looked at her arm. "What the heck?"
Kelly suddenly had a way to get out of this mess.

She took complete control of the girls body. Somehow, the necklace had almost created a way for her to get out of this. She actually now had full control of the girls body (While still being worn). The girl couldn't even speak, but Kelly was sure that she was panicking. All she had to make sure was that she wasn't taken off.

Kelly had the cheerleader run back to 'Sally's' house. She climbed up the drain pipe into her 'own' bedroom. There was the necklace, sitting innocently on 'her' bed.

Kelly had the girl put the necklace on. Hopefully, her plan would work...
112111222211112121111.title: Kellys... no, wait, whos new clothing?

choices: Nothing happens while Kelly walks to school
1121112222111121211111.content:
Luckily, the necklace did something good for a change. Within seconds, Kelly was now the cheerleader, the cheerleader the clothing. At least that had been sorted out. Lastly, without too many problems (Well, hopefully), Kelly changed herself back to her previous form. Now it would be almost as if nothing happened.

On the off chance that the cheerleader whom was now the clothes was able to control someones body, she took the top off, and changed into some much more comfortable clothes. At this point, she wondered what to do with the cheerleader. She could just remove her from existence, but she felt like compensating her for using her body.

Nah, no chance of that. So what to do? Well, she could just keep her as a piece of clothing, making her change to whatever she needed. Now that would work. She put the clothing back on her, and went to bed, the top changing to a night gown.

Waking up next morning, sunlight streamed through the window. Kelly sat up, yawned and stretched her arms. Getting out of bed, her night gown turned into a red, very skimpy cheerleading outfit that barely covered much of her, it as almost as if the top was a bra. (It wasn't, but it might as well have been that short)

Kelly realised that her wardrobe was considerably useless now, but she went downstairs, helped herself to some toast, and went outside to cheerleading school.

Leaving the house, she saw two girls walking to school as well...
Did the necklace interfere?

11212.content:
Just then, Steven's cell phone happened to ring. He answered it.
A remarkably authoritative voice came out of the phone.

"Son, stop right there, don't do anything, don't go anywhere, and please try not
to think. Blank your mind as best you can, and while I'm talking to you, just go ahead
and reach up, and take the necklace off."

"Who is this?" asked Steven.

His phone barked, "Never mind that. Just do exactly as you're told. Now!"

The voice paused for a moment. Then it continued.
"Have you followed instructions?"

Steven hesitated. Then a picture began to form in his mind. Too many of Benjamin's thriller novels
and action movies...
The next thing they knew, there were helicopters overhead, hummers full of swat teams screeching
down on them, army personnel carries disgorging troopers, and squad cars slamming to a halt, full
of investigators, detectives, and various government emergency personnel.
From one of these last vehicles, a grim-looking middle aged man emerged....looking remarkable like
Tommy Lee Jones, holding a cell phone to his ear.
He was the caller.

11213.content:
"Oh crap!" Steven gasped, seeing what the necklace had done to his sister and the girl he had a severe crush on, he couldn't believe it had fused them together. It wouldn't have looked so bizarre had Jill and his sister been the same age, but the former was 17 and extremely curvy, while his sister was only 12 years old.

"Who am I talking to?" Steven asked the bizarre hybrid girl in front of him.

"I...I d...don't k...know" the merged together girls replied in one odd-sounding voice.

"Okay, I can't be dealing with this" Steven muttered to himself, as the hybrid girl began feeling her own boobs as though they were alien to her. Steven continued watching the Jill/Rachel hybrid for a while longer, before his attention went back to the necklace.

"Jesus! What the hell happened?" Jill's current boyfriend shouted, before bolting from the scene, leaving the two of them...or rather the three of them behind.

After watching Jill's boyfriend fleeing in panic, Steven raised an eyebrow, then he concentrated as hard as he could on returning his sister and the head cheerleader back to normal, but nothing happened. The more he tried the more irritated he became, and the sight of his sister's recognizable feet on the end of a pair of the sexiest legs he had ever seen wasn't helping his concentration any. Neither did the image of his sister's cute face framed by Jill's long, elegant hair. "I bet this thing was made in Taiwan or something" Steven grumbled, as he went back to inspecting the necklace.

He tried again, but nothing happened, and at that point he gave up. "Okay, this sucks!" he sighed deeply, wondering just what he could do.

"Am I Jill...or Rachel?" the hybrid suddenly asked him, putting Steven in somewhat of a quandary, since he didn't know the answer exactly. "Both!" he just blurted out.

"Steven, change me back!" the part of the hybrid that was obviously his sister then said to him, causing a worried frown to appear on his face.
11213.title: Try changing them back to normal but the neckla...

112132.content:
"Look, Rachel, Jill, whoever you two are now..." Steven sighed as he attempted to comfort the merged girl "I'll try to fix this so just calm down..."

"You better if you what's good for you!" The hybrid girl snaps.

"Okay, I'll assume that Jill's speaking though I'm pretty sure Rachel feels the same way as well..." Steven mutters to himself.

With little remaining options, Steven escorted the hybrid girl back to his house. He looked behind as the hybrid girl remained scared and sad, but that was when he thought of something to possibly cheer her up.

"Ok, how about we call you Rajill?" Steven chuckles nervously "Clever, isn't?'

"Cool name!" She said, sounding closer to Rachel, but then said, "No, it sucks!"

"I guess that's Jill..." Steven said to himself. "Well, deal with it for now..."

So Steven and Rajill stayed cooped up in the house for a while. He tried to comfort her even more as she weeped as well as making continuous failed attempts to reactivate the stone.

Just then, the doorbell rang...

"Ok, just head in the closet for now" Steven said as Rajill obeyed. "Who could this be?"

He answered and awaiting him was...
112132.title: He talks to the hybrid girl some more.

1121321.content:
Steven was in for a surprise when his and Rachel's own parents, James and Linda, awaiting him at the door. They were always away at work and just never around until now...

"Mom and Dad!" Steven gasps "What a surprise..."

"Hey there, son" James said "Your mom and I decided to take the day off! Great, right?"

"Yes...where is Rachel?" Linda asks.

"Um...she's still in school, I think" Steven said.

"But it's already 5:00...a little too late to be in school." James said.

As usual, the last girl to arrive was Erika with her twin brother Erik. Next morning shortly after getting up, Jill drinks a gallon and a half of milk before she has her fill. She then surprises herself by purring contently while laying on her bed before dressing for school.

That 'Cursed' necklace has transformed Jill from a bad and growing more evil were-wolf into a good and protective tigress. The compassion and in a manner of speaking "love" that Erik had given her the previous day has saved Jill's soul. At least for now. She doesn't understand why she's no longer a werewolf and she will be totally stunned when the next 'new' moon rises. That will now be her new time for change. At first, her tiger side wanted to kill him and be done with this nuisance but as she was walking over to her prey, her human side overrode that thought.

He tells her that he knows it's true because ever since she had run off with the necklace that had transformed her into a werewolf (and later, were-tiger), he has kept a close eye on her. The previous night after she returned home from visiting Sally, Jill jumped out of her bedroom window and silently went to all 3 boys residences. One is still alive only because he was not home when she visited his parents place.

Jill becomes quite upset hearing this news. She's startled even more by what he next says to her. Gingerly putting his left arm around her waist while he strokes her hair, Steven whispered into her ear, "I don't blame you one bit for what you did. I dearly adore you and would appreciate it if you would be willing to be my friend." Jill is speechless and perplexed about what to do or say next. After more than half a minute of silence. Steven tells Jill, "To show how serious I am, until you really, REALLY need to do it, I don't want to have sex with you. It's more important that we become friends than two kids sharing a bed somewhere."

All the strength in Jill's legs drains out of her as she slumps further into Steven's embrace. For several minutes Jill just lies in his arms unable to articulate anything. She snaps out of her daze when the warning bell for class rings. He quickly tells her that he'll go over to her house after school only if she agrees and she does.

Normally a very good student Jill is totally out of it for the rest of her classes that day. She doesn't answer anything right. Jill makes dumb errors when asked questions by her teachers. A couple of times the entire class laughs at her for the foolish answer she gives. An action which doesn't endear them to her. Seeing her girls practicing after school finally wakes Jill up and that day's cheerleading practice goes off with no problems. Jill's halfway home before she remembers about Steven and wonders what other surprises he has for her.
11233211.title: Later that day, Steven approaches Jill and she...

choices: Yes, Jill goes to exact revenge on the three boys from the other school.
No, Jill is worried she'll become a tiger forever.
11233212.content:
Jill was eagerly anticpating the new moon. Then she would strike and avenge Sally by beating that ex-boyfriend of Sally's. And his two friends.

Jill scarfed down massive amounts of raw meat and gallons of milk that day. But just before the moon would show itself, the necklace appeared suddenly to Jill and glowed in Jill's hand. An older Jill (by only a week) appeared before Jill. This older Jill had paws, claws, whiskers, a tail and many other tiger features but still seemed sort of human.

Fortunatley, they were in a private space, an empty hallway of the school.


Jill was somewhat shocked. The older Jill said, "I don't have much time here...but I'm here to warn you. If you take revenge as a were-tiger on those boys, you will give into your bloodlust. You will become just like me. A cannibal. A monster. A tiger. You will kill them, devour them and then it will be too late. You will be destined to become a tiger. Forever. ...Do you see how my transformation is incomplete? It will be complete in about another week. And I can never go back."

Jill took these words of warning, but wasn't sure that was her. It was too...weird. Then again, everything happening was weird.

The older Jill disappeared into thin air.


Then the moon rose and Jill purred in happiness, as she became a were-tiger once more. But with these words of warning, should she still follow through with revenge on the three boys from that other school...that raped Sally...should she risk becoming a tiger forever?
11233212.title: Jill learns from someone who knows about it, th...

choices: No, Jill resists her temptations and sticks to making the 3 boys confess
Yes, Jill gives into her instincts and eats the 3 boys
112332121.content:
Despite the warning from her future self, Jill was more concerned about the 3 boys that raped Sally, especially if these 3 rapists would possibly devolve to murdering the poor girl. But, as the saying goes "How far would you go to save someone you love?", was what Jill was going to do.

However, heeding the future Jill's warning, Jill planned to only scare the 3 boys enough to make them confess their crime to the authorities by turning into a were-tiger and giving those 3 boys a real scare, just enough to make them confess.

Later that night, Jill put her plan in motion, as she transformed into her were-tiger form, cutting the circuit box wires inside her targets' house, causing the house's power to turn off and giving Jill an advantage in the dark. But as the power went down inside the house, the 3 boys split up to restore power. However, as this happened, Jill picked the 3 boys off one-by-one, knocking each of them out cold.
While they were unconscious, Jill hoisted the 3 boys up on a nearby wall, as she stood on her were-tiger form's hind legs, standing up like she would as a human, After the 3 boys saw Jill in her were-tiger form, they began to freak out, unsure of who or what their captor was.

It was there that Jill began to feel her were-tiger instincts tempting her to kill the 3 boys as punishment, but does she give in, or resists the temptation and sticks to her plan?
112332121.title: How Far Would You Go To Protect Someone You Love?

choices: The next time Jill DECIDES to transform into a were-tiger things end up happy.
The next time Jill DECIDES to transform into a were-tiger thing don't go well.
112332122.content:
Jill is now very worried about what might happen to her if she goes through with her plan to PUNISH those boys. Trying to decide whether or not to go after them, Jill starts pacing back-and-forth (just like tigers do in their zoo cages). After maybe a quarter hour Jill suddenly realizes what she has been doing and it greatly upsets her. Saying to herself, "Oh my God, I'm ALREADY turning into a tiger." She then starts crying and resolves to NOT go after those boys. Nevertheless, it takes nearly ALL her willpower to resist the increasingly strident CALL of the wild filling her BODY and MIND. By the time the moon sets and her body reverts to its human form Jill is utterly exhausted. Immediately falling asleep she doesn't wake up until late that night back in her were-tiger body. A calmness now fills her mind and Jill decides that even though its after closing-time, she needs to go to the County zoo. She intends to visit the tiger compound. She does and when she sees the 2 adolescent female tigers Jill feels as though they are now are her best friends. Jumping into the compound to stay the night, Jill barely gets out the next morning before the zoo staff starts its early morning feedings. Jill stealthily leaves the zoo without being seen. Jill would surely be in a pickle if someone discovered an extra tigress in the compound.

Now brimming with more energy than she has ever felt in her life, Jill returns home slipping back into her upstairs bedroom with no trouble. Quickly stripping off her clothes Jill then takes a very luxurious bubble bath, running late for school she decides to skip breakfast. When Jill opened her front door to leave she's surprised to see Martha Williamson standing there crying. Asking her what's wrong Martha said, "Sally's dead. She died just after the moon rose night before last. In this morning's paper, I read that the D.A. is charging those 3 boys with First degree Murder." This news greatly unsettles Jill as she also starts crying up a storm. Jill's step-mother hears the commotion and comes to the front door. Upon hearing the news she tells Martha and Jill that they can stay at Jill's house today. Jill's step-mother then calls the high school and the staff there is very understanding, considering the situation. When it's time for lunch, Jill surprises Martha and her step-mother when she insists on having a couple pounds of hamburger [RAW]. They both chalk it up to this terrible situation and nothing more.

Shortly after finishing her lunch, Jill realizes that she needs to visit the zoo again. It takes some convincing but her step-mother finally agrees to take the 2 girls to the zoo. As soon as they enter she takes off dragging Martha with her to the tiger compound. At the entrance a zoo employee says it's closed because the tigers have been acting very weird and aggressive all day. Jill says, "Oh that's alright, they won't bother me." With a tight grip on Martha's arm Jill easily pushes past the women and enters. Upon seeing Jill, the 2 females immediately start calming down and purring like kittens. Jill then starts purring back. Martha who is totally mystified by what she has just seen asks Jill, "Why did you come here?" enigmatically Jill replies, "this is something that I need to do for Sally." Martha then says, "Alright Jill. Can I just step back a little bit?" Jill says she can as long as the tigers can still see her. It's over an hour before Jill says it's time to leave so they do. On the ride home, Jill's step-mother drops Martha off at her house.

When they get home Jill immediately goes up to her bedroom saying see needs to be alone tonight. Considering everything that happened that day, Jill's step-mother agrees. Keeping her lingerie on as she undresses Jill now tries summoning her future self. After a short while 'future Jill' appears. She then says thank you Sally. "Future Jill" says your welcome and how did you know. Jill says, "when Martha told me WHEN you had died. I then started to wonder about your warning. Had I gone after those boys, would I have changed like that?" Sally's spirit said absolutely. Jill as I was dying, "This absolutely beautiful Bengal tigress spirit told me everything about what has recently happened to you. She is very concerned that you'll misuse the wonderful gift you've been blessed with. I'm deeply touched that you were willing to risk your immortal soul to avenge my attack, Jill. However, you must know, that I now realize what happened to me was my own fault. I should have left the high school with you and the team. The tigress spirit says it's time for me to leave you." So she does and Jill falls asleep quite contented. {Sally didn't tell her that the spirit is permitting her to stay and watch over Jill. She is now Jill's guardian angel whenever Jill returns to be a were-tiger. In the future, Jill will come across challenges that Sally's protection will provide choices to help her deal with those situations. Jill will stay safe only as long as she make the correct choice.}
112332122.title: No, Jill is worried she'll become a tiger f...

choices: Next morning Jill used desperate & extreme measures silencing a terrified Erika.
Jill's worried that Erika's WAY TO happy, discovering her secret Tiger identity.
1123321221.content:
The next few weeks after Sally's death, Jill's life pretty much went on the same as before her transformation from a were-wolf into a not yet fully-grown Bengal tigress. In fact, the only major change to Jill's routine during this time, was returning home after each game and "VERY" tired she changed into her pure silk baby-doll top to sleep in. Shortly after falling asleep Jill, now sleepwalking, would easily sneak out of her bedroom and return to the 2 adolescent tigress eagerly awaiting her at the County zoo. She would then spend the remainder of the night playing with them. However unbeknown-est to her, when she entered their caged area, Jill's body would transform into the body of a very healthy and fertile adolescent Bengal tigress (identical in every way, except for size to the one Sally saw when she died). The next morning, just before sunrise AND before she realized anything had happened, Jill reverted back to her human form and stealthily sleepwalked home unseen. Jill would then be quite annoyed that she was so tired when she woke up.

Jill's now slowly assimilating many feline attributes within her still maturing human form. Growing nearly 2 inches in her torso AND legs while she gained 4 inches in her bust as it inflated from a healthy and perky B to a much bouncier DD in less than 2 months, was the explanation for Erika's becoming increasingly attracted to and needing to be near Jill as much as possible. Jill even started looking forward to when Erik would occasionally lovingly stroke her hair. The rest of the Varsity team started playfully teasing Jill about the attention the Karlsen twins were now giving her. In fact, the only worry Jill now had was with football season soon-to-be over HOW could she keep ALL of her "GIRLS" safe. Their after-school class schedules would be changing and there was absolutely NO WAY that single-handed she could keep an eye on ALL of them anymore.

After dedicating the remainder of the season to Sally's memory, the Eastlake High football team went on an incredible tear winning their remaining 3 games by over 35 points each and quite unexpectedly qualifying for the play-offs! After blowing away their first two opponents, Eastlake's third and final opponent turned out to be the very High School those three rapists came from. So while the game would've normally been played at their stadium, considering what had happened the last time the 2 schools met, the State's High School Athletics Board moved the divisional championship game to a 'neutral' junior college stadium over 20 miles away.

The game ended up being, by far, the most brutal and bloody game in State history. In fact, during half-time the referees managed to get an emergency conference call of the State Board of Education set up. They wanted to get permission to end the game then and there! Although sympathizing with the situation, no matter how many more injuries would occur they insisted that the second half HAD to be played. It was, and Three MORE paramedic units ended up helping carry away the carnage to several local hospitals. All the while the game was going on behind her, Jill happily grinned. Returning home nearly an hour and a half later than usual, this time Erika had followed her home. Unfortunately for Erika Jill's parents had already gone to bed so, as usual for a game night, Jill again quickly falls asleep wearing only her favorite sheer silk top.
1123321221.title: More than she realizes Jill gains some new friends

choices: When Jill gets a little TOO frisky, she accidentally solves one of her problems.
Jill's conversation with Sally Brown starts to really weigh on her conscience.
11233212212.content:
Erika followed Jill home after the game, staying behind Jill until she stopped to get gas at a discount station for the car. So Erika arrived at Jill's house just in time to see Jill slip out of her bedroom window. Following Jill in her brother's car, Erika was stumped when she saw Jill walk into a sizable stand of trees near the Zoo's back wall. After parking her car nearby, Erika took several minutes climbing the same tree she had just seen Jill climb effortlessly. It was nearly an hour later when Erika found Jill. She missed Jill's nightly transformation into a Bengal Tigress and wouldn't have found Erika had she not noticed Erika's silk top causally tossed just inside the main Tiger compound. Fearfully looking inside she was very surprised to see that THREE tigresses were playing there. Deciding to wait there until morning, Erika called her brother filling him in on everything she had seen so far.

It was lucky that Erika woke up shortly before Jill transformed back into her human body. Seeing it occur, Erika followed Jill back to her home. Arriving there Erika grabbed Jill's shoulder in her backyard. Startled to be awakened outside her house, Jill didn't have a ready explanation for Erika. Stunned that Erika now knew that she could transform into a tigress, Jill was speechless. Especially when Erika followed Jill back into her bedroom window. With Erika pestering her with questions, it took Jill three times longer than usual to dress that morning. When she was finally finished, Jill peeked downstairs and was relieved to not see anyone there. Quietly pushing Erika towards the front door, Jill was surprised by her father appearing in the hallway just as the front door was open. Seeing Erika standing there he invited her IN for breakfast. Dismayed at her dad's offer Jill silently accepted her fate. After Jill's family finished breakfast her father insisted that Erika spend some time with Jill in her room. [Her father was concerned that her recent, unexpected and enormous growth spurt Jill seemed to be turning into a recluse].

Ensconced back in Jill's bedroom, Erika started again pumping Jill about her newly acquired ability. It didn't take Jill very long to realize the true intent of Erika's questions. For some unknown reason, Erika wanted to also become a tigress! Which was something Jill wouldn't wish on her WORSE enemy much less than one of her best friends. It took Jill almost the entire morning to finally convince Erika she had absolutely NO idea how OR why she had become changed into a were-tigress. Jill further said, "Erika, this is a something I really don't think you would truly want if you knew all the hassles it's caused me lately. I don't even know how to change from girl to tiger or back yet" Erika replied, "Oh come on now Jill, do you really think that I or anyone else on the cheer-leading team wouldn't want to have the same fabulous body you have!" Now realizing Erika's thinking, Jill's at a loss for words. They probably would've spent the whole day arguing about Jill's 'curse' except just then Erik was calling Erika looking for any more news about Jill. Knocking Erika's phone out of her hand when she mentioned who was calling her, before she talked to Erik Jill convinced Erika to not tell ANYONE else about her secret . So Erika left for home and Jill started nervously pacing over how she would handle Erika's questions when they next met.
11233212212.title: Jill's worried that Erika's WAY TO happ...

choices: Going directly to the zoo & seeing 4 tigers there, Jill sticks with her plan.
Jill first stops at someone's house, kidnapping them before heading to the zoo.
112332122121.content:
That day at school, Jill's successful at avoiding running into Erika or her brother. To make sure Erika doesn't follow her to the zoo again, Jill deliberately stayed home that night, which would've greatly disappointed the Zoo's 2 Tigresses, had the Zoo not added a couple more adolescent tigers to their compound that very same morning. The Zoo Manager's original plan had been for the 2 tigresses to only be a temporary exhibit. She was very concerned that they might not like the climate or crowds. However, with them being visited so often by Jill they had become quite settled in at the zoo. So when another pair of Bengal tigresses became available, the County's Zoo manager hadn't hesitated acquiring them as companions for her existing pair.

The next day at school, Jill's so exhausted she can barely keep her eyes open. All day while she shuffles between classes Jill kept mumbling to herself, "I must learn how to change into and out of my Tigress body whenever I want to. That's all that matters now." Arriving home with nearly 36 hours of no sleep, entering her bedroom Jill is surprised to see her jewelry box glowing. When she had returned home the first time as a were-wolf, Jill had carefully placed the necklace inside. However, when she had transformed into her feline state for the first time she completely forgot about its existence. Opening her jewelry box and picking it up, as soon as she touched it Jill instantly remembered everything about the necklace, including the person who had given it to her.

Stripping before putting it around her neck, at first Jill was undecided about what to do. First off, she could call Erika and invite her to meet somewhere and then maybe show HER the necklace. Then again, she could go back to her old night-time routine of visiting the 2 tigresses at the zoo. But this time she would be awake and also not stay there all night playing with them. She also could find out where that boy Steven lived and thank him properly for his gift. After pacing back and forth for over half an hour, Jill snapped her fingers saying, "Of course, I should have thought of doing this right away." Collecting her cell-phone and then putting the necklace around her neck, Jill climbs out her bedroom window (still buck naked), she leaves for the most important meeting in her life so far.
112332122121.title: Jill soon learns the other definition of pride!

choices: The next phase of Jill's plans for Erik, soon proceeds with no problems at all.
Not leaving things alone when she's behind Erika makes things a WHOLE LOT worse.
1123321221212.content:
Jill silently ran along several brick walls stopping at the Karlsen twins backyard. Focusing on using her enhanced feline sense of smell it took Jill virtually no time at all to find which bedroom Erik was in fast asleep. Quickly opening one of the windows Jill slipped in, covering his mouth with her right fore-paw. After telling him to stay quiet, and nothing about how she intends to reward him for mystically changing her into a tigress from a were-wolf, Jill pulls Erik towards the window where he sees her partially feline body in the glare of a nearby street light. Gasping at its wonderful sleekness, Erik lets Jill carry his 150-pound, 5' 7" body through the window. Before scrambling down the tree she had climbed, Jill carefully placed a note under Erika's window sill. When Erika read it the next morning, it did not have the desired effect Jill had anticipated.

It didn't take very much prodding by Jill for Erik to go with her to the zoo. Of course, he didn't know that it was their destination until they had nearly arrived. Easily carrying him over the wall from the tree she normally used Jill dashed over to her friends. Seeing the new occupants in the compound and still wearing the necklace securely around her neck, Jill immediately transformed fully into her Bengal tigress form much to Erik's fascination. After spending several minutes introducing herself to the new neighbors, Jill casually jumped back out of the compound retaining her tigress body. Meowing to the 4 tigresses, "He's my mate, so let me reward him in my own way first. Once I'm done with him, you gals can take turns caring for him any way you decide." When Erik then asked Jill what she had told them she just replied, "It's a secret for now. One, I'm pretty sure you'll enjoy in time."

It really took no effort on Jill's part to coax Erik to enter the tigers compound. As Jill's 'friend' he correctly figured they wouldn't attack him. Instead they approached him from all four sides, taking turns rubbing up against his legs exactly like a house cat often does. Petting them all in turns, Jill tells Erik each of their feline names and when they were born. This second piece of news Erik found a bit odd but didn't mention that to Jill. Seeking to quench the heat building in her loins rather than her heart, after Erik had been petting the tigresses for several minutes and not then facing in her direction, Jill pointed the necklace at Erik giving him some increased strength and musculature of an Bengal tiger. He was having so much fun with the 4 tigresses, he didn't notice the subtle transformation Jill did to him. The assembled tigresses did, loudly yipping their approval.

Noticing that it was getting close to midnight, Jill told Erik it was time for them to return home. Helping him out of the compound, Jill safely returned Erik to his home and several minutes later retired for the night in her own bed. The next morning Erik woke up famished. So much so that in no time flat, he ate 3 times his normal breakfast of sausages and eggs barely waiting for them to cook. Entering the breakfast area just as he finished his dishes, Erika angrily waves Jill's note under his nose. Right then and there, she would've said many choice words to Erik except their uncle was also in the kitchen making his breakfast. Erik quickly gathered together his school-books dashing off to Jill's house. He waited on her front porch for Jill to leave for school. He figured she'd be a good bodyguard from his mad sister for awhile.

Luckily avoiding Erika all day at school, Erik anxiously waited for Jill to get out of her last class to walk home with her. He wasn't happy when she said that she had to stay for a cheerleader's practice starting shortly after school let out. His sadness evaporated when 4 girls who are without current boy-friends surrounded him on the practice floor when he arrived there with Jill. It instantly reminded him of the previous night's activities at the zoo. The fuss they were making over him really got to Erika and she almost came to blows with those girls. Yelling at the top of her lungs, "He's my brother and none of you are allowed to touch him. You hear me!" Quickly Erik interrupts saying, "Well, actually Erika if they want to be my friend, I'm not going to stop them and if you do anything to hurt them, I'll tell our Uncle on you. Since he started raising us 6 years ago, you KNOW he's wanted me to be friendlier with girls.
1123321221212.title: Jill first stops at someone's house, kidnap...

choices: A couple years later now, Jill's in College happily living out her true destiny.
For the last time before something new happens to her, Jill sleepwalks again.
11233212212122.content:
The previous night when Jill used the necklace to physically improve Erik's physique, she neglected to consider what could happen to his TWIN sister Erika. Since she was asleep at the time, her dreams suddenly became quite sensual and erotic waking her up. Still very groggy when she staggered to her bathroom, Erika didn't notice that she had mysteriously acquired a far more buff and flexible body. She didn't realize what had happened to her until the next morning when absolutely ALL her bras no longer fit her. During her struggles to put one on Erika finally noticed just how much fuller and firmer her bust had become overnight. There was now virtually no bounce when she walked, so after spending 20 minutes fighting a losing battle, Erika gave up and decided to just go to school without a bra. She was lucky a couple of her blouses were still large enough to decently cover her newly enhanced bust.

Curiously, Erik was the only person at cheer-leader practice to notice Erika's bra-less state. Undecided about what he should say, if anything, he sat down waiting for the group to finish its practice. He still wanted to talk to Jill about their liaison from the previous night. So once Erika had finished her tirade and without even realizing what he was saying Erik shouted at her, "I'm the lord of the manor when our Uncle is gone and from now on, YOU'RE wearing a bra when you leave the house." Everyone then looked closely at Erika finally noticing just how far her engorged nipples were pointing through her blouse. Looking down to see what the entire team was gasping about, Erika nearly broke into tears and immediately run home in record time. Seeing Erika's new bust, Jill puzzled over how it had occurred. Just like everyone else at school that day who had noticed its much greater PROMINENCE.

The sudden assertive actions Erik had taken with his sister made him even more attractive to the team, Jill most of all. So much so, had they been alone, Jill would've tackled Erik and not taken NO for an answer. As it was, it took all her mental and animal strength to complete the practice that afternoon. At the end of practice when the team went to the gym lockers to shower and change, Erik left for home. He was feeling quite guilty about being cross with Erika and Erik felt some kind of apology was in order. When he opened the door Erik fell down stumbling over Erika on the floor in the front hall. Once inside their home and the door had shut she had completely broken down into tears and was still crying her eyes out when Erik arrived home. Seeing the state she was in shattered Erik's spirit. Not knowing what to say he kept quiet and softly embraced his sister on his left shoulder.

Once the team had finished their showers and changed into their street clothes, Jill took the 4 girls who had earlier surrounded Erik, home with her. She knew that things were quickly spiraling out of control, and her alter-ego was the cause. When they were in front of the twins house, all 5 teens heard the terrible cater-walling coming from the house. Going to the door Jill rang the door-bell but no one answered. Leaning on it again for a second time, through the door Jill asked if there was anything she could do to help. When Erik opened the door several minutes later, the other girls pushed right through Jill. Seeing the terrible shape that Erika was now in, and shocking Erik by their boldness, they all immediately started caressing Erika.
11233212212122.title: Not leaving things alone when she's behind ...

choices: Erika's the one to discern what to do with the "FOUR new students" at school.
Soon enough things grow even further out of hand for Jill, but not Erik!
112332122121222.content: That night, Jill returned to the zoo and in her anguish over what had happened that day she was far rougher with the tigresses than ever before. In fact she ended up scratching all of them several times. Breaking the skin she infected them with her own "mixed" blood. Shortly before sunrise when she left they all followed her. A couple hours later, when the compound was checked, a state-wide alert was sent out about those 4 missing tigresses. Without meaning to Jill now had enough helpers to safeguard all of her cheer-leaders. Moving as silently as they would in their home jungle the four newly transformed tigresses were absolutely loyal to Jill. It also didn't take them very many days to show their devotion to Erik.
112332122121222.title: For the last time before something new happens ...

choices: Jill bites them and makes them were-tigers!
The necklace turns the town into a jungle and everyone into animals.
1123322.content:
Jill wasn't exactly sure what to think of her newfound animal like habits. But soon, she didn't care, as they were so fun! Her agility was off the charts, making her an even better cheerleader; she could eat and eat meat forever (especially any venison) without gaining weight for some reason and now loved milk more so than anyone...and it makes her bones stronger, so that can't be bad. Every change to Jill, Jill quickly accepted and loved it.


Though some people found Jill...odd. She would lick herself, purr when happy and wanted people to pet her. She had many other odd quirks too, like hissing like a cat or the fact she always landed on all fours. People were starting to feel Jill was weird...


Then the next full moon came, and as Jill was dreaming of running through lush jungles, it happened. She woke up suddenly, roared and morphed into a tiger. A were-tiger.


Jill ran the streets, eating every animal in sight and scaring others, but she didn't care. Then a bunch of teenagers from her school, out late partying appeared in her path, scared of her. Her newfound predatory instincts said to bite them...but she thought she shouldn't...after all, being a were-tiger would probably make them were-tigers too. And that could be bad. Or it could be liberating for them, as it was for her.


Jill was also still wearing the necklace, unknown to her. She was still dreaming of those lush jungles...how great it would be if she was there, among the animals...and the necklace could give her that (albeit in "altered" fashion).


What happens?
1123322.title: Embracing the animal

choices: Some human tourists to the "jungle" showed up in front of Jill.
"Steven", now an animal, shows up in front of Jill.
11233222.content:
The whole town was enveloped in a flash of white light. When the white light vanished, the town was...different. In fact, it wasn't exactly a town.

Where the town once stood was a vast jungle. Trees, bushes, waterfalls, everything. Jill, as a were-tiger, was purring in enjoyment at her new hunting grounds. And as for everyone else, they were also making animalistic noises. After all, humans no longer existed in their jungle. There were only animals of all sorts.

These animals maintained their human memories and even personalities. However, none were sure what to make of this situation. At least they could all understand each other when they were "talking"...somehow.


Jill then roared a bit as she stretched and ran off to go find something to eat. However...
11233222.title: The necklace turns the town into a jungle and e...

choices: Steven possesses Jill and is stuck in her!
113.content:
Steven decided to change the boyfriend. Steven thought Jill wouldn't make out with him, if he was a girl (he knew Jill was heterosexual). So Steven turned him into a girl. An ugly one.

Jill stopped making out as this happened. Steven realized the necklace actually worked and enjoyed the power it gave him. Jill looked at Steven and said "Did you do this?"

It was too bad that Steven's mind was occupied with gender-changing thoughts. Jill saw the necklace glow and grabbed it off of him but it was too late and...
113.title: He should change the boyfriend!

choices: Go get the necklace fixed somewhere.
Let the world stay this way, at least a bit longer. And call "herself" Jake.
With the necklace broken, the world goes through more random changes.
1131.content:
The whole world went into a panic. Everyone had swapped genders. Men were women and women were men. Girls were boys and boys were girls. Total chaos ensued, from people not knowing what on Earth happened.

"Jill" had the necklace in "her" hand, after snatching it from "Steven". Now "she" was a tall, athletic, buff male jock (keyword: male) like all the boys she had used for sex before. Her hair colour and face were the same...but the cuteness was juxtaposed on a 185 pound body of muscle. And she was a guy.

"Jill" was pissed at "Steven". The former boyfriend"took note of this and ran just in case (though he was sort of lucky, since he was a boy and then a girl, he turned back to his original male form).

"Steven" was now basically just like Jill was when she was female. Except "he" had red hair for some reason and was a bit shorter. Still totally hot though.


The hotness didn't amount for much though when "Jill" started choking "Steven" with both hands. Dropping the necklace, her foot stomped on it by accident. Breaking it. And dooming humanity to reversed genders. Forever. Unless it could be fixed.

"Jill" looked at the broken necklace, somehow knowing it needed to be fixed, or the world would be stuck this way. "Steven" tried to make sense of the situation by saying in a feminine voice that sounded just like Jill's old one, "At least we can get the necklace fixed. Or maybe this could be fun?"

"Jill" grunted and punched "Steven", pissed off at "him". "Steven" shrugged it off and said, "Maybe I could be...Sally, and you could be Jake?" "Jill" was about to punch again, and then said in a deep masculine voice, "I'm going to get this necklace fixed and make everything right again. And then I'm gonna kill you. Got it?"

"Sally" gulped and said, "Got it, Jake." "Jill" was even more pissed as she left with the necklace's remains. She could get it fixed.

"Okay," Said Jill who now looked like a Stephen. "What's going on?"

"What do you mean?" Steven asked her, his voice an unnatural high tone.

"Why did we switch?" She asked, her voice deeply masculine. She leered over him, her face red with anger.

"I think it was the necklace. I found it in the dumpster and it changed us around." He told her truthfully, he thought it would be better to be honest.

"Come on." Jill didn't believe him.

"What else could it be then?" Steven proclaimed throwing his hands in the air.

"I guess so," Jill gave in. "So what now?" She asked. Steven thought she looked funny in a guys body, not at all as hot as she used to be.

"We need to get it fixed." Steven said.

"Okay, but where is going to fix a magic necklace, doofus?!" She asked. He began to wonder why he liked her with that stinky attitude.

"I know someone who sort of dabbles." Steven told her.

"Dabbles?" She pouted. It looked funny in a mouth full of stubble.

"Yeah, dabbles." Steven shot bac angry that she was mad at him!

"Can we trust him?" She asked.

"Her." Steven informed her.

"Fine then her." Jill stood hands on hips, a very feminine pose for a boy's body.

"I'm not sure."

And finally, it glowed once more; the adults (formerly children to teenagers) gained knowledge the normally would have learned growing up. To make things worse, reality itself shifted. As far as these new adults were concerned, they've always been the adults, and these "children" have always been children.

Steven and Jill began to argue until a very masculine and intimidating teenager appeared out of nowhere. Steven somehow recognized him. And was in awe.

The gruff-looking teenager said in his normal deep voice, "Hey, little sis, we gotta go home. I've been looking all over for you." Steven said meekly, "Why do I think you're...Rachel?"

"Rachel" responded, "Well, duh, because I'm Rachel, your big brother, of course." Steven replied in shock, "What?!?" Rachel replied, "Let's get going. You can't make goo-goo eyes with Jill all day. I have a football match to get to."


Steven thought "football"? Since when was Rachel into football? Steven decided to play a bit of a gambit with their names.

Steven said, "Isn't Rachel a bit of a...feminine name?" Rachel growled back, "It's one of the most manly names ever! It means "brave" or something...I think. Besides, "Steven", you couldn't ask for a prettier or cuter name. You know, Todd on the cheerleaders envies your name. Think I should ask her out? She is pretty hot..."

This was getting too weird for Steven.


Rachel picked Steven up and started walking home with him. Rachel said, "Look, Benjamin came over. I hope you don't mind. She brought those dolls you like. And those action figure you love of Batwoman, Superwoman and the rest of those cartoon girls." Steven thought, "This is so...bizarre. Nothing makes sense, yet it kind of does..."


Steven sighed, thinking he might as well give in. The necklace WAS broken. Then Jill ran up to them out of nowhere and said, "Steven! I found a store that sells weird necklaces! We could fix this! Maybe..."


Rachel looked at Jill and said to Steven, "He so wants you." Jill practicallly begged at Steven (Rachel believed this was Jill's way of showing his love, stupid kids, he thought).


Steven thought of two things:

One, he could jump out of Rachel's arms and follow Jill to the store with necklaces...but Rachel might follow them...

Two, he could just give in and learn to be "she" instead of "he" and go "home".


What does Steven do?
