"Wowza! Nice kiss, babe!" Link exclaims, the astonished tone in his voice implying that he's never gotten a kiss from a girl before. Judging by his interactions with women in the cartoon, it's not really hard to see why. But he is saving lives so he does deserve it, right?

However...
1212311122222211.title: He's a good guy!

12123111222222111.content:
A security alarm starts blaring and many armored guards march in the dungeon hallways, blocking off the entrance for cartoon Link, Rachel and the other prisoners.

"Stand back, ladies! I'll handle these goons!" Link winks as he charges them. Some of the girls couldn't help but cringe and chuckle at his rather goofy statement.

As they watched, they could finally be exposed to this offbeat incarnation of their favorite fictional hero. Unlike the somewhat violent hack-n-slashing of the game Link, this Link resorted to more tame tactics as shooting the guards with lasers from his sword and trickery like getting guards to attack each other by accident. A few of the girls were already on verge of forming a second opinion of him but most were still not impressed.

Rachel, however, seemed rather out of it as she gazed rather strangely as cartoon Link fought the minions. Could the kiss have caused this?

Anyway, Link easily defeats them, all unconscious but still breathing.

"Come on, girls! Let's get moving!" He yells, leading the young women out of the dungeons.

What force will they encounter next?
12123111222222111.title: The alarm sounds and guards appear.

choices: Ganon, who is promptly re-imprisoned in a book, and the group can escape.
Link himself, and who knows what might happen!
121231112222221111.content:
As they believed themselves to soon escape from this terrible place, both Link and the girls behind him were suddenly stopped as a black cloud appeared in front of them. This cloud condensed into a rough shape of a man, before forming into none other...

...than Ganon, the evil master of the Zelda series. But this was not Ganon or Ganondorf as most people knew him by. No, this was none other than the Ganon of the terrible Phillips CD-i games, and the only equally bad thing to the Zelda cartoon. While the Link they were following was rather comedic, this version of Ganon was just as weird in his dialogue and other such things.

Seemingly pulling himself taller, Ganon spoke, "Join me Link, and I will make your face the greatest in Koridai, or else you will DIE!"

Link seemed a bit off put by this but immediately began jumping around and using similar tactics from just a moment ago, and even deflected a couple of attacks back to Ganon. But all in the room could tell that without some other thing to help him, Link was going to lose.

Unsure of what to do, Rachel began looking around for something to help out their 'hero'. As she did so, she saw none other than the Wand of Gamelon, in which Zelda herself had been the main character, not Link. But Rachel wasn't really familiar with either game, and didn't know what to do with this magical stick she held. Pointing it at someone, a magical blast came forth from the wand, and struck the person she aimed at. Who did she aim at?
121231112222221111.title: "You dare bring light to my lair?! You must die!"

1212311122222211111.content:
"Arghh! The chains! Noooo!!!" Ganon screams as golden chains magically appear and wrap themselves around him "YOU HAVEN'T SEEN THE LAST OF ME!!!"

A book labeled "The Book of Koridai" then appears out of nowhere and sucks Ganon inside it, closing up completely.

"That was surprisingly easy..." Rachel sighed in relief.

"Well done, Link!" Rachel yelps and backs away as this mysterious voice booming from behind her came from a strange-looking wizard in magenta-colored robes and turban and riding on an orange flying carpet.

"Ganon is once imprisoned! Come!"

Soon, everything comes to a complete pause as the wizard then looks at the cartoon Link peculiarly. Link, Rachel and the other girls were confused entirely about all that was happening. Luckily, everyone settles down and discuss that had been going on. The wizard was named Gwonam and he supposely sent another incarnation of Link to stop Ganon from taking over the island of Koridai.

"It is written: only Link can defeat Ganon" he explains, much to the bewilderment and amusement of Rachel and the other girls.

What does Gwonam do next?
1212311122222211111.title: Ganon, who is promptly re-imprisoned in a book,...

12123111222222111111.content:
"Squadalah! We're off!" Gwonam chants as he carries Link, Rachel and the other girls on his magic carpet. As for how that is possible, keep in mind that he's a wizard and uses magic. Magic is always a good excuse for shoddy writing, am I right?! Putting narrated rambling aside, he takes everyone back to Hyrule.

There...

"MAH BOI! OH BOY! DINNER! DODONGO! SHIP! OCTOROK!"

"Really...? This is Hyrule...?" One girl said, twitching her eyes.

Yep, they watched with much confusion and disgust as the CD-i Link and the King of Hyrule, named King Harkinian or more commonly the King, just sit and utter out their infamous catchphrases.

"Your majesty, Ganon and his minions have seized the island of Koridai" Gwonam announced.

"..what? Didn't we just trap him in some magic book?!" Rachel protests.

"Hmm...can we help?" the King asks "Wii wii wii wii wii wii wii wii..."

"He's like a broken record..." Cartoon Link comments.

"It is written, only Link can defeat Ganon" Gwonam explains, reading over a scroll.

"Sounds like a great prophecy to me!" Rachel chuckles nervously.

"Great, I'll grab my stuff!" CD-i Link gleefully responds, pumping his fist.

"Must resist the urge to comment on that line..." One girl groaned.

"There is no time, your sword is enough" Gwonam continued.

"What about his shield? It's not important?" Rachel asks.

Ok, this isn't really going anywhere aside from being a poor MST3K-esque riff. What should happen next?
12123111222222111111.title: Takes everyone back to Hyrule

12123111222222112.content:
So they broke out of the dungeons and start rushing out in the hallways all the while watching as Cartoon Link killed off any guards, monsters and other obstacles that stood in their way.

"Wow, he's not as bad as I thought all these years" Rachel thought, watching as he heroically fought evil to protect all the girls "Not to mention he's a pretty good kisser..."

Some of the girls also started to warm up to him as well but others were still not impressed. But as all this ensued, a strange figure soon peeks straight out of a wall nearby and to stand up in front of the gang. He was a ghostly floating creature with a burlap sack for a head.

"Who's this dweeb?" The cartoon Link asked.

A sign then randomly appeared with the words "Candlejack" written on it. "Candlejack?" Rachel said. A scene transition quickly flashes by and next thing everyone knew, Rachel was tied up right next to the ghostly villain.

"Tied up again?!" Rachel groaned.

"Oh no, Link, save us from that Candlejack!" Some of the hostage girls squealed.

"Looks like I'm going to need more rope." Candlejack chuckled.

Next thing we knew, these same girls were also tied up alongside Rachel.

"What is going on?!" Cartoon Link asked "Don't worry, girls, I'll save you from..."

"DON'T SAY HIS NAME, MORON!!!" They all shouted.

Suddenly, Candlejack started floating away along with the tied up girls who, for some reason, were also floating. Link tries to follow along b-
12123111222222112.title: They prepare to make a clean getaway.

121231112222221121.content:
Candlejack was floating away fast but Link and the other girls chased behind him. Link tries to attack him with his sword but as he is a ghost, this does nothing in the process. In the end, Link just got too frustrated.

"Time to get away" Candlejack said.

"CAN'T LET YOU DO THAT, CANDLEJACK" Link shouted.

The girls' eyes turn blank in shock. He actually said it! They couldn't believe it.

"Why did you said Candlejack, you idiot?!" The other girls said, then covered their mouths realizing they said it.

"I'm going to need many more ropes." Candlejack laughed.

Later on, we cut to the laboratory down within the mysterious fortress. Link, Rachel and all of the other ladies were tied up and locked in a cage.

"Nice going, hero..." Rachel sighed.

"Hey, EXCUSE M-OOOHHH!" Link says, but is interrupted by a kick in the jewels.

"What's going to happen to us?" One of the other girls worriedly said.

"I'm so scared..." Another one cried.

What happens next?
121231112222221121.title: He says Candlejack's n-

1212311122222211211.content:
"Luckily, that bag of hot air didn't tie my ropes tight enough..." Link laughs, easily breaking free.

"Ok, untie us next then!" Rachel exclaims.

"Hold it..." Link said "Cand-I mean that ghost may use his ghostly powers on us if we waste too much time!"

"What kind of powers does he have aside from instantly abducting anyone who says his name?" One girl comments.

"I...don't know" Link admits "But better safe than sorry!"

Link cuts through the cage bars with his Master Sword and breaks everyone free. Candlejack flies onto the scene and gasps.

"Well done, Link!" Candlejack laughs "But you are late for I HAVE THE POWER!"

"No, Jack!" Link exclaims "THE POWER IS MINE!"

Meanwhile back at Steven and Rachel's house...

"The necklace is glowing" Steven said "I wonder what's going on..."

"WHAT THE CRAP?!?" Rachel and most of the girls asked.

Link has turned into a scantily clad muscle man with blond hair and a sword and Candlejack turned into a silver-textured man with a green mullet and red and green details.

"Looks like the cartoon convention has come into town!" A girl sighs and faints.

"IT'S TIME TO RAIN ON YOUR PARADE!" Neo-Candlejack yells.

"YOU'RE CHEWING ON MORE YOU CAN HANDLE" Neo-Cartoon Link yells.

The two charge at each other and...need I say it? All hell breaks loose! They start beat the living hell out of each other up as Rachel and other lady hostages took cover.
1212311122222211211.title: Link breaks free

choices: Rachel suddenly wishes for all the anime in the world.
Benjamin starts yelling through the phone.
12123112.content:
Even though she could legally drive a car or get a job or do things that 16-year old girls normally do, Rachel couldn't break away from her anime obsession. Steven just watched as she placed a Naruto DVD inside the DVD player and started watching from the comfort of the family couch.

All Steven could do was scratch his head in disbelief. He was about to walk away when...
12123112.title: Stay in and watch anime.

121231121.content:
As he was preparing to walk out of the room, Steven couldn't help but hear Rachel talking to herself. He walked up to her, overhearing her say something about anime.

"I wish for all the anime in the world. DVDs, merchandise, video games, dubs, subs, everything!"

He gasps as the necklace reacts to this wish, glowing very bright. Rachel turns around and also has a shocked look on her face. Magically appearing out of nowhere were thousands of anime DVDs along with merchandise like plush toys, apparel and posters and video games.

Soon the entire room was piled up and crowded by anime stuff. He shuffled through the numerous DVD cases and soon realized that they had just about every anime to have come out of Japan.

So what do they do?
121231121.title: Rachel suddenly wishes for all the anime in the...

1212311211.content:
So much anime yet so little time.

Yet Steven and Rachel's curiosity was boundless. With this many hours of animated entertainment within our possession, they just had to took a look. So Rachel placed in a DVD in the DVD player while Steven was watching one on the computer.

Rachel was watching Sailor Moon, the early 90s girls' anime about a team of superheroines who wore skimpy miniskirts and fought to save the world. "Of course she would be watching something like that." Steven thought to himself.

He however was watching One Piece, a fairly newer anime about a group of pirates who are attempting to find the world's greatest adventure and become the king of pirates. He only watched a handful of episodes so far and was getting hooked.

These series proved to be their favorites so far though they watched some series earlier they enjoyed.

What now?
1212311211.title: Watch them all!

12123112111.content:
There was still thousands more anime to take a gander at, but the two siblings decide to watch a show together as looking at them alone proved to be rather boring.

So they decide to dig through the piles of anime DVDs, searching for a really good anime series to enjoy together. A lot of them seemed rather unoriginal and not too interesting. There still had to be something that stood well out of the norm.

What did they find?
12123112111.title: They keep watching more.

choices: Steven and Rachel are brought into the Avatar world.
Zuko appears inside the living room.
121231121112.content:
Steven pulls out a DVD of the Nickelodeon TV show "Avatar: The Last Airbender" to which he felt dubious about.

"Is this...anime?" he asked Rachel.

"Pffft, that's just some stupid American cartoon trying to rip-off anime" she scoffs "it can't be that good..."

"I dunno, it looks kinda interesting" Steven said, despite Rachel's opinion "let's just watch a few episodes."

"Fine..." Rachel groans.

And so they did and surprisingly, they got hooked into it as easily as with an anime. It took a typical "chosen one has to save the world" archetype and turned into a fun, engaging and well-crafted story with enjoyable characters. But the two siblings had their personal favorites about the show...

"The ability to manipulate the elements is so cool..." Steven said "it'd be cool to live in a world like that."

"Man, that guy with the scar is hot!" Rachel exclaimed, referring to the character of Zuko. "What I wouldn't give to have him for a boyfriend!"

Of course, the necklace decides to take advantage of this and...
121231121112.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender (???)

choices: They have been changed, Steven was now Sokka and Rachel was Katara
They haven't changed, only their clothing has changed
1212311211121.content:
A large portal opened in front of the TV and Steven and Rachel were sucked in.

Will they change into Avatar characters or not?
1212311211121.title: Steven and Rachel are brought into the Avatar w...

choices: Have some fun in the village
12123112111211.content:
When they awakened they noticed something strange... "What the hell? Our skin is darker..'', Rachel said. They then looked at each other ....''Oh my god, where are Sokka and Katara''.

They were at the Watertribe village. They were even at the beginning of the series. ''This is awesome and I am still wearing the necklace so maybe I can also change things in this world, maybe I can make myself the Avatar now or something else'', Steven said.

"Yeah that could be fun'', Rachel replied.

What will they do now?
12123112111211.title: They have been changed, Steven was now Sokka an...

121231121112111.content:
"The only inhabitants of the village were children and old people", Rachel said. Steven then said, "This could be interesting, lets see what happens if I do this..."

Steven wished that everybody in the village, not including them, would change into little girls. Then the necklace started to glow.

A flash of light blinded them and when they opened there eyes... Where every villager once stood was now a little girl.

"It worked... maybe we should return everything back to normal or maybe we should change ourselves", Steven said.
121231121112111.title: Have some fun in the village

1212311211121112.content: What will they change into?
1212311211121112.title: Change themselves

12123112111212.content: Is it Fire Nation clothing or Water Tribe clothing?
12123112111212.title: They haven't changed, only their clothing h...

1212311211122.content:
Of course, the necklace responds to the siblings' wishes but only Rachel's for some reason. A weird flash illuminated and this flash created a portal, pushing Zuko right out of it.

"I must capture the Avatar and restore my honor and place on the thr-wait where am I?" He said until finally noticing that he wasn't home anymore.

Rachel instantly bursts into happiness as her new animated crush was now inside her living room. Zuko was puzzled as to what was going on while Steven sat on the couch with a look of disgust on his face.

"Oh my god, oh my god, he's here!" she exclaims, kissing Steven on the cheek "Thank you, big brother!"

"That's nice and all, but what about my wish you dumb necklace?" he mutters to himself.

"No wait! I must capture the Avatar....!" Zuko yells as Rachel grabs him by his arm and drags him upstairs to her room. Only God knew of what she was planning to do with the poor soul.

"Silly fangirls..." Steven scoffs.

So who should the main focus be on now?
1212311211122.title: Zuko appears inside the living room.

choices: Finds another use for the necklace
12123112111221.content:
Unfortunately for Steven, taking Zuko out of his respective world meant disabling the Avatar world altogether as the DVDs froze up entirely. Even reruns on TV, episodes streamed online and other merchandise couldn't be accessed.

"Well, isn't this precious?" Steven sighs.

He gets off the recliner and curiously starts walking up into Rachel's room. But he wasn't prepared for what he was about to see...

As he stepped in, his eyes popped out in shock.

Rachel and Zuko were in bed but not in the way that he previously imagined. Zuko was handcuffed to the bed with Rachel over him. He had red kiss marks all over his face and naked torso. The nipples on his chest were swelled up due to numerous finger strokes. The burnt scar on his left eye had make-up on it as if Rachel was trying to paint over it. Rachel, thankfully, still had her clothes on though she was wearing lipstick, something she didn't normally do.

"Um...did you want something?" Rachel smiled.

"Not anymore..." Steven groaned, shaking his head in disgust.

"Help m-!" Zuko cries, but is interrupted as Rachel stuffs a sock in his mouth and looks back at Steven smiling nervously.

"...kay" Steven concluded as he walked out of the room and muttered to himself "A fangirl's wet dream come true..."

So now, he...
12123112111221.title: Steven.

choices: He opens his eyes to discover what he is watching
The necklace brings out a female character from the aforementioned anime
121231121112212.content:
Watching more of Avatar was out of the question for now, so Steven was forced to go check out another anime.

He continued to dig through the piles of DVDs scattered around the living room. An idea soon pops up in his mind that would keep him from getting bored.

Instead of checking out the anime that were pretty mainstream (having been shown on TV and has widespread recognition), he decided to check out the more obscure titles that were around, shows that had a small but respectable fandom.

He closes his eyes and chooses from a stack of discs. From there, he places the disc inside the tray of his DVD player and closes it. The player reads the DVD and starts playing it.

What happens next?
121231121112212.title: Watches more anime

choices: Decides to take "cute" Steven "home" (essentially, she kidnaps him).
Goes insane and starts attempting to kill everything...including Steven.
1212311211122121.content:
Unfortunatley for Steven, he put in a DVD of Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni. If you've ever watched that show, you know it can be described fairly easily..."Kill Them All". It seems like a show of a guy luckily surrounded by girls, but then it turns out that a dark secret in their town drives people insane. And then the girls go insane and kill all the characters (if the "curse" of the town doesn't kill them), including the boy. Or the boy goes insane and kills them. In any case, everyone dies.

Steven watches and hopes nothing crazy happens because of the necklace. Then something crazy happened.

Rena Ryuugu pops out of the television screen. Steven is taken aback a bit, but happily observes Rena's cute schoolgirl outfit, pretty face and...her CLEAVER?!?!?


Steven is slightly scared, but remembers Rena likes cute things a lot. So, maybe, she'll just talk about cute things. Then again she often steals "cute" things...including people. Basically, she runs away with them...which could be considered kidnapping (though she calls it taking people "home"). Or, she could just go berserk and try to kill Steven.

With Steven panicking, Rena:
1212311211122121.title: He opens his eyes to discover what he is watching

choices: A forest full of wild Pokemon
12123112111221211.content:
Rena gushed over how cute Steven was. Her eyes widened with a mixture of lust and kindness, with a hint of greed. She had to take him home!

Rena then somehow picked up Steven with a sudden burst of strength and ran with him. She went running for hours with him as Steven screamed to be let go.

However, when Steven did so, Rena would look at him with cold steel eyes. Looks that could kill. Rena twirled her cleaver as she came to a slow stop, right outside her "home". She entered her home with Steven, and the "home" was --
12123112111221211.title: Decides to take "cute" Steven "home...

choices: Kyoko (a schoolgirl who can breathe fire)
1212311211122122.content:
The necklace, however, wasn't pleased with Steven's recent decision as it didn't require any exploitation whatsoever of it. As the chosen anime played on the TV, the necklace comes up with an idea of its own.

The show was currently displaying a female character close-up on-screen so with impeccable timing, so the necklace zaps the TV and causes a surge to come through which creates a large portal.

Steven quickly opens his eyes and falls over his sofa. He was thinking of other things that he was confused about what was happening.

Coming through the portal was a young girl with black hair. Who was she?
1212311211122122.title: The necklace brings out a female character from...

12123112111221221.content:
Poor Steven was dazed but he couldn't catch a break as this mysterious black-haired girl pounced on him all of a sudden.

"Are you okay, handsome?" she asks, her cheeks completely red.

"I was until you sat your butt on my stomach..." Steven groaned.

"I'm sorry, this will make you feel better" she said, now puckering up her lips.

"Huh?" Steven opens his eyes to see the girl leaning her head down to kiss him "W-wait a minute!"

It was too late as the girl couldn't catch word of his protests. Steven quickly grabs a pillow and covers himself with it. Therefore, the girl only ends up kissing the pillow.

"Mmmmmm...huh?" she moaned passionately until she realized what she was actually kissing "Yuck! I was trying to help you!"

"Thanks but no thanks..." Steven sighed, now getting up "Who are you?"'

"Um...I forgot..." she said, laughing nervously.

Steven was then about to check the DVD of the anime from where the girl came from but the surge had totaled the DVD player as well as the TV.

What should he do now?
12123112111221221.title: Kyoko (a schoolgirl who can breathe fire)

121231121112212211.content:
"I'm getting bored..." Steven said "I guess I'll go out to town for now"

"Great! It'll be like a date!" Kyoko says, grabbing onto Steven's arm "Boyfriend and girlfriend! Heehee!"

"Sure...why not?" Steven sighs.

Kyoko looked and dressed normally enough in her dark blue schoolgirl uniform and green skirt, though her big, cartoon eyes would be more than off-putting in the real world. Steven decides to fix the solution by giving her a pair of large sunglasses to wear in the public.

"Wow, these are so cute!" she laughs, jumping up and down "Thank you, Mr. Steve!"

So the couple leave out of the house for a while. Kyoko continued to hug onto Steven's arm as the two enter into an area where they see...
121231121112212211.title: Continue on as normal

1212311211122122111.content:
The two head down to the local theater to...see a movie, of course! Getting their tickets (after some disagreements over the films they planned to see), they move over to the concession stands.

Unlike a lot of movie theaters, this particular one sold popsicles, much to Kyoko's pleasure.

"Yay, I can't wait to see this movie" Kyoko said, giving Steven a tight hug.

"Ugh...leggo!" Steven sighs.

But the necklace was scheming as usual. Whichever film they were seeing, it had an idea to twist it into the real world. Which movie was it?
1212311211122122111.title: A movie

12123112111221221112.content:
Even though The Dark Knight was not in theatres at this time, usually, it was on in this theatre. Why? Because it was. There's no other reason, really.

So, Steven and Kyoko went into the theatre, and watched the film. Kyoko kept talking throughout the movie, amazed at the action scenes (and talked about them). Kyoko also seemed to enjoy Batman, Joker and Two-Face quite a lot (though she cried at Harvey's fate when he became Two-Face).

Steven and Kyoko walked out of the theatre after the film finished. However, outside awaited:
12123112111221221112.title: The Dark Knight

choices: In a warehouse full of deathtraps.
121231121112212211121.content:
The Joker was outside in the parking lot, amidst many grinning bodies (almost everyone who was in the theatre). They seemed to have laughing gas induced grins, meaning though the Joker looked like The Dark Knight version, he had laughing gas and other deadly toys. He also seemed to have a lot of knives...

Steven figured they should run for it, but Kyoko wanted to fight. The two argued, unaware of the Joker creeping up behind them and laughing gassing them.

The two laughed immensely, with their cackling being heard throughout the vicinity, until they fell over with giant smiles on their face. Fortunatley, the Joker had used the non-lethal variant on them. He planned to bring them and the hundreds of other laughing gassed victims (who had the non-lethal strain in them) to a place. A place where he would let them have the antidote, only to wake up to a horrible trap. A deadly surprise.

He grabbed the necklace, knowing about it's crazy powers from reading Writing.com. He then let Steven, Kyoko and the others wake up:
121231121112212211121.title: The Joker.

choices: They accidentally bump into a bunch of supervillains.
The necklace goes off, and they become supervillains themselves.
1212311211122122111211.content:
Everyone woke up, groggy and disoriented. The Joker's laughter could be heard echoing through the halls. They opened their eyes to see themselves locked up, behind bars. They were trapped in cells, caught in straitjackets and had crappy cafeteria food beside them.

Steven and Kyoko attempted to escape, but a breakout then occured. Mr. Freeze froze the entire hall, except for the prisoners. Frozen guards wanted to scream but couldn't. They were forever encased in ice.

Scarecrow starting spreading fear gas through the vents.

Poison Ivy seduced and brainwashed the doctors.

Killer Croc burst down the walls containing them.

For some cruel reason, the necklace wasn't working. They couldn't just wish themselves out. They were in trouble...though the necklace was secretely preparing a "surprise"...

Kyoko managed to burn open a door. Steven said, "These villains are crazy!" Kyoko replied, "I'm glad I'm not aroundp people like them all the time...you'd have to be like them to live near them!"

Steven and Kyoko snuck off and...
1212311211122122111211.title: In Arkham Asylum.

choices: Kyoko challenges them to a cheerleading session
1212311211122122112.content:
The two make it to the city park where they see Jill and her cheerleading squad practicing in the fields. Steven literally chokes as he urges Kyoko to move along.

"Hey, do you know them?" Kyoko asks, pointing straight at them.

"No! Not at all!" Steven said, pushing her away from the scene, "Let's keep moving!"

Too late as Jill already spots the two. Being a normally friendly girl, she approaches the couple to greet them.

"Hey there" she said "Aren't you...Jeff...Tom...uh?"

"Steven" he sighs, ashamed that his crush couldn't even remember his name.

"Yeah, yeah" she quickly said, now turning attention over to Kyoko "Is this your girlfriend?"

"Well, that is to say-" he begins, but is quickly interrupted as Kyoko gives him a tight hug on the neck "Ooh!"

"It was love at first sight for me and Steven!" Kyoko smiled, hugging him even tighter "He's just so shy but deep down, he loves me as well!'

"Fffffff...! Can't...breathe!" Steven groans.

"He'll confess his love and we'll get married!" she continues, squeezing him even more "Just wait and see!"

"You love him so much you're suffocating him..." one of the cheerleaders comments.

"Oh god!" she gasps, realizing what she's doing and lets go of Steven as he falls down "Steven, are you okay?"

"...Medic" he mutters.

Jill and the other cheerleaders simply laugh as the couple's embarrassment. Kyoko's face was literally red as she looked down at poor Steven.

"Well, good luck with that" Jill chuckles as the girls go back to whatever it was they were doing before when...
1212311211122122112.title: Jill and other cheerleaders practicing

12123112111221221121.content:
Right now, the sun was only starting to set.

Kyoko had struggling to drag the now unconscious Steven back to his house. However, she had no idea where it was located at and she was already growing fatigued. So she stops right near a bench where she places Steven down on and sits down herself.

"I want you to love me" she said, watching up in the sky as the sun gradually disappeared "You probably already think I'm annoying and embarrassing and now that I come to think about it, I can't really blame you"

"Ggggg..." Steven gurgled as foam started bursting out of his mouth.

"Heh..." Kyoko giggles "I also want to remember who I am, my memory has been so bad lately...oh well, I'm long as I'm with you, I'm not really bothered"

She then moves over to Steven and gives a nice, warm kiss on the lips. Coincidentally, the necklace was still with Steven and typically, it had ideas for the next outcome for this situation. What would it be?
12123112111221221121.title: The two leave

choices: Jill appears and is in love with Steven now.
Kyoko now has a necklace...and things get even crazier now.
121231121112212211211.content:
After that wonderful kiss, Steven couldn't fight his feelings (or the feelings the necklace created for him) anymore. Steven embraces Kyoko and whispers to her, "I'm not bothered by you anymore, I finally realize...I love you more than anything." Kyoko blushes and says, "So is this the beginning of Steven and Kyoko? Not just lonely Kyoko dragging Steven around?" Steven nods and the two being to kiss passionatley.

Unfortunatley, Kyoko accidentally releases a bit of fire and nearly burns Steven, ending their intimate moment.

Kyoko then said, "Sorry for the fire...but...umm...I'm not really sure what happens next. This whole adventure has been pretty random. I kind of just do things. In fact, I'm not even sure why I'm saying all this." Steven replied, "No matter what happens, I'm sure we can handle it."

choices: "I'd prefer to remain away from any other necklaces..."
12123112111221221121111211.content:
Kyoko decided to trust this mysterious woman, though she wasn't sure why. Did her necklace make her do this? "Umm...why do you have a necklace?" Kyoko could not believe she just said that.

"I found the original necklace, a year back."

"That's the first one?"

"Yes, and I've had it for quite some time. Let me tell you a story..."

"...Okay..."

"A year ago, I was relatively, as you would say "normal". That all changed when I found this necklace...at first, I enjoyed it's power...but then it started making things happen that I didn't want."

"Then why are you still wearing it?"

"Because I have to. After using it for too long, it literally bonded itself to me. I can never take it off, nor can it come off for any means. I wasn't sure why it chose me, but inevitably, I found myself using it's power for sheer chaos. Every random event in the world is now dictated by me or another necklace."

"...Okay...again..."

"I am telling the absolute truth. With the necklace's power under control, I am in effect, a goddess. But I don't want to be. Me and the necklace have almost become one, after a year of owning it. When I sleep, it makes me create more necklaces, and I scatter them all over the world, causing panic for it's own pleasure. At first, I hated it, but as the necklace and me have...bonded...I feel myself becoming a new person, one with the necklace. I am starting to love the insanity it, I can bring. And soon, I fear I will be a hollow shell of my former self, nothing but a bringer of mayhem. And I fear I will love it."

"Can't you just wish the necklace off?"

"No...it is far too late, I love it too dearly to ever part with it, though that would be the only way to remove it from me."

"Why are you telling me all this?"

"Because I am barely maintaining a fragment of my normal self...in anywhere from an hour to a day, I believe I will finally succumb to the necklace. Though selfish, seeing you...I want someone, unaffected by this tainted object, to remember there was once an innocent girl named Sylvia."

"I'll remember..."

"Thank you. I sense you were troubled by a necklace yourself."

"Yeah...there's this guy I like...and this girl he likes...wait! Maybe if you're still you, you can do one last good thing. Can you help me get Mr. Stevey back? Please..."

She shrieks once again and that somehow is powerful and intimidating enough to instantly scare the zombie horde far away. Steven, Zuko and Kyoko are relieved to be safe from becoming undead personnel.

"Rachel!" Steven runs over to her and is about to hug her but then realizes that's probably not a good idea "Well, it's good to see you're still on our side..."

Rachel, now incapable of speech, simply grunts.

"But you do realize though that they still have the necklace, right?" Zuko retorts.

"Yep...and we have to give chase!" Steven sighed, signaling Rachel to follow behind him.

"Don't worry, Mr. Stevey, you still have me!" Kyoko says, winking and smiling as she grabs Steven's arm.

"Yeah well thanks, I guess... Steven groans.
1212311211122122121112211.title: Zombie Rachel comes back...and she's good!

12123112111221221211122112.content:
"Mr. Stevey..." Kyoko sighed, holding onto Steven's waist as they crossed the barren wasteland that was the Earth "It's so lonely out here..."

"I noticed that" Steven responds "There has to be more people who aren't zombies"

So with finding the necklace still remaining their main goal, the fearsome foursome set out on a new side-quest to find inhabitants who were fortunate enough to elude from the zombie pandemic. With Rachel the zombie on their side, there was no way they could fail!

...Later...

"We've searched cities, escaped from zombie ambushes and suffered endless amounts of minor casualties and still failed to find human life!" Steven groaned.

"Hmm...perhaps we should rethink our strategy..." Zuko contributed.

"Mmm?" Rachel grunted, looking in an opposite direction.

"Ms. Rachel, do you see something?" Kyoko asked.

Rachel grunts again in agreement and immediately takes off, signaling the others to follow her. Just whatever did she come across? As they moved on, they soon encounter a shadowy figure rushing away as Rachel caught up.

"Is it me or is your sister pretty fast for a zombie, Mr. Stevey?" Kyoko comments.

"Yeah....maybe its the necklace's doing" Steven adds.

The mysterious figure trips and falls as the gang surrounded him/her.

"Don't worry, we won't hurt you..." Steven explained "Just reveal who you are..."

The figure just trembled in fear then...
12123112111221221211122112.title: Find more survivors!

choices: Haruhi's friends start to become zombies...
Haruhi and Steven have to team up against zombies for some reason
121231121112212212111221121.content:
Haruhi Suzumiya revealed herself, removing any traces of fear from her pose. Steven's heart raced seeing such a beautiful person, but then he realized that was Haruhi, as in Haruhi, possibly GOD. At least according to the fictional series she was from. She was capable of rewriting reality, history, anything!

But was it fictional? After all, she was right here and --

"Listen up, fellow zombie survivors! This is not a drill! We have to find the ring that can reverse all of this!"

Steven rolled his eyes. Doesn't she know they were looking for a necklace?

All of a sudden, a ring fell out of the sky. Haruhi then said, "We found it! Good job everyone!"

At that moment, the ring was grabbed by a fast zombie. Haruhi decided she needed to catch the zombie. She pulled a chainsaw out of thin air and ran after it. Steven shrugged his shoulders as everyone followed her, since they thought the ring might lead them to the necklace.

Haruhi's friends; Kyon, a sarcastic nice guy, Mikuru, a moe beautiful time traveller, Itsuki, an always agreeing with Haruhi psychic and Yuki, a reality warping cute robot that looked human, came running after Haruhi as well. Steven wondered where they came from...

However,
121231121112212212111221121.title: Haruhi Suzumiya, Zombie Slayer

121231121112212212112.content:
With a week passed since the deadly nuclear bombing that caused a worldwide catastrophe, the world struggled to recover. Remaining water and food supplies had been confiscated by government officials and many were forced to do extensive manual labor only to get a small meal and water. As for everyone else, they were already left to die of starvation and from dehydration. But this brand new storyline isn't necessarily about this issues. No...

Out in the middle of nowhere, we cut to a young man of only 18 years. Surprisingly for this new world, he came well-equipped donning a backpack containing plenty of food and water. Complimented by a fedora and traveler's outfit, he walked the rigid, torn down earths searching only for one thing: the necklace. Yeah, he knew about the cause of this crisis. How? Well, we'll just have to join him on the mission to fi-

"MICAH!!!"

"Felicity, I told you before..." Micah sighed, stopping and waiting for his 17 year old girlfriend to catch up "If you're going to join me on this quest, you'll have to keep up instead of hobbling around."

"Sorry, sorry..." Felicity groaned, trying hard to keep her miniskirt down as the wind blew towards her direction. "This is so tiresome...are you sure this magic necklace is real anyway?"

"Do you even bother to listen to me?? I've been tracking this thing for months even before the crisis happened..." Micah explained " I built a device to do so and right now we'll be getting close to getting it and once we have it, we'll be able to revive the Earth."

"Oh..." Felicity simply responded. "I'm hungry..."

"We just ate a meal earlier" Micah said "We need to preserve our rations or else we'll starve before we can even reach the necklace..."

"Pleeeeeeeeeeeease??" Felicity implored, displayed the best puppy dog eyes impression she could.

"Damn it...fine..." Micah groans as Felicity cheered. Felicity was the perfect would-be female companion - she had perfect breasts, an adorable face and green hair (???) but she was childish, slow and had a voracious appetite. Still, Micah tolerated her in the end somehow.

The couple was prepared to eat when...
121231121112212212112.title: Dead...all dead... (Another storyline?)

1212311211122122121122.content:
Felicity was eager to indulge into some delectable foods when she is quickly halted by a beep.

"Bingo!" Micah chuckles, taking out his necklace tracking device "The device picked up a possible location for the necklace, let's get moving!"

"But we haven't even started eating yet!" Felicity protests.

"Look, just have a sandwich or something" Micah said, quickly repacking the food "If we lose this signal, God knows how long it will be until we find it again!"

"W-wait, don't leave me!" Felicity yells as Micah rushes off "This is totally not cool..."'

So the two continued on, traveling the arid, deserted regions as they progressed on. Micah could keep an easy mind while Felicity was growing more and more exasperated due to the extreme heat and her growing fatigue.

"Aaaaaaaaaahhhhhhh..." She groaned. "So hot..."

"Felicity, look!" Micah said "This should be it..."

"Really?!" Felicity yelled, rushing up to him "Where are we anyway?"
1212311211122122121122.title: The necklace tracking device beeps

12123112111221222.content:
"Invisibility jutsu!"

After a few minutes, Steven recovered from the incident and looks around the living room. The TV and the DVD player were destroyed as a result of the surge. Other than that, nothing really seemed out of place.

"...my TV and DVD player! All ruined!" he cried "Who the hell did this?!"

As he pondered on, he could hear some loud snoring. It was coming from on his very own sofa. He gazes below and sees her - a young girl with very long hair wrapped in a ponytail with large red pearls in a pink kimoni-like top and skirt, long dark purple fingerless gloves and stockings as well as sandals. She was cute, Steven thought, but he also believed that she may been responsible.

What does he de to her?
12123112111221222.title: Shinobu (a "ninja")

121231121112212222.content:
He grabs the girl by her arms and starts dragging her off the sofa. She was pretty light-weighted so moving her wasn't a problem for Steven. He brings her down into the basement of his house and sits her down on a chair.

Grabbing a bundle of durable rope, he tied her up good and strictly, even going down to her arms, which he tied behind her back, and toes. For the finishing touches, he stuffs her mouth with one of his filthy socks and seals it off with numerous strips of duct tape.

"Now to wait for her to wake up" Steven thought.

What happens next?
121231121112212222.title: Capture and interrogate her

1212311211122122221.content:
So the girl eventually wakes up...but not to anything pleasant.

"Hmm...MMMM!!!!" she moaned, apparently having tasted Steven's smelly sock.

Steven just chuckles at her misfortune but stops and says, "Wait a minute...you can't really be interogated if you're gagged, can you?"

He removes the tape from her mouth as she spits out the sock.

"Thank you..." she sighed in relef, now coughing and then looks up "Wait, you could see through my invisibility jutsu?"

"...what?" Steven asked, raising an eyebrow "Alright, enough of your gawking! Who are you?!"

"Oh yeah, silly me! My name is Shinobu and I'm a ninja-in-training!" she giggles "But...why am I tied to a chair?"

"Because you destroyed my TV and DVD player" Steven growled "And you're going to be punished for it!"

"No! I can't be punished...yet!" she gasps, starting to panic "I still have to carry out an important mission!"

"A mission?" he asked.

"Yeah, my great ninja master has assigned me to take on a dangerous assignment!" she explained.

"What is it?" Steven asked, now intrigued and having forgotten a little about his revenge "Is it beating up monsters? Doing espionage in organizations or castles?! Fighting in wars?!"

"No, not any of those" she continues "It's...it's..."

"Yeah?"

Now blushing a little, she reveals "Raiding panty drawers!"

"..." Steven paused with blood coming out of his nose "AWESOME!!!!"

So what does he do?
1212311211122122221.title: She wakes up

12123112111221222211.content:
Instantly signing onto the young ninja girl's scheme, Steven frees her and the two began plotting to raid Rachel's panties. So the two employ stealth tactics as they venture into her bedroom...very quietly.

"Shh..." Steven shushed.

"Hee hee..." Shinobu simply giggles.

Slowly opening the door, Steven darts his attention over to Rachel herself, who was in bed with blankets covered over her and Zuko most likely under them as well.

"Ok, I don't want to think about what those two are doing right now..." Steven thinks.

Shinobu opens the drawer and sees many of Rachel's undergarments. "Wow..." Shinobu said "Your sister sure carries a lot of different panties...polka dots, gold, stripes..."

"Yeah yeah..." Steven sighed "Hurry up before they see us!" "Yeah!" Shinobu said, rushing out of the room.

"What was that?" Rachel asked. "Mmmmm-mmmph!" Zuko groans.

"Alright, where shall we go now?" Shinobu giggles.
12123112111221222211.title: He agrees to help her

12123112111221222212.content:
"...What the hell kind of ninja does something like that?!" He yelled, wiping his nose.

"Um, my master?" Shinobu says nervously.

"Well, your master is a pervert and a loser!" Steven laughs rather smugly.

"Ah!" she gasps, now getting annoyed "You take that back!"

"Hell no!" he keeps laughing "I'd rather reinforce it!"

"You won't be laughing long when I get out of here!" she said, doing a stance with her fingers "Disappearing jutsu!"

However, nothing happens. Shinobu didn't disappear or anything.

"Heh, some ninja you are..." he chuckles.

"Ohhhh...I just haven't learned that technique yet!" she said, now becoming embarrassed "I swear!"

However, Steven kept laughing. Shinobu was getting even more angry but couldn't help but get sad. Her large, googly eyes became teary and she started sniffling. Steven soon stops, in response.

"Are you okay?" he asked.

"WAAAAAHHHHH!!!!!!" she sobbed with a waterfall literally flowing out of her own eyes.

"Oh crap!" Steven gasps as the room starts filling up with watery tears, even his own shoes "Stop that! You're going to drown us both!"

"You made me cry" Shinobu kept crying "You fix this"

"Damn it!" Steven groans as the tears had quickly rose to the ceiling. Only his head and arms were sticking out as he held onto the chair holding Shinobu tied up.

What should he do?
12123112111221222212.title: He still wants revenge

choices: Made them (including Steven) Sailor Scouts! One for every planet and the moon...
Made them all pirates travelling the sea, with powers from Devil's Fruit.
12123112112.content:
Rachel decided to invite some (eight to be exact) friends over. She texted them and they came like wildfire upon hearing they could become 16 year olds themselves.

Steven wasn't sure about this, but decided to go with it anyways, since the necklace hadn't messed up anything...recently, using that term loosely of course.


So, Rachel's friends came over and were in shock and awe at Rachel's transformation. They didn't believe it and commented on Rachel's metamorphosis over and over. Steven almost wished they'd shut up. But he didn't. Because one of Rachel's friends noticed the ton of anime.

Rachel's friend, Cassandra, said, "WOW! You have everything! All this anime and a hot body to boot! ...We should watch something." Looking around, she saw Sailor Moon and One Piece, the two main animes Steven and Rachel were watching. Cassandra said, "We could watch Sailor Moon. I always wanted to be a Sailor Scout! They're so cool...their schoolgirl outfits combined with crazy superpowers. What if we were ALL Sailor Scouts?!?"

She paused and then said, "Or we could watch something boring like One Piece. Isn't that about eating "Devil's Fruit" then you get random powers and try to be a pirate? BORING."

Steven heard this and the necklace:
12123112112.title: Invite friends over.

choices: Turn everything back to normal. Now.
Stay Sailor Moon and keep the Sailor Scouts for now.
121231121121.content:
A shimmer of light radiated throughout the room. Then it flashed, blinding everyone briefly. When the light parted, something had changed. Or some people had.

All the girls were now Sailor Scouts, just like the Sailor Scouts on Sailor Moon. They were all beautiful teenage girls in schoolgirl outfits all with unique superpowers!

And Steven had turned into Sailor Moon herself. Steven was shocked at this development. Something had to be done.


The Sailor Scouts assigned themselves their names, each based off of one of the planets. But a gap was there for Earth...but Steven was there. And he was Sailor Moon. So, they decided to be the Sailor Scouts (with no "Earth" scout like the anime)...and Steven was "Sailor Moon".

Still, Steven did not want to be Sailor Moon. But...it could be fun. He realized with the necklace, he could change things back...but it could get worse. What to do...
121231121121.title: Made them (including Steven) Sailor Scouts! One...

choices: Everyone began to test out their Devil Fruit powers
121231121122.content:
The necklace flashes brightly and engulfs Steven and company inside a huge beam of light. When everything cleared up, they find that they haven't changed their appearances much but...

"Wait, why are we outside?" Cassandra asks. "Wow, the sky is so BLUE!!" Benjamin said.

"Ben?? You're friends with Rachel??" Steven gasps.

"Well not really, I just snuck in" Benjamin said.

"Wait a minute" One of Rachel's friends, a 16 year old girl named Roxy said. "We're on a ship..out at sea!" "Looks like a pirate ship to be exact..." Another friend, 14 year old Kimberly deducts.

"Sweet, I'm going for a swim!" Rachel squeals, jumping off the ship. "Rachel, wait!" Steven gasps.

Too late, a splash is heard and Rachel starts screaming.

"Help me! I can't swim!" Rachel gasps.

"Hold on, we got you!" Steven said as the others threw out a life ring for Rachel to grab onto as they pulled her back up.

"Sorry, Rachel" Steven starts to explain "We're in the world of One Piece now, the reason you can't swim is because you ate a Devil Fruit which gave you a weird power in exchange for your ability to swim..."

"Well, that's great..." Rachel sighed "What power do I have anyway?"
121231121122.title: Made them all pirates travelling the sea

1212311211221.content:
Rachel has the ability to grow her muscles very largely thanks to eating the Muscle-Muscle Fruit. Steven has been granted the ability to conjure up various magic spells thanks to consuming the Magic-Magic Fruit. Cassandra is able to mimic the powers of any Devil Fruit but for a short period of time thanks to the Limit-Limit Fruit.

"Awww, this isn't my type of power" Rachel sighed, observing her massive arms and legs.

"This...is nifty..." Steven said, creating a ball of fire in his hands.

"Only 5 seconds?!" Cassandra said "Why?!"

On the other side, Roxy is given the power to sneeze and send her enemies flying into next Tuesday with the Sneeze-Sneeze Fruit. Kimberly can force her enemies into any type of dance for various amounts of time with the Dance-Dance Fruit. Lastly, Benjamin can create various energy beams and powers ala Dragon Ball Z with the Ki-Ki Fruit.

"Um...gross..." Roxy said.

"Sweet, I enjoy partaking in dancing!" Kimberly laughs, shaking her hips around.

"What is this power? I'd rather have the ability to cram knowledge of all the world's literature into my brain..." Benjamin sighed.

So now what should our heroes do?
1212311211221.title: Everyone began to test out their Devil Fruit po...

choices: They're not given a warm reception
They learn that rogue pirates are attacking!
12123112112212.content:
"Ok, neither of us appear to have the necklace..." Steven sighed. "I suppose it's made itself the legendary treasure One Piece which we have to find all the way at the end of the Grand Line."

"Um, yeah okay..." The others simply respond, obviously not familiar with the One Piece series.

"Right...well first we're going to need supplies for our obviously long trip" Steven continued, pulling out a map "We're about to embark at a nearby island and village"

"Sweet, I'm getting hungry already!" Rachel laughs.

"Well...I assume you're going to be the 'Luffy' of our little crew..." Steven chuckles "Therefore, our captain..."

"Captain...!? I'm captain! Wheee!" Rachel squeals. The others looked on with much bewilderment.

"Yeah...anyway let's all try to be on our best behavior..." Steven explains "We may be pirates with little notoriety right now but one slip-up and we can become outlaws on the run by the World Government and bounty hunters..."

"Sounds like fun!" Cassandra grins.

So the newly established Crossboned Pirates arrived in town and...
12123112112212.title: Embark to a nearby town

choices: Avoid a fight and loot for supplies
121231121122122.content:
The pirate crew disembarks at the humble town of Little Mist on their quest to find the One Piece, however...

"Help!" They hear people scream "Pirates are attacking!"

Civilians were running about frantically. It was pure mayhem in this once-peaceful village.

"They're not talking about us, right?" Roxy asks.

"No, look over there!" Benjamin said, pointing towards another pirate ship stationed out on the other side of the island. The pirate flag on it was a skull with rainbows surrounding it.

"Rainbows? Seriously?" Cassandra giggles "There's no way those pirates can be threatening"

"Don't be fooled, guys!" Steven warns "Many of the characters in One Piece are rather ridiculous in appearance but they're still dangerous!"

"What should we do then?" Rachel asks.

"We could avoid a fight and just steal and loot for supplies and leave town like real pirates..." Steven suggests "...Or we can fight them off and become pirates for justice...it's your call, Captain Rachel..."

"Hmmm....uh....gah, this is hurting my brain!" Rachel groans.

"Just decide already, you moron!" Cassandra sighs.

"Ok! We..."
121231121122122.title: They learn that rogue pirates are attacking!

1212311211221222.content:
"Heroic pirates for the win!" Rachel laughs as she jumps the ship "Let's-a go, mateys!"

"I think all of this is already going to her head..." Benjamin nervously comments.

"Mmm-hmmm..." Everyone else agrees.

Meanwhile, on the enemy pirate ship...

"Ahahaha!" a tall man in rainbow-patterned pirate getup with a rainbow for a mustache laughs "Fire for the cannons! Rob from the villagers! Everything needs to be done before we set out for the Grand Line!"

"Right away, Captain!" the crewmen all cheered.

Therefore, chaos continued to spread across Little Mist. Many civilians boarded and locked their selves inside their houses, streets were deserted and others just continued to run for dear life.

"No, please!" A young maiden, crouched down on the ground, screamed as a pirate approached her.

"Come on, little lady!" The pirate laughed, reaching out for her "I just want you to become my slave!"

"No!" She screams again.

"MUSCLE-MUSCLE STRIKE!!!"

"Huh?! Oooh!" The pirate groans as he is struck inside the face and sent flying high in the skies.

"W-what was that?" The young lady gasps and then looks up to see an incredibly large and bulky arm above her "EEEEEKKKKK!!!!"

"I'm liking these powers already!" Rachel giggles.
1212311211221222.title: Fight the villainous pirates off

choices: She defeated all of the pirates
12123112112212221.content:
"What the hell was that?!" more pirates yell, surrounding Rachel and the young lady "Are you trying to mess with us?"

"...Who are you guys?" Rachel asks.

"Are you dense?? They're PIRATES!" The girl yells.

"Yeah, what she said!" One pirate growled "Now we know that you did something to one of our men, so where is he??"

"Hey, do you know where a restaurant is?" Rachel asks the girl, no longer facing the pirates.

"ARE YOU LISTENING?!" They yell, pouncing on Rachel with their swords. "Aaahhh!" The girl gasps, closing her eyes. "Huh?" Rachel then turns around.

Meanwhile...

"Drat, where'd she go?" Steven sighs, as he and the other Crossboned Pirates moved across town.

"That idiot's going to get us all in trouble!" Cassandra comments. "She's getting to get HERSELF in trouble if we don't stop her..." Kimberly adds. "Hey, maybe that lady over there knows something!" Benjamin says, pointing over to her.

The girl appeared fairly unconscious and possibly traumatized.

"Hey miss, wake up!" Steven urges. "What happens?"

"Uhh...pirates...girl with huge muscles...beat them up...help me..." The girl moaned.

"Can you tell us where she went?" Roxy asks.

"She's....going...for...that...pirate ship..." The girl continued, pointing towards it.

"Ok, let's go help her!" Steven says, placing the girl over his shoulder.

By the time they make it though...
12123112112212221.title: More pirates surround her

choices: Devil Fruit crewman come out to play!
More ordinary crewman come out to play!
121231121122122212.content:
The Crossbones soon make it to the enemy pirate ship where they discover Rachel just staring at it seemingly.

"Rachel, thank god!" Steven sighed "Don't separate from us like that!"

"..." Rachel responds.

"Why are you just standing like that?" Cassandra asks "Aren't you going to finish this?"

"..." Rachel responds.

"Rachel?" Benjamin turns away to look over at Rachel's face "What the...? "Wow...what is wrong with her eyes?" Roxy comments. "They're all rainbow-colored..." Kimberly added.

"Hahaha! Courtesy of yours truly!" A sinister voice cackled. The Crossbones look up to see the rainbow man from before standing on the deck of his ship, grinning evilly.

"So you're the captain of this vessel?" Benjamin asks.

"That's right, Captain Skittle of the Rainbow-Tasting Pirates!" He chuckled.

"Product placement, anyone?" Cassandra mutters.

"I HEARD THAT!" Captain Skittle yells "Anyway, I see your crew member has taken care of some of my men already"

"Our captain, unfortunately..." Steven sighs.

"Too bad she's possibly the dumbest pirate captain to ever set sail in the East Blue!" He laughs again "She was no match for my Happy-Happy powers!"

"...Happy-Happy?" Steven asks.

"Yes, thanks to eating the Happy-Happy Fruit, I have the ability to trap my enemies in a vision of a land of sunshine, rainbows and unicorns. They become so mesmerized and distracted that they're helpless to do anything else!"

"It's cheesy...yet effective!" Cassandra responds.

"I know right?!" Captain Skittle says "I realize now you guys are trying to interfere with my goals even though you're fellow pirates as well so I can't let you live..."

"That's too bad...but we won't go down without a fight!" Steven yells as the other Crossbones take fighter stances.
121231121122122212.title: She is in trouble!

choices: They did! Time for the final battle!
1212311211221222122.content:
So with the snap of a finger, Captain Skittle summoned a legion of pirates to surround our heroes. They looked fierce as they brandished their swords and knives.

"This will be a good test for our Devil Fruit powers" Steven grins.

So the pirates began attacking. Benjamin starts off by shooting energy blasts at some sending them running away scared.

"Sneeze Sneez....CHOO!" Roxy yells, creating a sneeze that sends more pirates high in the skies.

"Dance, puppets, dance!" Kimberly laughs, as her victims are forced to unwillingly shake their hips around.

"Only 5 seconds...any Devil Fruit power...hmmm...." Cassandra thinks to herself "Ok! Gum Gum Pistol!"

Cassandra stretches her arms back far like rubber and then sends coming back towards the dancing crewman, who are also sent high in the skies. Just as this is done, the power wears off.

"Freeze!" Steven yells, trapping more enemies in ice. "This is actually pretty fun!"

"Yeah...if only my powers would last longer..." Cassandra sighed.

"So I underestimated you guys...no matter!" Captain Skittle said, placing his hands over his face "Get a load of this! HAPPY-HAPPY SUNSHINE!"

A beam of bright rainbow energy bursts out and starts heading towards our heroes. Can they overcome this new threat?
1212311211221222122.title: More ordinary crewman come out to play!

choices: Make the club public to everyone.
1212311212.content:
Even they want to try out some of the many anime DVDs, they realized that their house wasn't big enough to contain thousands of anime, manga and video games. Steven however was completely ready to remedy that issue as the necklace creates a secret underground club.

It looked a lot like a regular club though with every video game console, a huge 54'' plasma TV with enormous surround sound speakers, arcade machines, a performance stage with karaoke and a bar. There was even a library area where all of their anime, manga, video games and merchandise was stocked and organized on tall shelves.

With something so incredible, they felt that they had to share it with everyone they knew.

Should they do it?
1212311212.title: Organize them.

choices: There is a knock at the door
12123112121.content:
Steven sighed.

"Rachel, let's keep this to ourselves," he laughed a little bit, nervously.

"But, but," Rachel said (she may look like she was 16, but she still had the mind of a 12 year old), "All my friends love anime."

"If they find out... something bad will happen!" And Steven was telling the truth.
12123112121.title: Keep the club private.

choices: Anime was now real, and always had been...
Video games were now real,  and always had been...
121231121212.content:
All of a sudden, the video games and anime started glowing. They started to shake, and the whole house shook. Then the whole world shook. Then everything stood still for a few seconds.

And then the world wasn't the same.

How?
121231121212.title: The necklace activates

1212311212122.content:
It seemed that video games had always been real in this world, now, anyways. The television suddenly turned on, and showed a massive fight between Cloud Strife and Albert Wesker downtown. And people seemed to think this was all normal. Except for Steven and Rachel.

Rachel seemed excited, but Steven was still trying to figure out everything that was happening. He couldn't possibly know all video games, so there was a chance that he'd come up against something he wouldn't know how to fight. Hell, he probably wouldn't be able to fight half of the stuff in the world now, anyways.

Steven picked up a newspaper, and read about how people all over the world seem to turn into characters at random moments...though the way it was written, apparently this was normal.

Steven wondered what to do, when someone knocked at the door...
1212311212122.title: Video games were now real,  and always had been...

choices: Ivy from Soul Calibur...though she acts like a mix of Jill and Ivy...
Bad Girl from No More Heroes...and she acts like a mix of Jill and Bad Girl...
12123112121221.content:
Steven opened the door and saw... Jill?!? Except she seemed to reach out to Steven, in pain...

"Steven...I was so close to your house...I came...because I think...I'm becoming...one...of..the-"

Before she could finish her sentence, she began to laugh manically as her body changed. Everything about her changed as she became:
12123112121221.title: Steven answers the door...

121231121212211.content:
Steven stares curiously as Jill began a dramatic transformation. Her once blonde hair began to change into a shiny shade of white and the bangs of it extended down slighty to cover up her left eye. Her lips also turned purple as huge shoulder plates appeared on her shoulders. Her entire figure is changed greatly with her breasts forming much larger and exaggereted. Her attire became scantily-clad with her breasts almost completely exposed. Oh, and she's now wearing armored boots. Nearly everything was altered to the appearance of Ivy from the Soul Calibur video game series though some of Jill's features were retained such as...her face, voice and some of her personaltiy.

Steven couldn't help but stare vigorously at her extremely voluptuous figure. However, Jivy (she needs a new name, right?) was taking this all in stride. She pulls out of nowhere a long, spiked whip and strikes Steven with it. He is sent flying into the bar, not even noting the attack until after it happened.

"Ugh...wow..." he groans, now bearing a long, bloody scar over his left eye and cheek. "She's sexy yet terrifying!"

"Steven, it is time to meet your fate!" She announces, looming over him about to strike again with her whip "Time to die, you pervert!"

"How about no?" Steven said, barely dodging the whip as it struck the bar, destroying many fine drinks and chairs in the process.

He moves back as far away from her as possible and takes the necklace out.

"All right, how about we make this a fair match?" Steven said "I'll merge with a video game character too and fight you!"

121232.content:
Rachel looked up at Steven with her big Doe eyes. The fact that they were actually blue eyes didn’t mean much. Bouncing up and down on her bare toes, Rachel tugged at her blue shorts and her oversized “Project A-KO” shirts ruffled across her slight torso. Waving her thin arms up and down as her long blonde hair bounced everywhere, Rachel looked like she had to go to the bathroom.

‘Oh, oh, oh! I know! If that necklace can do anything, why don’t you give me super powers!”

Steven scoffed. “Yeah, like THAT’S a good idea.”

Rachel pouted. “Awe, come on. You know you can always change me back!”

Steven sighed. “Ugh. I would think there would be better things to do with it.”

Rachel stared at him. “Like what? Make Jill fall in love with you? You know how those things always turn out.”

Steven blushed. He was thinking about doing just that. Shaking his head, he grunted. “What type of super power?”

Rachel giggled and started jumping up and down again. “Oh, oh, oh! I want to be able to fly. And have, uh super strength.”

Steven sniffed. “Is that all? You want to be Supergirl?”

Rachel stopped bouncing around for a moment, contemplating her choices. “Well, sure I guess.” Her expression changed as she grew excited once more. “But Supergirl on steroids!”

Steven gave her a confused look. “Supergirl on steroids? What does that mean?”

Rachel waved her arms. “You know, steroids. I want big muscles too. Bigger muscles than anyone! So if Supergirl has bigger muscles than anyone, that would make her the strongest super hero around.”

Steven started to put the ideas from his sister together. Give Rachel the powers of Supergirl, but with huge muscles. Muscles that could expand as big as she wanted. Grow as strong as she so desired. Not even finishing his thought, the necklace began to warp reality and soon Rachel could feel her body changing. She could feel herself grow stronger. And stronger. And stronger!

“Oh, oh, oh! Steven, it’s working! It’s working!”

Rachel’s tiny 4 foot 10 inch body began to throb and grow as she became more and more powerful! Muscles out of nowhere began to press out across her body in every direction. And not just any old muscles, but super powered, steroid fueled muscles. Steven could hardly finish his thoughts as they became reality right in front of him. Rachel’s super muscles pounded forward and ripped her shirt and pants right off, showcasing the physique of a top level female bodybuilder. Blushing, Steven quickly thought about a costume and a super flexible string bikini top popped into view across her chest and a thong came into view across her bottom. The fact that he would offer such minimal clothing seemed odd, but only for a moment. Rachel’s muscle transformation tore his thoughts back to his wish. Make his sister a Supergirl. A Supergirl on steroids. Give her the ability to flex her muscles as big as she wanted. As hard as she could imagine. As strong as she could dream! And the bigger her muscles became, the stronger she would grow! And even when her muscles would go back to normal, she would retain all of the strength from her mega flexes. His breath quickened as Rachel squealed.

“Yes, yes, yes! Make me bigger, Steven! Make me stronger! Give me the strength of hundred Super Girl’s!”

Rachel’s body was soon overflowing with the biggest, strongest muscles Steven could imagine. Her calves blew out beyond the size of twin soccer balls. Her thighs crashed forth bigger than bags of cement! Her abs were an insane cobblestone path of hundreds of black hole proof muscles. Her super chest blasted forth twin basketball sized spheres of pure muscle power with the strength to bench press 20 air craft carriers! And when she brought her arms to bare, her biceps exploded upward, knocking Steven off his feet! The shock wave from the power of her bicep flex blew the walls off their house and sent the ceiling flying into the next neighborhood! One flex had generated the power of a blockbuster bomb as her bicep detonated up over her fist. Up over her head and up into the sky to 20 feet high!

Steven opened his eyes while still on his back and could see Rachel’s biceps reach impossible heights! Her biceps had to be 500 inches around! He glanced down toward Rachel’s smiling face that was surrounded by an insane array of muscles across her chest, shoulders and traps!

“Give me more Steven! Make me stronger! Make me bigger!”

He rubbed his head as Rachel’s biceps started climbing upward once again, sending out another shock wave that ripped houses out the foundation across the neighborhood! Steven was pressed hard into the ground as Rachel’s biceps sailed upward to 40 feet high, to 80 feet high to 200 feet high! And he was no longer wishing for it. Rachel was! He had given her this ability! And Rachel was yelling with glee!

“Yes, yes, YES! I’m the biggest! I’m the strongest! Nobody can stand in my way! I can punch comets to dust! I can lift continents! I can destroy armies just by flexing my unlimited muscles! Nuclear bombs won’t even make me blink!”

As Steven shook his head, he had to think. The power had gone to Rachel’s head. He had to stop this, to make things normal. But even as he tried to do so, Rachel giggled.

“Oh, it’s too late for that big brother. You gave me these abilities. Only I can give them up now!”

Releasing her impossible flex, her muscles receded and she walked toward Steven.

“Nice outfit you gave me. Kind of reveling though for a 12 year old girl. Even if I am the strongest girl in the galaxy now! And oh, what fun I’m going to have.”

Smiling down at Steven, Rachel blinked her dazzling blue eyes. “And I’ll bet you could help, hmmm.”

Steven looked around. He didn’t want to help. He wanted her back to normal. He wanted all of this back to normal. But he couldn’t. At least not yet. As Rachel was flying loop-de-loops in the air above him, Steven began to think. The only thing he could do was to try and bring the strongest Super Heroes and villains he could think of to try and defeat her, to make her give up her powers. Which unfortunately for him, was just what Rachel wanted.

"Steven, we are your parents."

Steven's heart quickened, though he somewhat appreciated the cliche line. However, he was still very frightened and worried. Were his parents really...evil?

His Mom glided through the air to him, and held him in a creepy yet motherly embrace. "Son, join us. Become one with the fiction, one with the story and one with the craziness in this amalgam of writings."

Steven then said bluntly, "What?"

His Dad then said, "All you have to do is say 'I give myself over to fiction' and you too can become one of us. A god in a story, capable of rewriting anything to your liking. You could even make the writers writing this crazy story write what you want."

Dark Magician Girl then said, "Steven, you can't! You could become just like them or worse! We have to fight them, save the day and--"

Steven looked at Dark Magician Girl and said softly, "...Dark Magician Girl?"

Dark Magician Girl replied with wide-eyed innocence, "Brother, do what Mommy and Daddy say. If you do, the story will start again...and you will be all-powerful. And we can be happy. As a family."

Dark Magician Girl then summoned Rachel, Jill, Benjamin and all the other supporting characters in various story arcs. They all bowed down before Steven and said, "Start the story again. All-powerful. Just say the words, 'I give myself over to fiction'...and the story is yours."


Steven was confused beyond belief, though after this chapter, nothing really made sense anymore. He could try to fight and figure out what was going on...or give up and say the words, which would supposedly start the story over...just he would be in control...

"NO! No no no no! Don't you DARE make me harm myself or my parents!" Steven shouted at her. "I want everything to return to normal! Begone, evil woman!"

Suddenly, Dark Magician Girl slowly faded away, as she was being teleported to another dimension.

"Oh no... Noooooooo!!!" she screamed as she disappeared into thin air, leaving Steven alone with his mom and dad.

"There, much better!" Steven sighed, as he looked at his parents.

As he walked up to his father and his mother, he realized that both of them looked more frail. They were tired and they had more wrinkles than before. All the stress and tension of the last few days had left them feeling worn out and tired.

Rachel pulled against the house and with explosive force, ripped the entire house out the ground shooting dirt and rocks all around. Standing back up, Steven’s eyes went wide and his jaw dropped as his little sister hoisted their house up over her head!

“And this isn’t all that heavy either! Just image what else I can lift Steven! Tanks! Trains! Maybe even skyscrapers!”

Rachel carefully placed the house back down, not looking to destroy it. At least not yet.

“So big brother, now that I’m the strongest, most muscular girl on earth, what ever shall we do next?”

12222211.content:
Steve was incredibly happy! It was AWESOME feeling so big and so strong! He just LOVED it!

“I can’t wait to make some of my buddies big, too!” he said to himself. “Hmm… Who should I grow, first?”

Steve thought about some of his classmates in school. Then, he realized that the necklace was so powerful, that it could change people over a distance, and still allowed Steve to “see” the changes through his mind.

Steve thought about the weakest, geekiest, and skinniest kid in class.

“Hmm… I bet Tony could use a little more muscle right now…” Steve chuckled.

Meanwhile, about five blocks away, a skinny, short computer geek named Tony was tapping away at his laptop. He was working on his C# program, diligently writing some programming code, when he felt a strange tingling feeling in his muscles, thanks to Steve’s necklace.

Suddenly, his muscles became stiff, and it became hard for Tony to move his arms.

“Huh? What the heck? Maybe I need to get up and stretch… I’ve been sitting at the computer too long…” Tony thought to himself. Tony stood up and walked to the bathroom. He glanced at his reflection in the mirror. Did he look like he had gained some muscle in his arms? He adjusted his glasses…

Then, everything happened at once! Tony’s arms grew much thicker and wider. His legs doubled in width as his muscles inflated dramatically, ripping his jeans. His calves just bulged out like soccer balls, bursting through his jeans as well. His shoulders widened dramatically while his pectorals pushed out forwards and sideways at the same time, ripping his shirt in half, from the collar to the bottom. Finally, his torso grew wider as rows of abdominals popped up on his flat stomach. Tony gained almost fifty pounds of muscle in a matter of seconds!

“Holy CRAP!” he gasped, as he examined his hulking body in the mirror. “What the HELL just happened to me?”

The teen bodybuilder just stood there, flexing his arms, feeling the strength flowing through him. The geek definitely didn’t look like a geek anymore, except for the glasses.

Steve just grinned.

“That was awesome! Look at him!” he smiled. “I should change some more of my friends!”

Who would he change next?

It was at this point that Steven noticed the necklace was not around his sister's neck, but in his hand - he had apparently gotten a grip on it before she threw him across the room. That meant he had been the one to just wish his sister 20' tall - because she was playing against his giantess fantasies. And if he gave her what she'd just asked for he'd be reduced to her little play thing, using the necklace for her so that he was the one taking most of the risk. 122222212.title: Halloween
