12222222.content:
Steven looked around the room, at how the entire house had seemed to have changed in order to accommodate Rachel's latest transformation. The walls stretched for at least 30 feet to give his sister room to walk around. The couch was more than double the size it was before. Even a few of the chairs around the house resembled something a giant would sit in. Only it wasn't for a giant. It was for his 12 year old sister.

"Now this is more like it," Rachel said, casually flexing her massive arms as she looked around at the new design of the house. "It's like...this house was made just for me." She reached for the necklace, only to find it wasn't around her neck anymore. She frantically searched on the floor around her, trying to find it, eventually falling to her knees, the quake from her massive body almost causing Steven to fall over.

Rachel glanced over at her brother, noticing he was holding something in his hand. She calmed down, taking a deep breath and stood up to her full height. "Oh, Steven?" she called out to him, in the sweetest voice she could muster. "Could you come over here for a moment? I have to ask you something."

Steven knew his sister knew he had the necklace. The last thing he needed to do was to walk over to her. He contemplated running up the stairs, maybe jumping out of a window in the bathroom and running down the street, hoping his sister would be too slow to keep up with him. But, against his better judgment, his legs rebelled against him, first one foot reached forward, then another, until, before he knew it, he was halfway across the room. He tried to stop walking, tried to convince his brain that this was a bad idea, but it was no use. It was as if he had no control over his body anymore.

Then Steven thought about the last thing Rachel said before he yanked the necklace off of her. "I could be so beautiful that men will do anything for me." He glanced up at his sister's face, as it practically radiated a beauty he had never seen before. But her beauty wasn't the reason why he was still walking over to her. It was the way she worded the last part of the sentence; "..men will do anything for me," that filled him with fear.

He started to panic, knowing he was already under his sister's control and, probably every other guy the world over was as well, he reasoned. He tried to think of another wish: to be 100 feet tall, to be twice as muscular as his sister. He even tried to teleport himself to the other side of the world, just to keep the necklace out of his sister's reach, but his brain wouldn't cooperate. Steven knew the only way he could make another wish now was if Rachel allowed him to.

In another three steps, Steven was standing in front of Rachel, her angelic-looking face peering down at him. He looked straight ahead, suddenly realizing he barely reached his sister's gigantic calf now, a calf that was bigger than he was at this point. He felt like a toddler standing next to her and felt just as helpless.

Rachel bent down and extended a huge hand towards him. "Give me the necklace," she demanded, in a deeper, though still prepubescent-sounding voice. His arm instinctively responding to her command, Steven watched as he reached up and put the magic piece of jewelry in her massive palm. "Good boy," she replied, before standing up and putting the necklace around her neck again, a longer chain appearing out of nowhere.

"Now, time for some bigger clothes," Rachel said, before a simple t-shirt and a pair of shorts covered her body, though they did nothing to hide the massive amounts of muscle hiding underneath the fabric. She sat down in one of the humongous recliners made especially for her and began rocking back and forth, contemplating her next move.

"So, what should I wish for now?" she asked her brother, who meekly looked up at her, unsure of what to say. Not that it mattered, anyway.

"Well, you could always wish everything back to normal," Steven offered, taking a handful of steps back, just to be able to see all of his sister's face.

"Nah," Rachel replied, finally deciding on something. "I wish..."
12222222.title: Too late

122222221.content:
"I wish to be a princess living in a castle," Rachel said aloud, realizing one of her biggest dreams she had when she was younger. Steven watched as the entire house morphed around him. The walls grew even further, turning from a drab off-white color made of wood to an immaculate place made primarily from ivory and adorned with gold. Steven watched as the room stretched for half a mile, it seemed, as various paintings of his relatives, both living and dead, hung on the wall, each one dressed in only the most expensive clothing.

The recliner Rachel was sitting in morphed into a throne, the seat made with red velvet, while the four legs and the base was made entirely of silver, with emeralds of various colors dotted all around it. Steven looked up into his sister's face, as it appeared to become even more beautiful than before, if that were possible, while her clothes turned from an ordinary t-shirt and shorts to a pair of pajamas, made only of the finest silks, with her initials etched into the top, near her left breast.

A few steps grew around the throne Rachel was sitting in, causing her to rise even higher from Steven's perspective and making her even more of an intimidating presence. A crown was adorned on her head, and a royal scepter was leaning against her throne.

Steven felt something on his naked body and looked down, as a pair of pants and a shirt suddenly formed on him. They weren't as expensive-looking as his sister's clothes, but at least they covered up the naughty parts. In fact, they looked more like the clothes of a servant than the clothes of a budding prince...

"Rachel, what have you done?" Steven asked, cautiously taking a few steps towards his sister.

"What?" she replied, shrugging her shoulders. "I always wanted to be a princess. Now I am." She casually began twirling the necklace around, looking down at her brother with a smirk on her face.

"But...what about mom and dad?"

"Oh, don't worry about them," Rachel said, pointing to the back of the room, where two large golden doors were starting to open. "They're coming."

Steven turned around to see his mom and dad walking towards them, their business trip into the city over. Both were dressed as a king and queen should be, with crowns sitting on their heads and long robes draped over their shoulders as they walked. But Steven noticed something different about them. The ground began shaking as they came closer, every footstep rattling the room and almost causing a few paintings to fall off the wall.

It was then that Steven knew what was going on, what Rachel had done with her wish when she used the necklace...

12222222121.content:
Steven grabbed the necklace, and he waited for something to happen, but nothing did. He realized that staying in the house probably wasn't a good idea with his substantial size disadvantage, at least right now, and suddenly he found himself outside, across the moat from a castle, which he assumed was his family's. He decided to take a walk through the rest of the neighborhood, which, aside from the sudden presence of a medieval castle, seemed as he remembered it.

As he strolled along the sidewalk, he thought of the massive size of his family. It wasn't something he had gotten used to yet, but he began to imagine himself their size too. After a short time thinking these thoughts, he felt the necklace warm up. The power that began flowing from it was very subtle, but as he walked, he noticed his head growing further from the sidewalk, and his steps began to have more bounce and force to them.

He stopped by a store window and looked at his reflection, and was stunned to see that he was now an incredible nine feet tall! Not only that, but his muscles had swelled up to a rather impressive size, maybe not as impressive as his parents', but still mighty nice. His shoulders had widened to be over four feet wide, and his biceps were much more defined than before. His clothes had grown somewhat with him, but were still straining to keep his hulk covered. Just for fun, he flexed his muscles, which bulged even further, ripping his shirt to shreds just like The Hulk. His pants began to burst at the seams too.

Out of mercy for his clothing, he relaxed, and smiled at himself. He was very happy with the results, and as he continued to stare at his reflection, he felt that this was a good size to stay. Not wanting to appear too vain, however, he continued to walk, and wondered what else he could do with this necklace.
12222222121.title: Steven's unintentional growth

122222221211.content:
As Steven walked by the town square, he saw his three friends Dylan, Derrick, and Dustin. They had been friends since elementary school, and the three of them were hardly ever seen apart from each other. People who didn't know them would often confuse them for brothers, because they acted and even looked so much alike.

"What's up, Steven?" Dustin asked, raising his hand high above his head to slap a high five. Steven was slightly amused at his friend, who all used to be pretty close to him in height and stature, now struggling to reach up to his chest-level. He slapped Dustin's hand back, but not used to his new strength yet, he hit him pretty hard, nearly knocking Dustin down.

"Whoa, easy there big guy," Dylan said, chuckling. "Not all of us can be goliaths like you."

"Sorry," Steven said.

"Man, just what I get for being friends with a muscle god," Dustin said as he rubbed his now-sore arm.

"Well, it does have it's benefits," Derrick piped in as he lightly smacked Steven in the backside. "Like--"

The other two boys chimed in: "--Never getting picked on at school!" they all finished simultaneously.

Steven chuckled lightly to himself. This was nothing unusual for his three friends; they always were finishing each others' sentences, and they would often speak in unison as if they were reading off of a script. In fact, sometimes he imagined that the three of them were one person.

In what seemed like a blink of an eye, the necklace warmed up, and when Steven looked back to his friends, he was shocked to see that they had merged into one! They were the same height as before, and from the chest down, they looked like any normal teenage boy. Their shoulders had gotten a little wider, and it was to accommodate the most stunning thing of all: all three of the boys' heads were together on the same set of shoulders!

"Yeah," Dylan, who was now the leftmost head, said. "And that was something that definitely would have happened otherwise."

"Well, most kids have acne or voice cracks to deal with," Dustin, the middle head, said.

"We had all that, times three!" Derrick, the right head, exclaimed.

Steven was stunned. He didn't know what was more unbelievable: that his friends were now a character straight out of Monty Python, or that they still seemed to act exactly the same. In fact, if he closed his eyes, he wouldn't be able to tell any difference.

His train of thought was broken by a loud growling sound emanating from the stomach of his friend(s). "Boy, we sure are hungry!" Dylan, turning to the other two heads, said. "Let's go get something to eat!"

"All right!" Derrick exclaimed. "Why don't we go over to Pizza Garden? They've got that all-you-can-eat buffet!"

"Okay," Dustin said, "but this time, can I get a slice or two of the BBQ-Chicken? You two hogged it all last time!"

"See you later, Steven," all three heads said in unison, as they walked off towards the restaurant.

Steven smiled to himself. Some very interesting things had happened so far today, and he got the feeling that they were only just beginning.
122222221211.title: He runs into a group of friends

choices: Go out to the sports fields behind the school
1222222212112.content:
Steven continued walking through the square, not heading in any particular direction. As he was thinking to himself, he wasn't really paying attention to where he was going, and he found himself in front of an elementary school. He realized that this was the school where his little sister had gone...at least he thought it was, though all the transformation and changing that had happened that day left his mind a little fuzzy. He decided to explore this school a little further.

As he walked closer, he saw that one of the classroom windows were open, and inside, a class of first graders were practicing math problems at the chalkboard. "Fifty-seven plus eleven, Jessica," the teacher said to a girl standing at the chalkboard. "C'mon, you can do this. I know you can!" Steven watched as the girl wrote the numbers on the board, then added them together by counting, coming up with the right answer. "Good job, Jessica! Sixty-eight is correct!" The rest of the class clapped quietly, and Jessica returned to her seat.

"Well," Steven thought to himself as he watched this unfold before him. "The teacher is trying to make math fun, but it's not that easy. Perhaps I can help, by giving the kids something to work with." The necklace warmed up again, and Steven knew that he had control over the situation. He smiled.

"Okay, next up is Max," the teacher said, as an energetic brown-haired boy jumped out of his seat and ran to the board. "Alright, Max, now the problem I want you to do is forty-two plus eighteen."

Max wrote the problem on the board, then stared at it for a second as he tried to figure it out. Finally, he turned around and said, "I just can't do it!"

The teacher shook her head and smiled. "Yes you can, Max. Just picture it this way. You're forty-two inches tall right now, right?"

Max shrugged. "I guess so."

"Okay," the teacher said. "Now let's see what happens when we add eighteen inches. Let's all count together. Ready, class? One, two, three..."

As the class was counting, Max began to increase in height, gaining an inch for every number that was said. "...Four, five, six..." Steven smirked, and realized that, just like his other imaginings that became real, no one else noticed what was happening; they all took it for reality. "...Nine, ten, eleven..." The boy was now a full foot taller than he had been, and still going. He was now getting to be almost as tall as the teacher. Steven could see that Max was smiling and enjoying the lesson. "...Fifteen, sixteen, seventeen, eighteen!" The class stopped counting, and Max stopped growing, standing tall and proud at an even five feet tall, the size of a boy twice his age.

"Okay, class, let's get out the measuring tape," the teacher said as she pulled it out of her purse, and quickly stretched it from Max's feet to the top of Max's head. "Aaaand, seventy inches exactly!" The teacher slid shut the measuring tape, and turned Max back around to the board. "So you see, Max, when you add the eight to the two, it becomes ten, and so it adds one to the next set of numbers, the tens place." Max seemed to be understanding it now, and he wrote "70" on the board as the answer to the problem. Beaming, both from getting the answer right and from gaining the eighteen inches in height, he returned to his desk, which was now too little for him, causing him to have to squeeze in and bend over.

"Okay, who wants to go next?" the teacher asked.

"Me! Me! Me!" Almost the whole class raised their hand, begging to do the next problem. Steven smiled. He had succeeded in making math fun and enjoyable for this group., and knew it was time to move on.
1222222212112.title: Steven passes by a school

choices: Steven keeps accidently changing the world around him
Steven gets control of his thoughts and focuses them
122222221212.content:
As Steven was still getting used to his new body, he realized that his wandering had taken him to the local city park. It was one of his favorite places to hang out, as he loved to people watch. And today being a weekend, he had plenty of people to watch.

The park was on the waterfront, and the river bank was one of the most beautiful parts of the city, where everyone loved to assemble and spend time on nice days. People were playing Ultimate Frisbee on the lawn, a group of kids were chasing each other in what Steven assumed was a game of tag, and some teenagers had stripped down to their underwear and dove into the river, splashing around and having a good time.

What caught Steven's eye, however, was a couple that was sitting down on a blanket, having a picnic. The couple couldn't be more than fifteen or sixteen, and the way the guy acted so shy and nervous, he guessed this was one of their first dates. Sitting down on a bench a couple dozen yards away, Steven watched as the boy talked nervously. He thought back to some of his first dates, and remembered how nerve-wracking they were, but how rewarding that feeling could be. While reminiscing, he thought to himself, 'Wouldn't it be nice if they could skip the first date nerves and already be comfortable with each other?' Because he was deep in thought, he didn't notice when the necklace warmed up and began its magic.

Without realizing what he had done, Steven turned his attention back to the couple, but noticed that something was different. Now, instead, the couple was in each others' arms, with the girl lying her head down in the guy's lap. 'That was fast,' Steven thought to himself. He then put two and two together and realized what had happened. After an initial hesitation, he then felt rather pleased with himself, having caused something good to happen to the two strangers. 'It's always nice to see two love birds rather than two people being awkward around each other.'

Again, the necklace began to warm up. 'Uh oh,' Steven said. 'What did I wish for this time?' As he looked on, stunned, he saw that the two lovers began to transform. Their heads shrank a little, and their necks receded and grew more stiff. Their bodies began to grow plump, but their legs began to thin out rapidly. Their hair began to thicken all over their body, and changed into what Steven soon recognized as feathers. After a few crazy moments, Steven realized that he was looking at two giant doves!

"Holy crap!" Steven said aloud. He didn't know what was weirder: that two five-foot-tall birds were now picking the ground for worms and bugs around the park, or that the other people there didn't seem to notice and/or care! He quickly pictured the original couple back in his mind, and focused his energy on changing them back. When he opened his eyes again, he was relieved to see the couple back to their old selves.

"Whew," Steven said, and he decided he needed to go somewhere else before his thoughts affected the world again.
122222221212.title: Seeing Two Love Birds

choices: Steven decided to go to the mall... more boys become muscular!
Steven decided to go to the park... more boys become muscular!
12222222122.content:
Steven grabbed the necklace and placed it around his neck. Neither Rachel or his parents seemed to mind, since they were already incredibly big and strong as it is, and all they cared about at that moment, was to prepare something to eat for dinner. Having those huge muscles just increased their appetite, and they quickly went into the kitchen and started looking for something to eat. Since they were all very muscular, they decided to create a huge salad, consisting of a large variety of spinach, carrots, broccoli, peas, green beans, and a wide selection of herbs and spices.

Meanwhile, Steve went outside, hoping to meet more muscular people.

"I wish other guys would grow big and muscular whenever they would look at me or talk to me" he whispered to himself.

Of course, he was wearing the necklace around his neck. Right away, the cursed necklace began to glow around him. Whoever would glance at Steve from now on, as long as he were a male, he would grow big and muscular.

While Steve was walking down the street, a kid approached him while riding his skateboard. The boy was wearing his kneepads, his elbow pads, and his wrist guards, along with a black helmet on his head.

The boy was riding on the street and he just briefly glanced towards the sidewalk where he spotted Steven.

Immediately, the kid was overcome by an intense tingling feeling, which caused him to jump off his board and remain standing on the street.

"Hey! What the heck...?" the boy wondered, as every muscle in his body tensed up.

Then, out of the blue, every muscle in the kid's body started to expand rapidly! His chest ballooned out forward and sideways, practically ripping the front of his t-shirt in half! His arms thickened at an alarming rate, as his biceps turned into bowling balls of power and strength.

"Oooohhh! Crap! What is happening? AAAAAHHH!!!" the boy gasped, as his muscles continued to grow.

The boy's abdominals popped up over his flat stomach, while his entire torso practically widened by a foot. His legs grew thick and muscled, and his calves inflated like helium balloons, which were pumped up with air, until they were bigger than soccer balls.

When the growth stopped, the boy was as muscular as a junior bodybuilder!

"Holy cow! I... I... What happened?" the boy wondered, as he looked down at his amazing body.

The poor kid had to bend down just to see his feet, because his chest was so big, it was blocking his view. His shoulders were so wide, that his arms were hanging from his sides at a 45-degree angle. His shoulders were almost 4 feet wide!

The first boy didn’t wait for Lisa to plead her case and punched her hard on the shoulder. Lisa had bloomed athletic muscles on her 4 foot tall frame from the initial growth. Her dress bulged a bit, pulling tighter around her slightly muscled up frame. The jells on her feet were off back in the play area. The dress covered her body down to her knees and covered her arms up to her wrists. Her angelic face with sparkling green eyes and light brown hair winced with the first punch.

“Hey! That hurt!”

The second boy sneered and punched her in the chest with a thud. Lisa yelped as the second boy laughed.

“Did that hurt too?”

The third boy punched her in the stomach hard and Lisa bent over as she let out a small woof. If she didn’t have her recently acquired muscles, she would have been on the ground. Unfortunately, staying up only emboldened the boys to keep up the punching.

As a second barrage of punches were lined up by the boys, Julie’s wish swept across the mall and took hold of Lisa. The thought of making girls bigger and stronger wasn’t terribly focused. In fact, her random thought of making younger girls stronger to address the dominating boys at a very young age created a power surge that flowed back with age to those girls entering school. So while an 18 year old girl would grow a bit stronger, a 17 year old girl would be stronger still, and so on. By the time the age progressed down toward the 6 year old Lisa, the strength and muscle expansion would be super human.

So as the boys started hitting Lisa again, the initial surge in strength and power flowed quickly into Lisa, bolting her back upright. The stinging blows hurt less and less. By the time the boys were delivering a third round of punches, Lisa’s body had grown rock hard and the punches felt like finger taps. The initial damage was quickly repaired and Lisa now smiled wickedly at the realization that she was once again growing stronger. Only the surge of power didn’t stop. As the boys backed up, rubbing their sore fists, Lisa looked up at them.

“So you boys thought you could beat me up, huh?”

At that point, the power in Lisa’s body started multiplying, and her muscles responded by tearing and growing at an incredible rate, blasting across her slight frame like a volcanic eruption. Every muscle on her body doubled in size in an instant, ripping and popping threads and material across her dress. Lisa chucked now as the might pounding into her muscles increased in intensity as her strength continued to ramp upward. Lisa pulled up her arms in anticipation and chuckled.

“Thought you were stronger, bigger and tougher?”

With one tense, Lisa’s muscles exploded across her body, shredding her dress and pressing muscles forward with far greater size than the boys! Standing on her toes, her calves expanded to gigantic masses of pulsing pink girl muscles, jutting out toward the size of canned hams. Her thighs and hamstrings pressed outward in every direction in a frenzy of super muscle expansion, growing until her inner thighs touched and the outer thighs pushed out a foot thick and then grew thicker. And harder. And stronger! Much, much stronger. The density of her muscles were now greater than the hardest steel and were still becoming denser.

Lisa’s legs were so muscular it was a wonder any more muscle could fit. And the strength rippling through those calves and quads could squat a tank for reps! The muscles crackled as she held her mighty flex.

“Well these legs should convince you that I’m now stronger, but I’m not done flexing. But when I am, it’s my turn to punch you boys!”

As the dress fell and flittered to the ground, her steel abs were exposed, showcasing an array of shifting muscle blocks across her narrow stomach. Her back widened dramatically away from her stomach into a terrible T shape while her chest was a humongous rippling mass of pure muscle with pectorals bigger than twin basketballs covered with criss crossing veins and striations. The thick undershirt was straining against her powerful chest and was ripping down the center to expose the mega muscled cleavage. And with one hard breath, Lisa pulled the 18 inch thick pectoral masses up to her narrow little chin, expanding the muscles further to complete the destruction of her top against a torrent of mega girl muscles.

“You can try and hit me in the chest again, but you’ll only hurt your hands against my big, bulging super girl muscles! And if you like these big muscles, let me show you my arms.”

As she pulled up her biceps, the muscles expanded with such power and velocity, that the ground shook around the boys as the strength to curl a 737 detonated inside her young super muscles. Lisa paused for a moment as the boys stared with wonder at her bowling ball sized biceps that now glowed with still growing strength and power!

“And these biceps are now big enough to pound you three into the ground! But if I flex them a bit harder, let’s see how big and strong they’ll become.”

And with another flex the mighty mounds of muscle began to stack bowling balls on top of each other! The 40 inch circumference biceps doubled in size to 80 inches around, then became 120 inches around, and finally with one final ground shaking boom, up to 160 impossible inches around with enough strength to curl a millions of pounds with one arm! Lisa was now laughing as she stared up at her 6 foot tall biceps with glee.

“Ha! My mighty muscles are taller than any of YOU! And there’s more strength in my muscles than every boy in school! Times like a million!”

And before the stunned boys could react, Lisa released her flex and delivered a punch to the closest boy in the chest, sending him flying off her fist like he was shot out of cannon! He sailed away down toward the center of the mall, rolling to a stop 100 feet away, moaning with pain. Two more quick punches sent the other boys sailing in different directions. If not for their own muscled up physiques, they too would have been seriously hurt.

Lisa sniffed. “That was just too easy! I wonder what I can really do?”

1222222212212112212111222.content:
There was a bright flash from the necklace, as it spread throughout the mall, then beyond. Momentarily blinded, Steven shielded his eyes, until the bright light passed. When he opened them again, he watched, as every guy’s Olympia sized muscles deflated, returning to their normal proportions.

As the men became smaller, their clothes changed as well, going from sleeveless shirts and tank tops, to simple t-shirts, which showed only the slightest hint of muscle tone hidden underneath. By the time it was over, their bodies resembled long distance marathon runners more than anything else, their championship bodybuilding physiques long gone.

While the men finished up their transformations, the women received a vastly different one. Spurred on by Julie’s imagination, every woman in the mall—adults as well as children—continued to grow. Their legs swelled out in all directions, quickly filling their shorts with thick quad and hamstring muscles. The material in their shorts showed signs of strain, but held together, instead growing longer to accommodate each woman.

Their shoulders went from healthy-looking deltoids to the size of cannonballs in no time, causing their frames to become wider as well. Their breasts grew larger, pushed further out by their continually growing pectorals underneath, while their lats became wider and thicker, giving them an upper body bigger than anything Steven had ever seen before in his entire life. He watched as one woman walked past him, her growing physique already dwarfing any Mr. Olympia contestant in history. And still they grew.

He gulped as their arms were next. Going up from a starting point of 19”, Steven watched as Julie added more mass. Inch by inch were added to their growing pythons, as their biceps went from baseball-sized to softball-sized and showed no signs of slowing down. Their triceps inflated to incredible size, with the slightest movement causing the giant, horseshoe shaped muscle to flex wildly. Even as they hung relaxed by their sides, their arms were a sight to behold.

Their tops became smaller as their transformations continued, until the vast majority of women were either wearing a tube top, which struggled to contain their volleyball-sized breasts as they walked or an athletic top of some sort, which showed off every curve in their massive upper bodies.

As their arms surged a little past 33 inches, Julie stopped. Looking around the mall, Steven was shocked at the vast differences between the sexes now. The women were all walking around like miniature versions of The Hulk, their massive physiques rippling with huge muscles, though they still retained their femininity. They strode confidently through the mall, walking quicker—perhaps due to the immense strength their legs possessed—while their boyfriends or husbands struggled to keep up.

This was in stark contrast to the men, whose arms and legs were like twigs now, while their bone structure was as light and thin as possible. They still had a little bit of muscle tone, but just enough, Steven guessed, to walk around without difficulty or to drive a car.

About the only similarity that he could find was that everyone had remained their original height throughout.

Glancing down at his own body, Steven realized he had suffered a similar fate as all the other guys. Flexing one of his arms, he was a bit upset to see a pitiful-looking bicep barely reveal itself to him. Taking his other hand, he easily wrapped it around his small bicep, feeling the muscle give as he squeezed it softly a few times.

“Like what I’ve done, Steven?” he heard a voice ask him. Turning around, he saw Julie, standing proudly before him, as she casually toyed with the necklace.

“You have to change things back,” he told her, almost pleading, as he stared in unbelief at Julie’s gargantuan arms. “This is too extreme!”

She looked around the mall, shrugging her wide shoulders as everybody went about their business as if nothing had happened. “These people don’t seem to mind.”

“That’s because you’ve changed reality somehow. To everyone here, it’s as if men and women have always been this way!” Steven was becoming flustered, afraid this was going to be his life, unless he could take the necklace back.

Julie giggled a bit at his reaction, as another muscle bound woman walked by, this time a 15 year old girl talking on her cellphone. “That’s what is so great about it! Nobody’s aware of anything except us. It’s perfect!”

“It’s not perfect for the guys,” Steven replied. “They’re too skinny. They’re…They’re too weak! You’ve turned us all into helpless little babies!”

“But isn’t that what you’ve always wanted?”

He was taken aback. “What I’VE wanted?”

“Yeah. I’ve been on your computer before. I’ve seen some of the stuff you’re into. Girls with muscle. Bodybuilders. Women my size.”

“When were you ever on my computer?” His face registered an expression of shock, as he realized, too late, what was going on. And why Julie wanted to use the necklace so bad. “Oh, my God. You’ve been stalking me, haven’t you?”

“I had to know what you were into, what your fetishes were. It was the only way I could get you to love me. I had to turn myself into your dream girl.” She started walking seductively over to Steven. “I’ve had a crush on you for the longest time; I’ve just been too shy to approach you. Why do you think I started dating Andy? Sooner or later, I knew the two of you would cross paths.”

“Okay, Julie,” Steven replied, backing up slowly. “You’re starting to scare me.”

“And now nothing stands between us. I know you’re not dating anyone at the moment. And as soon as I dump Andy, the two of us can finally be together. Just think of it: You and me. Together forever.”

“Julie, you’re clearly obsessed with me. You need help.” Backing into something hard, Steven looked behind him, only to realize he had backed himself into a corner. He was trapped.

“I’ve got all the help I need around my neck, little man,” Julie replied, as she closed the gap between them. With nowhere else to go, Steven was helpless as Julie grabbed him by the arms and playfully pulled him toward her. He plowed into her breasts with a grunt, as her massive arms wrapped themselves around his smaller body, pinning him in place.

He struggled ineffectually to escape, using every last ounce of strength he had left, but it was no use. She let it continue for a while, giggling as he tried to squirm away. Eventually giving up, Steven sighed, looking down slightly into Julie’s beaming face.

“See? You can’t run away from me now,” she said, lovingly squeezing Steven a few times, causing him to groan in pain. “Oops. I’m going to have to be careful with you, aren’t I?” She kissed him, loving every second as Steven’s struggles began anew.

She could feel his attempts to escape, but it felt like a 3 year old trying to escape from an adult. It was nothing more than an annoyance to her. Julie grinned. She finally had the man of her dreams, the man she had pined over for years, all to herself. This was the best day of her life.

Breaking off the kiss, Julie looked up at him, a little breathless. “You have no idea how long I’ve waited to do that.”

“Julie, you can’t be serious. This is crazy! Just return everyone to normal and give me the necklace, so I can destroy it.”

“Destroy it? Oh, come on. Don’t be silly.” She kissed him again. “There’s no way I’m letting this necklace out of my sight, not after I know what it can do. Now, follow me.”

She led Steven by the hand, as they made their way through the mall.

“Where are you taking me?” he asked, struggling to keep up.

“Oh, you’ll see,” Julie replied.

Liam had just left the video game store, when the invisible wave hit him. He was 12 years old, he wore tennis shoes, shorts, and a polo shirt. He was about 5 foot 4 inches tall, and he was skinny. He wasn't very muscular at all, but he definitely wasn't fat either.

Suddenly, Liam felt an odd, tingling feeling, which spread all over his body, and affected his muscles in particular.

"Darn... I hope I'm not coming down with the chills..." he thought, as his muscles tensed up, just as he stepped outside of the video game store, after playing several rounds of HALO3 on one of the machines. "Mom's gonna kill me if I get a cold now!"

Then, it happened. First, his calves ballooned outward from the back of his legs. His leg muscles just magically grew on their own, until they became big, round and hard.

"What the heck is going on?" he wondered, as he reached down and scratched his thick, hard calves with his finger.

Next, his quads began to swell in every direction. They expanded sideways and forward, with layers of muscle adding to his upper-legs. Liam now began to look like a professional soccer player, a wrestler, or a track star, with his incredibly muscled legs!

"Whoa there! How... What...???" he gasped, as the growth continued to crawl up his body.

Next, Liam's abdominals began to pop up and rise to the surface of his flat stomach while his entire torso began to push outward in both directions at the same time. It was as if his body was being pulled outwards, so it became wider. Mighty lats formed under his arms as his upper-torso, where his pectorals were, began to fill out while his pectorals started to swell as well. His shoulders and arms grew wider in the process, as his biceps, triceps, and forearms continued to fill out with rock-hard muscles at the same time.

"Man! What is going on with my body????" the boy cried as he surveyed the magical changes to his frame. He had grown wider, bigger and heavier in a matter of seconds! Not just that, but Liam felt the amazing surge of physical strength, which came paired with the increased muscles at the same time as well.

Finally, as his shoulders continued to widen, his arms spread out a little, and were no longer hanging straight down from his shoulders, but at a slight angle, just like a bodybuilder. The young muscle boy felt powerful and strong, as he ripped his shirt down the middle and tore his short at the seams as he took his first step. His glutes had become so big, and his muscles were so hard, that his clothing could no longer contain his expanding body.

"Oh, crap.... I just burst out of my clothes!" Liam sighed.

Just then, he heard a familiar voice.

"Oh, there you are! I've been looking all over for you!" a lady said, as she walked out of a store.

"Mom! I... Uhhh..."

"Liam! Did you have another growth spurt? Oh my goodness!" the lady said, as she turned to face her friend, who was walking next to her. "My son has been growing like crazy these days... I can't keep up with him... He outgrows everything I buy for him!"

"Yeah... especially boys... They tend to be so big and so muscular these days..." the other lady added.

"Come on, Liam... Follow me to the store... We have to get you some new clothes... Again..."

Liam followed his mother and her friend into the store, looking forward to trying on some new shorts and shirts. He was used to it, because he knew that he would outgrow them soon enough...

His mom had just stopped to get something inside Dillard's, the large department store, leaving Danny standing out by the entrance to the large store. Luckily, the entrance to the store was still located inside of the large, covered shopping mall, where the boy was surrounded by other shoppers who were admiring the glass display windows over a dozen other shops, that were neatly lined up in rows which were leading up to the large entrance of Dillard's.

Danny's cute, boyish face radiated with surprise, shock, delight and happiness all at the same time when he saw his reflection in the glass for the first time.

"Great Scot! Is that... ME!!??" he whispered to himself, as he flexed his arm and watched a mighty bicep pop up.

Just then, his mother walked up to him, as she had just came from Dillard's.

"There you are, Danny! I see you're admiring your muscles in the window again, huh? I called you three times, little muscle-man!" she said in a stern voice.

"Uhhh... I... But, mom! Look! Look at my muscles!"

"I know, Danny! You've always been so strong! And you're always looking at yourself in the mirror! Now, come along! We need to get you bigger shorts and shirts! You're about to burst out of these clothes again, because you're just growing too fast..." his mom sighed.

"Okay, mom... I'm with you!" the muscle boy grinned.

Together, the muscular boy walked, hand in hand, with his mom, so they could look for new clothes to wear. After all, Danny was a growing boy, and his current set of clothes were much too small for him...

It was then that Julie thought the better of either idea, as everyone was still looking at them with confused and sad faces.

So Julie and Steven left the mall quickly, realizing that the necklace and their wishes was now well known to those around them. Julie quickly made a wish that the people forgot about what had happened and by the time they hit the exit, everything was back to normal.

Julie was still intrigued. What if she made others more muscular and stronger? But who? As they walked along, Julie focused on a girl and her father. The man was large, wearing a muscle shirt that showed off his huge muscles. The girl was young, looking to be around 10. Julie crossed the street in order to get closer and listen to their conversation. Steven could only wonder what she was thinking.

The girl, Andrea, was complaining about their destination. “Come on Dad. Why do I have to go to the gym with you? It’s so boring.”

The father, Ted, grunted. “You can watch TV for a while. I’m not missing another work out.”

Julie began to think about what she was seeing. What if girls were bigger and stronger than anyone else, just like her idea in the mall? Or at least for a start, what about this girl? Rubbing the necklace, Julie smiled at the thought. What if the roles were reversed. Sure, the man could still be as big, but what if his daughter were even bigger and stronger? Or better yet, what if the girl joined him in his work out and grew huge, super strong muscles, eclipsing his size and strength? What if she became even stronger compared to him than he currently was to her?

With the last thought in her head, Julie made her wish and smiled. Steven looked at Julie.

“What did you do?”

Julie chuckled. “Want to find out?”

Shrugging his shoulders, he watched as the father and daughter walked into the gym. Julie stopped in front of the gym.

“Then follow me.”

Julie walked into the gym, and with another quick wish, she and Steven had membership cards. They then watched as Ted headed toward the free weights and began to lift a few weights to warm up. Cindy watched with little interest until she felt a tingling across her body. By the time she walked up to her Dad, he was already bench pressing 300 pounds. Another big man, Rich, was spotting him. Andrea walked up to Rich and looked up.

“Can I spot my Dad?”

Rich laughed and Ted sat up, clearly annoyed. “I thought I told you to stay in the other room.”

Andrea frowned, but moved closer to the weight, reaching out with both hands to curl her small fingers around the thick bar.

“You did. But I’m feeling pretty good today.”

And as Andrea tightened her grip around the bar, she tensed her body and her once non-existent muscles started to pulse and throb and grow all across her frame.

“In fact..”

And with surging confidence, Andrea pulled the 300 pound bar off the rack.

“I feel REALLY good!”

Andrea brought the bar down to her thighs that had doubled in size over the last few moments. In fact, all of her muscles had doubled in size. And they were still growing, stacking muscles on top of muscles. Rips and tears could be heard as her shorts tore up the sides against thickening thighs as the four distinct muscles of her quads burst forward, crackling and pulsing with intimidating muscle fibers and powerful striations. Her calves flared out into twin softball sized masses of muscle that leapt outward when she stood on her bare toes, showcasing the fact that the weight was barely taxing her legs.

By this time Rich had backed away, unsure of what to make of what he was witnessing. Ted had now stood up, looking down at his 4 foot 6 inch blonde haired daughter with surprise and awe. As her once stick frame continued to build with muscle, Andrea became more aware of her ramped up power.

“In fact, Daddy, I’m sure that this weight is more than you can curl. Am I right?”

Ted nodded weakly, still trying to comprehend what was happening.

As Andrea took a measure of the weight, she tensed her upper body and the already expanding muscles surged further, ripping her top up the sides and down the middle as her back thickened and widened and her chest surged forward with pectorals deep enough to challenge her father. As the destruction of her shirt continued, her abs were exposed, now writhing with muscle blocks and insane separation. Her waist was barely any thicker, but was sporting dense muscles and seemingly impossible separation.

One final breath pushed her massive pectorals a full foot away from her torso, shredding the remainder of her top into a pile of rags, most of which fluttered to the ground. Andrea smiled as she looked down to see her pectoral shelf and the inch thick slabs of muscles separate with striations that ran the length of her chest and became lost in her deep muscle cleavage.

Her arms were now a menagerie of bumps, grooves and muscles to put her father to shame. Muscles strong enough to hold 300 pounds with now minimal strain. And muscles strong enough to do something she had always wanted to do. To put her father to shame.

“So if I curl this weight Daddy, does that make me stronger than you?”

Once again, Ted nodded his head weakly.

And with a nasty grin now formed on her angelic face, Andrea did the impossible and pulled the weight upward with controlled force. And as soon as she touched the bar to her pulsing chest, she pulled the bar down again.

“Well then, Daddy. I guess I’m stronger than you. In fact….”

Bringing her hands together in the center of the bar, Andrea released one hand and brought her arm up into a front bicep pose.

“I’m much stronger than you.”

And as her father turned white, Andrea began to curl the 300 pound bar. With one arm! And as she did so with ridiculous ease, she started pumping her other arm, pushing more and more muscle into her bicep with every pump. Pressing her triceps thicker. Punching her forearm wider. Within moments Andrea had flexed up a bicep bigger than her father. And not just bigger, but better shaped and more defined. Holding her now 22 inch bicep pose for a moment, Andrea stared at her father.

“And my muscles are now bigger than yours too! I’m bigger, stronger and tougher than you already Daddy. A LOT stronger!”

Dropping the weight to the ground with loud clang, Andrea pulled her left arm up into a bicep pose, quickly matching the mass of right. She then tensed down hard and the muscles across her entire body expanded! Her biceps pushed out wider, pressing up against her thick shoulders and Popeye sized forearms. Her biceps pushed out thicker, spilling forward like some 3-D movie, inflating across her arm beyond the size of cantaloupes. And her biceps pushed up taller, with her peak rising up over her shoulders and riding up her forearm! Inch after inch of rippling, super strong, steel hard girl muscles slammed into her mighty biceps, pushing the circumference upward to until they were 32 world record breaking inches around!

“And my biceps are a LOT bigger!”

Julie looked on and smiled. Was Andrea done? Had her wish come to pass? Or was Andrea capable of more? And what about the other girls she saw in the waiting area? Should she make them stronger too? Reaching up to rub the necklace, Julie…..
