Only Steven/Claire had NO idea where to start. Opening the front door and seeing a mass amount of decaying T-Virus zombies and a big sign saying "Welcome to Racoon City" covered in blood...Steven/Claire had somewhat of an idea.

Closing the door and panicking, Steven/Claire looked for Rachel desperatley. There was a note saying she was at Steven's school for some reason. And she took the necklace.

So, Steven/Claire went out, braved the zombies...and ran for his/her life. Still, he/she was aiming for the school. He/she had to save Rachel! But a mysterious figure popped out of the shadows and it was:
1231.title: Claire Redfield. And there is a huge T-Virus ou...

choices: Jill became Jill Valentine with all of her memories of Resident Evil plus guns!
Jill became only physically like Jill Valentine.
12312.content:
Steven/Claire looked in awe and fear as the biggest snake ever "yawned". With this "yawn", it's razor sharp teeth were shown. And with that, Steven/Claire ran.

Running for his/her life, Steven pondered if he gave into Claire if he would survive. After all, she did in Resident Evil 2. Then again, he doesn't remember her fighting the Yawn. Maybe if he had Chris Redfield or Jill Valentine on his side...they beat the Yawn.


Eventually, he/she made it to the school. The school was locked to keep out the numerous zombies. So, Steven/Claire broke a window and jumped inside. It was a good thing the glass was fragile on that particular window thought the merging of Steven and Claire. It was a bad thing that the Yawn AND zombies were fast approaching.

Inside, Steven/Claire met up with Benjamin, Rachel and Jill. Explaining what happened, they all couldn't believe it. Rachel gave the necklace back to her brother (or sister, depending how you look at it). Knowing now that the necklace could and would screw them all over, Steven/Claire decided on a simple wish.

A wish that someone could save them. He was looking at Jill at the moment though...with puppy dog eyes. And the wish came true (or possibly partially true) as:
12312.title: Yawn. A giant snake from Resident Evil 1. And i...

123121.content:
Jill turned into Jill Valentine! Wow. She had her reddish/brownish hair, her street clothes from RE3 and importantly, she had a ton of weapons scattered around her feet. Now they could finally fight the Yawn. And the zombies.

Jill looked at Steven/Claire and said, "Claire, what's going on? I felt lightheaded fighting with your brother and now I'm here." Steven/Claire sighed and said, "The Yawn is back, zombies have taken over and we need someone to kill the Yawn and zombies. Then we need to get out of here." Jill said, "And where's here?" Steven/Claire responded, "Raccoon City."


Jill seemed startled and said, "Raccoon City has been nuked. It's gone." Steven/Claire said, "No, it hasn't not yet."

Then a radio in the room creepily turned on and they heard a message. "Raccoon City is set to be nuked in an hour, according to a conspiracy theorist. With their zombie outbreak, this could be the only option to stop an epidemic." Jill then decided to help Benjamin, Rachel and Claire (who she didn't know was also Steven).


They went out of the school and blasted away zombies with AK-47s, grenades and pistols. Then the Yawn appeared but it got worse. So did the Nemesis, a nearly unstoppable monster from RE3. Then they were surrounded by zombies.


Should Jill and the gang fight back? Or should Steven/Claire try the necklace again?
123121.title: Jill became Jill Valentine with all of her memo...

choices: A beautiful, powerful and muscular amazon!
A mystery insect with a stinger special!
12313.content: Here's another couple of interesting possibilities!
12313.title: Someone/something else?

choices: It has the power to create muscular amazons and faithful!
123132.content: because the sting of the insect and special? Simple, because who is the point ...
123132.title: A mystery insect with a stinger special!

choices: Rachel uses the necklace to change Dark Phoenix.
Rachel uses the necklace to change herself.
1232.content:
Steven woke up to find himself in the beautiful red-haired body of Jean Grey...in the Phoenix outfit. Yet he felt so much more powerful than just Jean Grey. Flames surrounded him like an aura, mysteriously not burning him or anything else. He felt hunger build up inside of him.

But he realized that this must be the hunger Dark Phoenix felt, which made her eat a universe. Yet he was so hungry, he couldn't help himself.

However, he first realized the necklace was missing. Then he thought "Good riddance. That necklace may have made me this goddess, but I have a feeling it would have just screwed me over." Then he wondered why he thought himself a goddess.

Looking at his new beautiful body, and feeling unlimited power surge through him, he realized why. No longer referring to "Steven" or things like "He" when it came to the person he now was, it was decided he was now Dark Phoenix. Forever.

Dark Phoenix burned down a wall of the room, by just thinking about it. Dark Phoenix then planned to feast on a universe, but first surveyed her beautiful body, burning with heat that only Dark Phoenix could handle. And Dark Phoenix somehow wanted to handle herself.

Meanwhile, Rachel had grabbed the necklace while Steven was asleep. Rachel went to see Steven, only to briefly see Dark Phoenix.

Dark Phoenix teleported to the stars, far away from Rachel. Dark Phoenix enjoyed her body to the fullest (which the only reason she did so, unknown to her, was because that was the last thing Steven wanted...and with that done, Steven was gone). She then teleported back to Steven's room, to meet the mere mortal Rachel face-to-face. Rachel was scared. To say the least. Still, Dark Phoenix only came back for the necklace, to make sure no one could use its power against her. And Rachel had it in her hands.

Dark Phoenix prepared to take the necklace, for once it was destroyed, she would devour this pathetic universe. Only Rachel stood in her way.

So what now?
1232.title: Dark Phoenix. And he's...I mean, she's ...

12323.content:
Dark Phoenix snatched the necklace with ease as Rachel was too scared to do anything. She then promptly burnt Rachel to a cinder. And on top of that, after destroying the necklace...

Dark Phoenix ascended to the stars and devoured the universe. This served to make her stronger, and she went on to end all existence. And that is why this is the end of the story.
12323.title: Dark Phoenix gets the necklace.

choices: Steven (as Rachel) was in a Japanese school girl outfit, Rachel in a boy one.
Steven was in a Princess Peach outfit, Rachel in a Mario one.
Steven (as Rachel) and Rachel(as Steven) were warped into one of Rachel's games.
1233.content:
Steven woke up, but he wasn't in his room. He recognized the room instantly as his little sister Rachel's room. "Why am I here...?" he asked himself, before he realized something was wrong.

He looked down and saw he was wearing Rachel's Sailor Moon PJs. "Why...?"

He climbed out and looked into Rachel's body mirror; he'd become Rachel. "If I'm Rachel, then..."

He ran to his room and saw Rachel, in Steven's body, standing in front of the mirror, making different anime expressions with Steven's body.

"What...?" he started.
"Oh hi!" said Rachel, hugging her former body. She saw the necklace on the dresser and picked it up, put it on, and continued making poses.

"You sure are taking this well," he said, a bit scared.

Suddenly...
1233.title: He's become Rachel and she's become Ste...

choices: L'École des Cinq Lumières Institute (Pretty Cure 5)
12331.content: There’s literally thousands of school uniforms so which ones are they in
12331.title: Steven (as Rachel) was in a Japanese school gir...

choices: An adventure! Mario (Rachel) saves Peach (Steven) from Bowser!
12332.content:
Steven (still in Rachel's body) suddenly found himself dressed as Princess Peach! His hair was even dyed and stylized to look like Princess Peach's hair! On top of that, thanks to the necklace, he was a dead ringer for Princess Peach...if she was real of course. He even aged to Peach's age and went through other changes to basically become Princes Peach completley!

Steven wanted to scream as he looked in the mirror. But he didn't...because he had another shock to go through first. Rachel (in Steven's body) was now in a Mario outfit (looking exactly like Mario...complete with mustache)! Rachel (Mario) was even as old as Mario now. She WAS Mario.


Oh my god, Steven (Peach) thought this was so wrong. SO wrong. But what could he do? Get the necklace. Get it and fix this! It had to be behind all of this.


But Rachel (Mario) did not want that. She got what she wanted thanks to the necklace. And that was:
12332.title: Steven was in a Princess Peach outfit, Rachel i...

choices: Robert, a school jock from Steven's school.
Jacob, a video game lover and school geek.
13.content:
Steven dropped the necklace on the ground. It was stupid even thinking he should put it on. Steven continued to walk home, when four people walked by. One of them noticed the necklace.

The necklace was calling out to this person. The person couldn't help but put it on. Who was it?
13.title: Leave it there.

choices: Everyone in the world becomes an animal. Excluding Samantha.
The world becomes like the Sonic games and Samantha is Amy Rose.
The world becomes like Pokemon and Samantha gets a Pikachu.
131.content:
Samantha slipped on the necklace. With it, she realized she could do anything. There were so many things going through her head though. She had just gotten back from a friend's house, Kayla's to be exact.

And she did a lot of things at her friend's house. She played with Kayla's dog and cat, as well as her many other pets. It seemed to her like she had every animal ever. If only people were as kind as animals...at least that was what she silently thought to herself.

Then there was her playing old Sonic the Hedgehog games with Kayla. Sonic was SO cool, being the fastest hedgehog, no, person ever. And she wished Amy Rose would get together with Sonic. Sonic, being a blue hedgehog would go well with a pink hedgehog. Even though Amy was pink, she was awesome in Samantha's mind. She even carries a giant mallet! You don't screw with her.

Finally, she was thinking about Pokemon briefly. Kayla had so much Pokemon stuff. It glanced through her mind that it would be cool to have a Pikachu (that little yellow cute thing that creates electricity). No, it would be cooler if the whole world was like Pokemon. Then she could become a trainer and become the best in the world. Like they say, "Gotta Catch 'Em All!"

The necklace decided to make one of her daydreams real...if possibly in altered fashion. Which one?
131.title: Samantha, a little girl.

choices: When she comes to everyone is standing around her and she still has the necklace
She wakes up, but someone else has the necklace
She doesn't wake up at all and someone else has the necklace
1311.content:
Samantha looked around, when she noticed that it was past seven. Her mother was late on calling her to dinner. She stood up and started her way downstairs.

"Mom, what's for dinner?" She called when she noticed a dog in the house. She jumped out of her skin. Her dad wouldn't ever alow her to have a dog, so what was the dog doing in the house.

"Dad? Did we get a dog?" She called but there was no response. Somewhere in the distance she heard the flutter of a bird. Something was going on.

She ran up the stairs to her brother's room and barged in without even knocking. "Where is Mom?" She called before she noticed a snake was eating a mouse on his bed. She screamed at the top of her lungs before the darkness overcame her.
1311.title: Animals

choices: Help Dr. Eggman...that can't hurt, right?
1312.content:
Samantha felt really, REALLY tired all of a sudden. Falling asleep. Then she fell asleep.

Waking up, she felt...different. She couldn't really describe it. And she was in some room with a mirror.

Then she looked in the mirror and squealed with glee. She had become Amy Rose! She was like a human hedgehog (like Amy Rose). I mean, she was a hedgehog...but she stood on two feet, had hands and everything. She was pink (like Amy Rose). And she was so cute in her pretty red dress (like Amy Rose)!

Why did she keep thinking she "like Amy Rose"? She WAS Amy Rose. The only thing missing was...wait! The mallet has behind her! Picking up her trusty mallet, Samantha now Amy Rose sped out of the weird room she was in and found herself on the streets.


A fight between Dr. Eggman and Sonic was breaking out nearby. Sonic was spindashing everywhere and breaking his robots. But Dr. Eggman's robot battlesuit allowed him to fire giant bullets everywhere. Still, Sonic was the fastest thing on the planet, so he didn't have much trouble dodging them. He was more than a hedgehog, he was like a blue blur.

While watching, Samantha/Amy Rose then saw a little kid come up to her. Samantha decided to introduce herself as Amy Rose. And like that, she forgot her name "Samantha". Sure she still had some of her personality and memories but Amy Rose was taking over.

And she liked it.


Amy moved the kid to safety, then went back to watch the fight. She enjoyed watching Sonic. Then she realized, she LOVED Sonic. He was so cute! ...But the remnants of Samantha had a naughty thought. What would happen if she helped Dr. Eggman? Or she could just go explore the rest of this "really cool" world.

What does she do?
1312.title: The world becomes like the Sonic games and Sama...

choices: The emeralds disappear, leaving Sonic helpless.
Dr. Eggman is gone for good and replaced with Dr. Robotnik.
13121.content:
The necklace was now starting to control her mind. While Samantha really had other ideas, Amy Rose's mind was starting to dictate her actions and right now, she wanted to help her spiny blue crush. Samantha's mind was completely helpless to control her new body as Amy's was completely dominant.

So Amy rushes to Sonic as he continues to fight Dr. Eggman. She starts smashing up the minions, giving Sonic the freedom to attack the egg-shaped villain. Eggman continues to fire more projectiles as Sonic, of course, is agile enough to avoid them.

One of the hands of Eggman's battlesuit extends out and grabs the blue blur as he is rushing away. He struggles to get free but realizes the only way to get free is to summon the almighty powers of Chaos Emeralds and transform into Super Sonic. So the seven colored stones magically appear out of nowhere to grant Sonic more power.

As she looks on as Amy, Samantha, finally regaining some control, starts thinking to herself "I wish Sonic couldn't use the emeralds all the time to get himself out of a mess. That's just so lame!" Amy however thinks, "That stupid Eggman should go away forever and leave my Sonic alone!".

What happens?
13121.title: Help Sonic of course.

choices: Eggman flies off, finally free to take over the universe.
131211.content:
It seemed easy enough to stop Eggman through the legendary power of the seven Chaos Emeralds but what if there was a twist? Sonic couldn't rely on the stones to help him out? The necklace was willing to make this a reality as it uses its weird powers to take control of the stones.

"W-what's going on?!" Eggman said.

The magical stones float around each other in an unusual manner and even up colliding each other. Things became even worse as they began their colors began to fade to a dull greyish color as if they were losing power. This began to come true as all of the stones began to glow and making strange noises and the unthinkable happens...

"No!!!" Sonic yells, as the Emeralds all implode right in front of his very eyes.

"Now you're mine!" Eggman laughs, as he reactivates his robosuit.

"Oh no! Sonic!" Amy gasps as she helplessly watches her hero continues to get mercilessly crushed by the grasp of the robosuit. His bones slowly crack, his limbs are dismembered and he starts coughing up large amounts of blood.

Amy just looks up in shock but Samantha is pleased greatly by this. After a few more minutes, Sonic's heart had finally stopped. He was completely mutilated. It was the end of a hero...
131211.title: The emeralds disappear, leaving Sonic helpless.

choices: Let's go already! I wanna be a Termination Machine!
I don't know...it sounds dangerous. Maybe some other time...
13122.content:
Amy decided to help out Dr. Eggman. Though Sonic was really cute, Amy wanted to play the "bad girl" role this time around, instead of the love interest or worse, damsel in distress.

Amy carefully snuck into the fight, and when Sonic was standing still (which rarely happens, but was a good opportunity)...she bashed his head with her mallet. Sonic was on the ground, unconcious. And Amy was the one to knock him out!

Wow, being bad shouldn't feel so...good! At least that was what she thought.

Amy wanted to keep the necklace to herself. So she decided to just hold onto it, until she could find a safe place for it.


Dr. Eggman came to see Amy, and thanked her for her assistance. Dr. Eggman picked up Sonic, and prepared to leave. Amy, however, said, "I help you beat you archenemy and I get nothing?!?"

Dr. Eggman thought about this and said, "I was going to make Sonic into a half-machine, half-hedgehog superpowered robot. Far more powerful than almost anything in existence. And brainwash him. But...you could be my first Termination Machine, if you desire. As long as you pledge your loyalty to me."

Amy thought about this and said:
13122.title: Help Dr. Eggman...that can't hurt, right?

choices: Join Dr. Eggman and form an evil duo!
Forget about Dr. Eggman and let Amy do whatever she wants!
131221.content:
Amy replied, "Let's go already! I wanna be a Termination Machine!"


Amy followed Dr. Eggman to his hideout. Even with his superfast battlesuit, she was faster and often stuck her tongue out at him. Dr. Eggman didn't really like this, but allowed her to anyways.

Arriving at Dr. Eggman's warehouse hideout, Amy found a futuristic-looking elevator. Dr. Eggman pressed a combination of buttons on it, and it opened up. Amy and Dr. Eggman stepped inside, and were taken down into an amazing technologically based and egg shaped lair.

Dr. Eggman told Amy to step inside a tube, which she nervously did, after putting her mallet aside. Blue liquid filled it as she fell asleep. A few hours later, she woke up.


Amy stepped out of the tube after the liquid was drained. She didn't feel any different. Dr. Eggman pulled up a large mirror for Amy. Amy had small mechanical parts on her arms and legs, and her cute hair had some technology-based "extensions". Oh well...at least she was still cute. To her, anyways.

Dr. Eggman informed Amy that her physical attributes were enhanced to thousands more than the average human. Superhuman strength, speed (more so than before), agility, everything. She could even jump over whole skyscrapers and land safely. Plus, if she thought about it, she could turn her arms into rocket launchers with infinite ammo and back! This was going to be cool...

As for her mallet, it was even made to be more dangerous, capable of knocking down entire walls! Wow.


Dr. Eggman then attempted to tell Amy to go wait for him in another room. But the way Amy saw it, she never "pledged her loyalty". And she still had the necklace somehow. Hmm...should she be evil and join Dr. Eggman? Or just do whatever she wants?
131221.title: Let's go already! I wanna be a Termination ...

1312211.content:
Samantha asked Dr. Eggman to be his partner and become evil. Eggman agreed and soon Sonic became a powerful robot. Then Samantha, Eggman, and Sonic became an evil trio that destroys the whole town. There were millions of dead bodies.

Samantha then returned to the normal world and thought of something else.
1312211.title: The trio

131222.content:
Amy decided that joining Dr. Eggman was dangerous. So, she declined and moved on. It was ironic because she already helped him with Sonic.


It was even more ironic when the following day, robots took over the Earth, led by a half-robot Sonic. And when she attempted to use the necklace, it was too late. A robot caught her demonstrating free will and arrested her, but not before destroying the necklace in a skirmish.

The robots were being controlled by Dr. Eggman. Now Emperor Eggman. Of the world.


Emperor Eggman visited Amy in her cell and told her he was sorry she didn't join him. But now she didn't have a choice.

As Emperor Eggman turned around, robots came into Amy's cell and injected her with something. She became half-robot almost instantly herself and walked over to Emperor Eggman. She bowed to him and said, "I am yours to command, Emperor Eggman."


Emperor Eggman smiled at this. With Amy's free will gone, Eggman ruling the world and no necklace, the story doesn't seem to end sunny side up.

But it still ends.
131222.title: I don't know...it sounds dangerous. Maybe s...

choices: Make him become Betty by possession. And love it. Without wanting to turn back.
Make him the strongest person in the world. At the price of his intelligence.
Make him the fastest person ever. So fast, the world stands still when he moves.
132.content:
Robert saw the necklace. Wondering why no one else grabbed it, he picked it up. Putting it on, he realized he could have anything.

He was the school jock but there was always room for improvment. He could the strongest person in the world. Or the fastest.

Then he thought being the strongest could make him way, way too buff. Would girls go for the Hulk? Would his strength consume him? And being that fast...if he moved, the rest of the world wouldn't. Well, at least that last one didn't make sense. And the "consume" part about strength? What the hell did that mean?

There were so many thoughts going through his head about athletes and sports. He stopped to remember his popular girlfriend, Betty. She was so pretty, and they'd been dating on and off for almost a year...yet he never go to look, LOOK at her, if you know what I mean. She looked so good, he could only imagine her in the shower or other various places. He felt sort of bad thinking those kind of thoughts, but then thought that it can't be bad being a pretty girl. With your looks it must be fun. Maybe he'd love it. But that would never happen, would it?

Robert stopped thinking about that, feeling somewhat naughty for it.

The necklace was trying to make him consider the consequences, for fun, since it was too late anyway.

The necklace then decided to:
132.title: Robert, a school jock from Steven's school.

choices: Try to change everything back to normal. Instead, something else happens.
Slow himself down. That should work, right?
1323.content:
Robert decided that being the fastest person ever would be fun. And so did the necklace.

Robert looked ahead of him, and saw nothing seemed to have changed. People were moving about, doing their business. Until Robert took a single step.

As he did so, the world seemed to stay still. Everything stopped but him. He ran for a bit, and he was fast. He travelled across the whole world in milliseconds. But as long as he was moving, even the slightest, everyone just stopped.


This could be a very lonely life he decided. But the speed...it was exhilarating! He could go anywhere, get away with anything! Could he possibly get faster?

He decided to use the necklace to:
1323.title: Make him the fastest person ever. So fast, the ...

choices: try to go back to normal.
13232.content:
Robert decided to slow himself down. Sadly, the necklace made him very slow.

Now everyone and everything was moving at a normal pace and he was moving slower than a snail. No matter what he did, he was slower than a snail. He could tell, because he watched a snail move faster than him.

He had to fix this...so he used the necklace to:
13232.title: Slow himself down. That should work, right?

132321.content:
The necklace gave Robert a boost of acceleration and he moved up in speed until he resumed a normal pace. He sighed with relief as he approached high school territory.

"Hey, Robbie!" he heard a female voice yell.

Robert looks to the side to see his girlfriend Betty, waving at him. He waves back at him and starts walking to her. Betty was the perfect girlfriend. With her inexplicable charm and convincing actions, this buxom brunette had Robert wrapped around his finger.

What happens next?
132321.title: try to go back to normal.

choices: The necklace does something weird to them
1323211.content:
So Robert walked up to his lovely girl and the two of them gave each other a big kiss on the lips. After a couple of minutes passed, they let go of each other. What a long kiss...but that was when Betty had something to say.

"That was cool what you did back there!" She exclaimed.

"W-what? What are you talking about? He stammered.

"Silly Robbie!" she giggled "I saw you going all fast and slow like that! That was amazing!"

"No no, it wasn't like that..." he gasped.

"Robbie, Robbie..." she sighed "We made a vow not to hide any secrets from each other, remember? Don't tell you've gone back on that already."

"You're right, I'm sorry..." Robert said, kissing her on the cheeks.

"Apology accepted" She smiled "So what's the story on the speed?"

Without hesitation, Robert then took the necklace around his neck off and displayed it in front of Betty.

"Oh my god, it's so gorgeous!" She said. "This is what gave you powers?"

"Pretty much..." he sighed.

What now?
1323211.title: She saw everything that happened

132322.content:
Maybe being fast again would work out well. But how fast? How about time-defying fast?

Sure it didn't make sense but Robert ran so fast he defied time. He ran around until he stopped, seeing another student looking in a dumpster.

Robert realized what was happening. The student picked the necklace out of the dumpster. He wondered aloud about using it. Robert hoped he could talk without everything standing still and he could. As long as he didn't move.


Robert said, "That necklace will screw you over. Trust me."

The student said, "Who are you? ...Wait, Robert Jacobs? You're a legend! I mean...it's cool seeing you. Gotta go." The student turned to leave with the necklace.

Robert said, "My turn to ask...who are you?"

The student replied, "Steven. But I really should get going."

Robert replied, "Just don't use that necklace, okay?"


Robert then ran off, disappearing somewhere in time, hoping he helped.


Steven looked at the necklace and thought:

I have three choices.

"It's interesting...might as well try it on."

"Maybe when I get home, then I'll try it."

"Leave it here."


Steven thought those choices sounded really familiar.


And this story came to an end, as a new one opened up.
132322.title: become really fast again.

choices: Robert begins to appear everywhere at once in the universe.
Robert breaks through reality as he knows into a differnt plane of existance.
13233.content:
He decided to go faster. Way faster.

While he had been nearly light-speed before (the reason why the world seemed to stop), he was WAY beyond that now. He could move so fast that he could pull a Chuck Norris and punch himself in the back of the head.

On the other hand, now Robert was free. He didn't have to worry about any sort of consequences, as he could move several times the speed of light with ease. He did whatever he wanted. Robert didn't care.

He loved this speed. Unknowingly though, the necklace granted his wishes for more and more speed, and he got it. 5 times the speed of light turned into 10, and 10 into 50. And that fifty into one hundred. And faster and faster and faster! The world hadn't even moved a second from the moment he made himself even faster.

Five hundred times the speed of light became a thousand, and a thousand into five thousand. And still faster he went, now traveling through the unvierse. After all, when you're moving at 10,000 times the speed of light, you don't need to breathe.

But all this speed would backlash on him, but what exactly would that be?
13233.title: Become even faster.

choices: A Robert manages to get rid of the other Robert copies.
The Roberts fight with each other over who the original is.
132331.content:
Robert stopped for awhile at "only" 100,000 times the speed of light. Anywhere he wanted to be in the galaxy, he was. He moved so fast it was almost like he hadn't moved. Even so, that began to feel rather "slow" to him. He wanted to travel ANYWHERE at ANYTIME! He wanted to be so fast that no matter where something was, he could be there!

So "soon" (relatively speaking) after reaching 10k times the speed of light, Robert had grown bored of even that. So it upped the speed even more! 500k, 1 million, 2 million, and so on! He stopped at 100,000,000 times the speed of light. (For a more direct number, that's 67,061,662,900,000,000 miles per hour or 107,925,284,880,000,000 kilometers per hour.)

Robert had his "wish" granted soon enough. He really was moving anywhere he wanted to without needing to try. He was anywhere he wanted, and he would "slow" down when he wanted to actually look at something. He found out that the universe was four things:

1. It was small. Seriously. He thought there was more room.
2. George Lucas was right! There really was a galaxy far far away!...Well, not that far. It was in fact just the Andromeda Galaxy that had everything from Star Wars in it. Though he saw no Empire and Rebels duking it out, but he did see planets like Coruscant and Naboo with the various SW species on them.
3. Outside of the Milky Way and Andromeda galaxies...the unverse was pretty empty and dull. There was life, yes, but nothing really special.
4. He saw none other than Mario flying around galaxies as well. Which weirded Robert out more. And poor Mario ended up hitting Robert unknowingly and flying off towards a much more difficult galaxy than the one he was heading towards originally.

After looking more at the Star Wars galaxy, Robert found a mostly empty galaxy (as in, no life). Then he flew through a random and nearby star, causing it to supernova! He did it to a few more stars, and simply moved faster than the nova shockwave to escape. This was pretty fun, but ever since he had gotten so fast, Robert constantly felt like he was seeing double, then triple, and so on.

He couldn't shake it. He kept having visions of other places in the universe, even though he might not be near that place. He soon got an answer, when he ran into himself. Yep, he had moved so quickly that at some point he had...copied himself. This was followed up by another Robert suddenly appearing! Then another Robert joined the group, but said he had been moving around the universe.

As time continued, more Roberts appeared. Four became a dozen, a dozen to 50, 50 to 200, and so on. More and more and more!

Robert (and he greatly hoped he was the original one, and not a copy), wanted to try and do something. But he couldn't figure out what to do. He had to figure out something soon, as the Roberts (who will still growing in number) were starting to argue amongst themselves by declaring "I'm Spartacus!" (To which they quickly corrected themselves by saying "I'm Robert!")
132331.title: Robert here, Robert there, Robert everywhere!

choices: A Grade 9 teenager. Back to high school!
133.content:
April picked up the necklace with awe. It looked so great, she had to put it on. Thinking about her day, she remembered that she had conned quite a few people. The saying, "I have a bridge I'd like to sell you..." She did sell a bridge. Too bad she sold it to some high school kid who didn't know better.

Thinking of high school, April kind of missed high school. Then again, high school doesn't pay the bills and she'd do ANYTHING to be rich.

But how did she go from high school to being a con artist? With her looks, she could be a supermodel or something. Why did she become a con artist?

The question bothered her. It always had. But she did what she had to. She always got by somehow. Still, she felt like she didn't have any real friends. Like she was some sort of alienated...alien. Oh well, a shot of cheap beer and she wouldn't ponder these questions for a while.

But before she could get that shot, the necklace made her:
133.title: April, a beautiful con artist.

April felt dizzy, as if the world was spinning. Her eyes were somehow forced closed, and when they opened...she was a teenager again. She was also in a school.

Walking around the school, she got to the office and asked what was happening. The secretary there replied, "You're late for a class." April then replied, "No, seriously, one moment I'm an adult and now I'm..." The secretary interrupted and said, "You never were. You're a Grade 9 student. Now get to class."


April walked out, confused. Maybe she could use the necklace to fix this? The necklace must have done this somehow. Before she could do anything though, she accidentally bumped into:

Jill looked down at this Grade 9 student with disgust. She wasn't worthy to bump into her. Jill was popular and this student was new.

Jill replied cruelly, "Mine's Jill. Queen of the school for your information."

April replied with interest, "Queen? Like you rule the school? Or are you just stuck up and believe you're way too popular?"

Jill almost yelled, "I don't have to take this from you, you little..."

April interrupted and said, "You know, you'd be popular with the Grade 9's if you helped them out. Then they could talk about you. Then when they graduate, they'll have told people about you. And you'll be a school legend. Forever."


Jill liked the thought and said, "I could show you around quickly. No one minds if I miss a class anyways."

April fully assumed Jill's identity through learning about her from conversation. She got her mannerisms down, her clothing, and so much more. She was almost as much of a jerk too.

Jill, meanwhile, as April kept complaining about switching bodies but no one believed her.

"Jill" then realized if someone else got the necklace, it could ruin everything. She could break it, hide the remains and stay Jill and enjoy high school as "Queen". Or she could keep it for later...

April and Steven couldn't believe their eyes. They were looking at something out of a fairytale. It was simply beautiful.

A magnificient grassy hill spread out across an amazing valley. There were even small waterfalls surrounding an amazing pool/fountain structure. They heard amazing tales of April and Steven's love, and also of Steven's becoming a millionaire businessman and April becoming the world's most famous actress and model (also a millionaire). And their kids were always happy, and they lived a perfect life in perfect happiness.

Jim walked to the announcement board at school, and he began hearing a female voice ringing in his ears the whole time.

“Darn, is this my cell phone going off the whole time?” he mumbled to himself. “I keep on hearing voices, like somebody’s trying to talk to me…”

“Well yeah, dude…” Jim then said out loud, even though it was a girl’s voice coming out of his mouth. “I’m the one who’s trying to talk to you the whole time!”

Jim quietly stayed behind in the hall, and then he snuck into an empty classroom where he sat in a chair, in the back row.

“Okay… Who keeps on talking to me?” Jim whispered.

“Me… My name is Jill!” the female voice spoke, coming from Jim’s mouth.

“Uhhh… Where are you, Jill?”

“I’m inside of you, Jim. You’re possessed by me and I can’t get out of you for the time being…” Jill responded.

“What the heck? I got a girl, living inside of my body?” Jim wondered out loud.

“Yes! I was wished into a ghost by the necklace and I needed a body to occupy in order to stay alive. I got teleported to school, and the first one I saw was you, so… I guess we’re sharing your body for the time being!” Jill chuckled.

“You mean, you can see everything I do? You hear everything?” Jim asked quietly, like he was talking to himself.

“Yes, I hear all your thoughts and I know all your feelings, Jim…” she chuckled. “Maybe I can help you get a girlfriend?”

“Uhhh… Yeah…” Jim smiled.

“Well, then… we might help each other out!” she replied.

Jim laughed. Sharing a body with a girl wouldn’t be so bad after all…

The necklace flooded April with thoughts to make her give up. Words like "futile" or "meaningless" were linked to her thoughts of fighting back. However, she kept fighting back. She fought with all her resolve. She could feel herself almost hitting each horrible word and cruel thought.

April tried to get up but fell to the floor, her body aching all over. It felt like her body was shredding itself to pieces. Why did it have to hurt so much? Regardless, April continued on. She could see the necklace in her head. She unleashed a barrage of mental punches on it.

April continued to sprint frantically around the high school until she is abruptly stopped by some force. No, it wasn't a force...it was Benjamin who she bumped into as he was walking away from in front of her.

"Huff..." she pants, attempting to finally catch her breath "I found you..."

"Never mind, just help me up!" April interrupts, still struggling to regain eyesight.

Benjamin takes April to a bench where they sit down and wait a few minutes for April's temporary blindness to go away.

1332.content:
The thought of being a supermodel took hold and the world began to spin around April. She gasped and shut her eyes as reality shifted. And when she opened them she found herself in a forest. A strange, seemingly animated forest. She looked around and saw a small cottage behind her. She looked down and noticed that she was near a stream. And in that stream was her reflection. She was beautiful, in fact she could sense she was the most beautiful, or the fairest in the land. April blinked. She had become.

Snow White! Holy cow. And that must be the house where the 7 dwarfs live! Touching the necklace, she suddenly realized that she must have wished this and the necklace granted it. Taking stock for a moment, she figured she was in the middle of the movie. Already chased away from her home, but not yet fooled by the wicked witch. And then her thoughts shifted again.

How could thinking about being a super model do this? Standing back up she touched her clothes. Very outdated. She had the beauty of a model, but not the super part. Her random thoughts shifted again. This about more than wishing for her prince to come. This was about more than being the fairest in the land. This was about…

Being the most “super” in the land. And at that point she began to feel waves of energy pore over her. Her dainty body hardened as she became incredibly powerful. Blinking as reality continued to warp around her with random thoughts, her mind rested on who would be challenging her to the most super in the land. The only one that made sense was Superman himself. He would be the only one who could challenge her.

The winds whipped around her and reaching her arms out, she felt even more energy blast into her body! Incredible strength and ability washed across her body. Within moments her feet were no longer touching the ground! She was floating! No, she was flying. Just flying in a hover mode. Dizzy from the incredible power now pounding throughout her body, April allowed herself to drop back to the ground. If she were now strong enough to challenge Superman, these clothes had to go. Now smiling as if this were all predestined, she slipped off the long skirt to reveal a spandex bottom of the same color, barely covering her behind. She wore modest ankle high boots that were the same color as Snow White’s shoes. Giggling now, she unclasped the top from behind and pulling her arms out, let the top fall to the ground at her feet, sporting a crop top spandex top with the Superman S on the chest and W superimposed behind it. Was it for Snow White or Super White? If it was Super Snow White she needed another S. The spandex showed off her midriff and the sleeves barely covered her shoulders. The color scheme matched the top lying at her feet. She was still Snow White. But a Super Snow White!

Wrinkling her nose, she started verbalizing her thoughts to try and keep things straight.

“OK! I really am a super model now! I’m guessing I have super powers. I already know I can fly.”

Walking toward a large tree, April reached out and ripped it out the ground with ease, holding the 50 foot tree above her head! Smiling, she tossed the tree into the air and it sailed up and out of sight! Holy cow, just how strong was she?

“Well, super strong apparently!”

Rubbing her chin, she looked around, smiling as she could now see for miles, and through solid rock. She could see the dwarfs hard at work in the mine. And as she looked in another direction, the landscape changed. Far away was the city. Metropolis apparently.

“So that’s where Superman must be.”
1332.title: The world's hottest supermodel.

choices: April brings Super Man back to her reality
13321.content: To lure him to her she used the power of the necklace to think of Lois Lane hanging from a tv tower . In the distance she could make out Lois Lane flailing her legs, and could hear her screaming for help. April felt kind of bad but really wanted to meet her version of Super Man she conjured up in her mind, becoming real through the necklace. In an instant she saw a red blur hurtle across the sky, scooping up the helpless, weak mortal. Super Snow White (April) took off at an incredible speed, following the red blur closely. All of a sudden it dropped to the ground leaving Lois Lane and started bowling towards April.

Nodding her head, her thoughts shifted again. “Now if I remember correctly, the evil queen, or in this case Superman, wanted to eliminate Snow White because she, not the queen was the fairest in the land! So if that’s the case, Superman must want me out the way because…”

Laughing, April finished her thought. “I’m the most Super in the land, not him!”

Chuckling, April licked her lips. “Well if that’s the case, and I’m the most Super in the land, then I should sport a body more super than his too!”

And just like that, April’s silky white body began to pulse. And her muscles began to grow. Laughing, April could sense what was happening.

“I was already stronger than him with the body of Snow White. Only now…”

Muscles began to expand across April’s body, but not just any muscle, but super muscles! Her thin legs pressed out with slabs of unreal muscles, first big enough to match Superman and then just as quickly to surpass him! Her calves expanded to 14 inches and then to 16 and then to the size of cantaloupes, literally pulsing with super strength! Her thighs thickened and pressed forth waves of muscle fibers that multiplied into twin pillars of strength 18 inches wide and 12 inches thick! Her midsection remained narrow, but her stomach soon sported a solid six pack that quickly became an 8 pack and then a 10 pack! Soon muscles ran up the sides as her obliques pressed forward more muscles than April had previously even know existed! Her back widened and her chest pushed forward, stretching the spandex out. Soon her modest chest had morphed into a set of super powered double D’s backed up with a set of pectorals strong enough to bench press the entire city of Metropolis! Her nipples tented the material as the insignia warped outward. Smiling, April reached her arms out and pulled her rippling forearms up. Giggling she could hardly believe what she was seeing as her biceps consolidated into twin spheres the size of softballs, with two deep bowed triceps. And then they began to grow, expanding out in every direction as the peaks crept up her forearms. And the bigger her biceps grew, the stronger she became!

As the legend goes, once upon a time there was a man of unsurpassed power - a true Superman. Amongst a world of mortals his power and might were unchallenged. And he remained unchallenged in power until another infant arrived rocketed from the stars. Feeling a kinship for the infant, he adopted her as his own and raised her. He used the advanced science of his fortress to confirm that this child was in fact Kryptonian, her rapidly growing strength providing further evidence of this.

But as this child, who he called April, grew, she changed. She did not adopt her adoptive father's morality. Nor did her strength grow at the pace his had when he was growing up - instead it grew FASTER. One day he took her to his friend Dr. Hamilton to test her limits and afterwards he asked:

"Emil, Emil of Star Labs, who's the most Super in the land."

Of course, these were not his exact words, but legend tends to change things. Similarly altered by legend, his friends response.

"Superman you are strong by far, but April's might is without par."

Dr. Hamilton had discovered that April's Kryptonian DNA had been modified by the science of Darkseid to make her far more powerful than Superman - she had been a trap sent by the despot as part of his longest term gambit against the Man of Steel.

The Dark Knight would take the girl into the woods and there slay her using the myriad of tools he had acquired over the years for protection against Kryptonians - a kryptonite ring, a kryptonite bullet, a red sun cannon.

His impact with Antarctica created a crater in the subcontinent hundreds of feet deep, kicking dirt and ice enough into the atmosphere that it would have killed all life on the planet, had April not followed behind and used her super lungs to inhale the deadly sun blocking cloud and cough it out as a highly compressed object with density greater than diamond.

1332212.content:
It is true that Clark Kent, Superman, had been the strongest man on planet Earth, but April was the strongest woman and had destroyed him. The man of steel was still recognizable, for his hard body did not break as a human's body would have, but the impact was more than he could take.
Drunk with power, April hoisted Superman up, careful not to destroy the corpse. This was her trophy, after all. With great speed she flew off to Metropolis.

With a crash April landed in City Hall, her beautiful face beaming with pride. The crowds were beginning to gather.
"I am Super Snow White" she boomed aloud. Her voice shook the city. "I am Super Snow White, much more powerful the Superman ever was, and I will now be your protectress." But the townspeople did not know her. They began to murmur. The Murmur turned into a roar as people began to shout. Most did not believe it for, to them, Superman was invincible, but those that saw the scene were afraid. By this point Superman's body was oozing blood. His blue and red clothing was ripped in many places. He looked deformed. Seeing the people's displeasure, April began to become angry.
"Did the people not want a more powerful protector?" she thought.
Across the square was a highly reflective building, and in the building's mirror-like surface she saw her image. Her once beautiful body appeared distorted. Her face shone with its former beauty, but was filled with horror at the sight of her enormous muscles. They contributed to her power, but their sheer size made her look grotesquely masculine. In anger she took Superman's body and began to rip it apart, throwing limbs and organs about aimlessly, striking and killing many citizens.
Sirens blared.
Gunshots echoed through the streets.
But these people had no weapon to defeat this arch-villainess, except for one boy. His weapon lay unrealized, unknown, and wholly of the enemy.
You see, in her greed for size and strength, April's magical necklace had become too tight to span her enormous neck. In her zeal to snatch up Superman, she dropped the necklace from her hand (for she had no pockets.) Young Samuel Kent had been walking with his father when he was forced aside, necklace in hand. He awoke from a stupor to hear the horrors at city hall. and 10-year-old Samuel ran very fast towards the din, (for he was half Kryptonian his mother being Lois Lane Kent and father Clark Kent), putting on the necklace as he ran. As he watched the monstrosity of a woman defile his father's body, he made straight for her, running at full speed, imagining her strength matchless to his own. He imagined that as he struck her he would pass right through her abdomen, pulling her life fully out of her.
April looked towards him and laughed. She laughed haughtily and with spite, too proud of her strength and power to move. How could a little boy be a threat to her? At the last moment, too late to react, she noticed, to her horror, the neckless upon the boy's neck. Just as Samuel had imagined, he dove for her, hands outstretched and clasped together before him. As he struck her, between the navel and the sternum, his hands pierced her and he passed on through, leaving in his wake a gaping hole of mangled flesh. An ungodly profusion of blood poured from her gory mass, covering the city hall steps in a red river.
Samuel was beside himself with his newfound power.
"Where did it come from?" he thought. He next imagined her diced into a thousand pieces. When he gestured towards her, it happened. As if invisible knives were cutting her, she was slowly severed into death. She stared up at him, incredulous, desperate. But in due time, she expired.
By this point Samuel had an inkling of how these incredible things were happening. Townspeople were cheering him left and right, reporters asking him what happened and how. Jimmy, from the Daily Planet, stood in front of him, taking pictures without ceasing.
"Hey, Sammy, how'd ya like my new digital camera? You're father helped me pick it out!" But Samual was devastated. His father's remains were strewn all about, and no one knew that Superman had in fact been Clark Kent, his father. He imagined with all his might that Clark was alive again, but nothing worked. He could not bring him back to life.
Sam's mind was racing. He was scatterbrained. He thought of his homework, his reading, his math problems for school; all were fleeting thoughts. Then he remembered vividly the book his father was reading to him just the night before: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets. How Samuel loved it when his father would read him stories!
Just then a woman screamed in a high pitch: "AHHHHHHHHH!!!" Samuel wheeled around to see an enormous snake strangling a woman's husband. All those that looked upon the beasts eyes collapsed to the ground. "I'm not ready for this," whimpered Samuel subtly.
"Ready or not, here we come!" yelled a young British voice from behind. Just then, three figures came flying in, all riding what appeared to be brooms! One held a sword, and, dangling from the end of the sword, was a shining silver necklace. The 3 were hurtling towards the snake while one of the 3 blinded it with a burning ball of fire. Yet again, young Samuel was beside himself.
"Hey, that's MY necklace!" he yelled aloud.
"Finders keepers!" Screamed the red-haired boy.
"That's not nice, Ron!" Screamed the girl flying with them. "We'll give it back to you," she yelled back.
"Hell, we won't!" said the dark-haired one. "Blimey, Hermione, why would I give something back which I've rightfully stolen? It's not as if HE's gonna chase after us."
There was a pregnant pause.
...
"Er, Harry?" said Ron.
Samuel had never fully learned how to fly. He had only jumped very high, but his father had been coaching him for a long time, confident that with proper effort he could, in fact, learn. Now was the time, for when the three broom riders looked back, Samuel was hurtling towards them, arms outstretched.
"Oy!" said Harry.
"Yikes!" said Ron.
"Ahhh!" screamed Hermione.
"FLY!" they all said aloud. As quickly as they could, they flew towards the sky. They forgot about the Basilisk, the giant, now-blinded snake currently feasting on the citizens of Metropolis. They had been aiming to destroy it, but now that they were fleeing for their lives they had little choice but to leave. Their brooms were fast, especially Harry's, but Samuel was steadily gaining.
Turning around and pointing his wand directly at the boy, Harry yelled: STUPEFY! Samuel fell like a sack of rice, crashing through a stained-glass skylight of the Cathedral down below "This is weird" thought Harry. They were soaring along, heading back to Hogwarts Castle, when Harry got to thinking. He had put the necklace on by now to avoid losing it. He had thought, up to this point, that it was a mere trinket, no more than a precious heirloom. What does Harry conjure up?

Hilda saw Jill, yanked her aside with her tail, and batted down an evil demon that had been ready to pounce on Jill from behind with a large wooden cross, then struck him again, somehow reverting him to his mortal form. "It is dangerous in here. We must flee." She takes Jill's hand as the good demons fall back for the front door.

As they make it out, Jill sees only the school changed; it was now a Hell-Mouth; a gateway to Hell. Cops had come out of the woodwork, surrounding the vortex and scratching their heads at the people that looked like demons but didn't act like demons fleeing from it.

Jill wondered, "What about Steven?"
1423312.title: Screams and yells: everyone is fully aware of t...

choices: Reality Changes So That They Believe That They're Supposed to Be Goths
The Ones Who Change Into Goths Freak Out and Feel Disgusted By Their Looks
142332.content:
Jill pushed her way through the crowd of hecklers and walked to her locker, still in her sullen mood. If she had turned around and looked at her hecklers, however, she would have noticed that they were starting to change. If they weren't a Goth already, then they soon would be. And all types too. Punk goths, witch-type goths, cybergoths, and more. As it turned out, anyone who ridiculed Jill would be changed into a Goth by the necklace. It was a Goth transformation curse!

But how will all of them react to their transformations?
142332.title: A Goth Transformation Curse!

choices: Store it in his backpack for later
143.content:
16 year-old Benjamin was just heading out of the library. He was sure that he saw his best friend Steven was hobbling around the nearby alleyways but he had already vanished by the time he entered in it. Steven was pretty much his only friend as everyone else would put him down for his nerdy obsession with sci-fi/fantasy hybrid books. Little did he know was that he had already attracted attention from a few lovely young ladies in school, who were also most likely bookworms. Would he ever find out of this? Maybe...not.

Benjamin just sighed and sat down on the ground, reaching into his backpack for a book to dig into. He was about to read aloud when he noticed the necklace glowing right next to him.

"What's this?" He said, reaching down and picking it up "It looks like something out of "Epicly Awesome Space Dragon Voyager 8000"."

What should he do next?
143.title: Benjamin, Steven's best friend

choices: Benjamin runs into Steven at school
Benjamin runs into other friends at school
Benjamin makes another wish and activates the necklace again
1432.content:
Benjamin stared at the odd necklace and contemplated for a moment what to do with it. He was about to stuff it back into the backpack, but, the strange piece of jewelry seemed to almost call out to him, with its weird, magical, bright blue glow.

“Gosh, that strange glow is kinda… weird…” he sighed. “Oh, I guess I might as well wear it around my neck…”

Benjamin unclipped the necklace and placed it around his neck. Then, he fastened the clips. Instantly, the necklace seemed to shrink, tightening around his neck. It still fit snug; however, it almost fit tight enough, as if nobody would ever be able to remove it from around his neck, except him.

“That’s strange… I thought the necklace was looser than this…” he shrugged. “Oh well… It’s mine, now!”

Just then, one of the football players from school came walking towards him, carrying a big notebook binder under his right arm. The big, muscular boy recognized Benjamin and he signaled for Benjamin to come towards him.

“Hey, Ben! Did you go to that Creative Writing class this morning?” the big and tall boy asked him.

“Hey, Mitch! Yes, I was there. Why?”

“I missed class this morning, bud! Listen, dude! Lemme have your notes!” Mitch replied.

“What? No way! I need those notes for the test! Go get them from somebody else! That’s what you get for skipping class all the time!” Benjamin replied angrily.

Mitch became angry and extended his big, muscular arm, and grabbed Benjamin by the shirt collar.

“Listen, twerp! Gimme your notes NOW! Or else I’ll rip your head off, GOT IT?”

“You think you can bully me just because you got big biceps, you big LUG!??” Benjamin protested. “Pick on someone your own size!”

Mitch then pushed Benjamin off and hurled him to the ground. Benjamin fell hard with his back on the ground. Luckily, he landed on a patch of grass, so he wasn’t hurt.

“Uhhhhhhh… You big bully…. I wish I had big biceps so you’d leave me alone…” Benjamin mumbled in a daze.

Right away, the necklace around Benjamin’s neck began to glow again. A second later, Benjamin felt an odd, powerful tingling feeling in his arms. Within seconds, his biceps inflated to the size of bowling balls, becoming big, round and hard, forming large, genuine peaks of muscle the minute Benjamin made a fist and flexed his arms, even if he flexed them just a little bit!

“Whoa! Where did those muscles come from?” Mitch gasped, when he saw Benjamin slowly stand up, sporting two enormous biceps on his arms.

“Oh wow… My arms have gotten bigger!” Benjamin chuckles, as he took turns flexing each one in turn.

“Hey… Uhhmm… Forget about the notes, man….” Mitch said to him.

Clearly, Benjamin’s biceps were bigger than Mitch’s, and Mitch quickly turned around and walked away.

“Wow! What happened? Did that necklace do this to me?” Benjamin wondered, as he flexed his right arm and admired his huge, bulging bicep.
1432.title: Unintentionally activate it

choices: A pile of comic books flood the hallways
14322.content:
As much as he loved his new biceps, Benjamin feared that trouble would arise if anyone saw them. The necklace changes them back to normal and he walked off, pleased with his new-found powers. Entering the local high school and walking around the hallways, he heard someone call for him.

"Hey Ben, wait up!"

As the voice turned out very feminine, he knew who was coming along to greet him. He sticks the necklace in his point as a girl with narrow blue-framed glasses, light-blue eyes and long blonde hair wrapped in a ponytail quickly runs to him. She was a renowned part of the cheerleading squad in school (which Jill leads) and secretly an avid book reader.

"Oh, Emily...what's up?" Benjamin said, turning out to face her.

"Huff huff..." she panted, holding out a book "Thanks for letting me borrow "Nightmare Scenario"...it was a pretty terrifying yet entertaining read!"

"Sure..." Benjamin smiled, taking back the book. "Have you found anything else to read yet?"

"Well, not really...I'm thinking of reading some comic books soon..."

"I see..." At that point, the necklace started glowing again...

Just then...
14322.title: Benjamin runs into other friends at school

143221.content:
And with that remark being let out, the necklace reacts with a soft glow. Benjamin couldn't realize this with the piece of jewelry shoved deep down inside his pocket.

An air vent above the two immediately pops open as a pile of comic books are pushed down upon the duo.

"Whoa! What the heck is this?" Emily gasps, covered inside the huge pile. "There's comic books everywhere..."

"Yeah, I know..." Benjamin said, then thinks "How did that happen? I didn't wish for anything...and Emily didn't either..."

"W-wait, I get it now..." Emily then said "I have magic powers! It must be true!"

"Err yeah, I suppose you do..." Benjamin said, just going along with her blind enthusiasm.

"In that case, I wish..."
143221.title: A pile of comic books flood the hallways

choices: Continue to beat up on Superman
1432212.content:
Emily looked at the comic books lying around and noticed a Superman comic. She thought, “What if I were Supergirl, but with Superman’s muscles? Or better yet, what if Superman were here and I grew stronger than him as my muscles grew bigger and bigger?” So as she looked at Ben, she giggled out her silly wish.

“I wish Superman were here to see me transform into Super Mega Emily so I could put him to shame!”

Benjamin’s eyes widened with surprise, but as soon as she finished her statement, the ceiling rumbled and Superman tore through the roof and landed with an earth shaking thud next to both of them.

“So what’s this I hear about some teen age girl thinking she’s stronger than me? I’m tired of every so called super strong person challenging me. Time to put this worthless girl down quickly.”

He turned to see Emily go from wide eyed to confident as she now felt the power to lift mountains surge into her lithe body. Playing it cool, Emily eyed Superman up and down. At 6 foot 4, he’s got enough muscle to win a bodybuilding championship. His broad chest sports that legendary S and his arms are very well muscled.

“Well before you show me whose boss, how about you flex up your big muscles to demonstrate what a superman you really are.”

Superman grumbled. “Great, tricked here by a stupid cheerleader. What’s with the glasses anyway? You’ll never make head cheerleader with glasses. But since you asked, I’ll be glad to show you some real man muscle before I crush whatever spirit you think you have.”

Superman moved closer to the 5 foot 4 inch Emily and leaning down slightly, he flexed up a 22 inch ball of Superman muscle, stretching his uniform tight around the manly mound of might! Emily took her glasses off and pulled off the band holding her pony tail, allowing her long blonde hair to flow around her shoulders. She handed both of them to Brad and gave him a wink. Brad gulped with both surprise and desire.

Turning back toward Superman, Emily reached out with her hands and caressed the muscle like any cheerleader would a football player. But Emily was no longer just another cheerleader. Pulling her hands away, she smiled into Superman’s confident eyes.

“Not bad. Not bad. But let’s see what this worthless girl can do. Hold that pose and let me see what I can flex up.”

Emily pushed her right arm out and slowly brought her forearm up, tensing her fist. The short, thin, but firm arm began to rumble as comet crushing strength, power and size began to roar into her waiting muscles. Half way into her flex Emily’s bicep was the size of a grapefruit and rising like a ball of dough with too much yeast.

“You see, Superman, my muscles are filled with mega girl power, not puny Kryptonion power. And you’re soon going to find out which power is greater.”

Superman’s eyes widened as he watched Emily’s bicep rise upward next to his. And as her forearm reached vertical and moved toward her shoulder, her bicep had blown up to the size of a cantaloupe at nearly 20 inches around of rippling, vein engorged might. With a tight squeeze to her fist, Emily then popped her bicep up bigger, harder and tougher, matching the size of the now sweating Man of Steel. Chuckling at both her building power and Superman’s expression, Emily licked her lips and purred.

“My Mega Girl Power has given me the strength and muscle to match the bicep size of the mighty Superman with just one flex. But sorry to say, Superman, I really haven’t flexed all that hard yet. Want to see me flex harder Superman? Want to see what this stupid cheerleader can do?”

Superman cleared his throat, worried about what this girl was truly capable of. He also noticed that rips and tears were occurring on the rest of her clothes as it wasn’t just her biceps adding mounds of pumped up muscle, but the rest of her body as well. Her athletic legs were now bulging out as big as his too, and her calves were actually bigger! Her skirt hid some of her legs, but a quick glance with his x-ray vision indicated that those thighs were thick, strongly muscled but still curved with feminine lines. Her crop top sweater was pulled up higher as threads were being popped against her enlarged chest and back, exposing her rock hard defined, yet still narrow 8 pack abs. Emily giggled.

“Sure you do! You want to see what all the fuss was about. Well hold onto to your cape, because I’ll show you what a REAL bicep flex looks like, so called Superman!”

Emily pulled her forearm back slightly as another, louder and harder rumble of power emanated from her bicep as the power to lift planets exploded into her muscles. Giggling at the feeling of nearly overwhelming power coursing through her body, Emily tensed her fist, pulled her forearm forward and flexed down hard with an earth shaking boom that sent her bicep blasting upward at an alarming rate! Muscle built upon muscle as her bicep expanded to 28 inches around in moments and continued to grow rapidly. Superman was really sweating now as he watched this young cheerleader’s bicep expand to over 30 inches around as her arm added an inch of muscle ever second with micro booms indicating the ever growing strength accompanying her increase in muscle size. Emily smiled knowingly as her eyes began to glow brighter with her power continued to ramp upward. Her bicep was now totally eclipsing Superman’s once proud bicep, expanding beyond 36 incredible inches around. And worse yet for Superman, Emily’s bicep was not only much larger, but it was harder, stronger and better defined! Emily smiled at the worried look on Superman’s face.

“Oooops! It looks like my bicep is now bigger than yours Superman. But guess what. I’m not done yet!”

Emily flexed her mighty arm a few more times with a louder boom accompanying each flex, shaking the walls of the school with earthquake force. Seconds later, her mountainous bicep had expanded to 44 world record breaking inches around.”

“Hmmmm, it looks this puny girl has flexed a bicep that is MUCH bigger than yours, Superboy!”

A few more earth shaking flexes sent her incredible, star smashing bicep peak up over her fist as her bowling ball bicep ground up to 50 impossible inches of pure fem super muscle!

“In fact, it’s now over TWICE your size, you pathetic little man!”

Horrible rips soon indicated that all of Emily’s muscles had pounded bigger, outclassing Superman in every department and any male bodybuilder on earth too! Her sweater now hung on her massive shoulders like rags and her skirt was pushed out against raging thighs of doom. And showcased below the ruined sweater was a pink spandex bikini top with the word Super on her left breast and Mega on her right. And tattooed in the center of her massive, bulging super hard pectorals was a picture of Superman’s shield with an E in the center. And what a chest! Massive, basketball sized pecs of pure power rocked up and down, bristling with might and flexing up with titanic power. Striations ripped up across her mighty pecs as she giggled with delight.

“And now it seems that ALL of my muscles are much bigger than yours Superman. But we need to find out something else. Reach out and squeeze my girl bicep, Superman. She how hard it is. How defined it is. How ripped it is. See if you can make a dent in my mighty muscle Superman. See if you have what it takes to be called Super.”

Superman growled, tired or taking Emily’s taunts.

“I don’t know how you’ve flexed up muscles so big, but I’m still Superman and you’re just a puny cheerleader. I’m going to crush your muscles to paste!”

Emily held her gigantic bicep flex and her smile as Superman scowled.

“Well go ahead and try. Do I need to ask you twice?”

Superman grunted and reaching out with both hands, slapped them on Emily’s mountain of muscle and squeezed down with all of his might. His grunting grew louder and his knuckles turned white, but he was unable to make the slightest indentation in Emily’s beyond super hard muscle. Emily chuckled.

“What’s the matter, Super Wimp? Can’t you even make a tiny dent in my mega girl muscles? I thought you were going to crush my muscles to paste?”

Superman pulled his hands off, took a step back and growled.

“I still don’t know what kind of trick you’re playing, but I’ve had enough of your lip!”

Pulling his right arm up into a fist, Superman pulled his arm back and putting everything he had into it, sending his fist at Emily’s head, looking to knock her into next week. But Emily reached out with blinding speed and grabbed his wrist before his could connect, shocking the Man of Steel.

“Now that wasn’t very nice. Trying to hit a girl and all. I guess it’s now time to show you who the strongest one is.”

Emily pulled her arm up high and rotating her shoulder, pulled Superman up and over her head and with a hard downward motion, she slammed Superman six inches into the ground. WHAM!

Superman let out a surprised yelp and blinked his eyes as he looked up into the beautiful face of this teen-age supergirl.

“And don’t think I’m done. You’ve got quite a lesson coming.”

Emily pulled him back up and over her head, slamming him into the ground on her other side. WHAM! She barely paused as she pulled him back over her head again with another earth shaking thud. WHAM! Emily continued to slam Superman into the ground, deeper and deeper with each blow. WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! With Superman stunned to near unconsciousness, Emily pulled him around her and began spinning Superman over her head until he was nothing but a red and blue blur. Looking at Brad, Emily smirked and winked at him.

“Round and round he goes, where he stops, nobody knows!”

Emily pushed up, letting go of Superman and he smashed through the ceiling and shot high into the air. Emily looked over at Brad.

“So Brad, that was fun. What do you think? Should I bring Superman back here and continue to humiliate him with my girl power, or would you like to see me challenge some other comic book heroes?”

Brad gulped, taken back by given the choice. He cleared his throat. Well, why don’t you…..
1432212.title: "For something inexplicably random!"

"So why haven't you returned my calls?" Emily asked. "I've asked you out on a date for a while..."

"Wha...? You asked me out?" Benjamin asked, somewhat astonished "I'm always so busy reading, I never noticed..."

"Ben, you're always in your books" Emily sighed miserably "We both enjoy reading, but don't you think it's time for pursue other opportunities?"

"No..." Benjamin bluntly said. "I thought we were just good friends...besides, there are other guys that are cooler and hotter than me..."

"..You jerk!" Emily groaned, pushing Benjamin down to the floor and immediately storming off afterwards.

"Ow! Emily, wait! Come on!" Benjamin exclaimed, recovering from the situation. "Whatever...girls are so weird..."

Ben simply shrugs it off and continues on with his business. He wasn't too worried about his relationship with Emily especially since he had found a new "friend". He then takes the necklace out of his pocket and cracks a smile.

"It's not fair...I love him!" Emily sobs. "Why can't he return my love?! I...I just wish he could!"

Just then...
143222.title: They talk a lot more.

With the necklace's unpredictable capabilities, Benjamin feels a jolt flowing through his head. When he regained consciousness, he made a slightly sinister smirk on his face. Anyway, things went smoothly as time progressed on until dismissal. Coming out alongside other students was Emily, who still remained emotionally hurt. At this point, she was about to let her troubles go and remain good friends with Benjamin, never again to propose the concept of romance. That was until now...

"Oh, Ben..." she calmly said "I-I apologize for the way I acted earlier...I hope you forgive me and we can still be good fri-"

She stops abruptly as Benjamin grabs her hands.

"Ben...?" she asks, in a confused manner.

Suddenly, he seizes Emily off the ground and holds her over his arms.

"W-whoa!" she gasps "Why are you acting like this all of a sudden??"

"I've thought about what you said and you're right" he explains. "Let's both 'pursue other opportunities'."

"Really?! Oh, Ben, I'm so happy..." she smiled, giving Ben a kiss on the cheek.

"Shall we head out?" Benjamin asked.

So the newly established couple headed out into the city...who knew what adventures awaited them?

Sylvia, a mysterious woman cloaked in all black, was walking by the fateful dumpster. Looking in the dumpster, she seemed amused that another necklace had called to her.

She was already wearing one. She had one bonded to her a year earlier.

She was once innocent and happy, but then she found "the" necklace. Wearing it was fun, every day was an adventure. Then one day, she found out the necklace had a mind of it's own. A cruel, depraved, twisted mind. She once wished everyone would leave her alone and forget about bothering her, and everyone did. The only problem was everyone forgot about her. No one ever came near her.

She attempted to remove the necklace, but it was no good. She had used it enough that it had fused with her, forever becoming part of her. Though she could wish everything back to normal, she did not. Instead, she took advantage of this opportunity and allowed her and the necklace to become one, almost symbiotic. She was technically in control, just that her emotions and urges were amplified by the necklace along with practical omnipotence. By then, she had fallen over the edge of sanity by then, straight into insanity. Her nature had changed, now wanting the necklace wanted, but because she did.

She wanted chaos for nothing more than to amuse her. She would take revenge on those who had forgotten her story, in favour of a similar one. She decided to:

(Descriptions by Doctor Devi)

James and Linda -

James is a hard-working, earnest man who is extremely caring for his family. He works as a video game designer and is rarely seen at home due to increased labor.

Linda is something of a more overworked wife. She lacks the willpower her husband has but makes for it with hidden talent in drawing and composing music. Sadly, she is reluctant to put these skills to good use and is therefore negectful to advance her business career. She also has a mysterious family tree...

choices: James becomes a video game character
14512.content:
As he walked home from a hard day at work, James grabbed the necklace off the ground and started to stare deeply at it. Almost immediately, he begins to form some very nostalgic memories in his mind.

Back in the mid-1980s, the video game industry prospered and proved to be a lucrative market once more thanks to the successes of Nintendo. James, a then young twenty-something, was a reviewer, whose job was to play and review video games, providing informative insight and criticism. This was done in the comfort of his own home, where he spent time with wife Linda and newborn son Steven. As cool as it seemed, it was a challenge completing the toughest of games for him.

"Come on, come on!" young James yelled, as playing a platform game only to have died "Argh! What a load of f-!"

"There he goes again..." Linda sighed, covering up baby Steven's ears.

The Necklace's Beginning -

This story takes place a year before the original Necklace's Curse. Basically, a pretty 16 year old and amnesiac named Sylvia finds a necklace in a dumpster (sound familiar?). Sylvia doesn't remember her past, but it was heavily tied to this necklace...and she will wear the necklace, as she feels compelled to for some reason. And random things will happen as she embarks on a journey to discover her past and the necklace's past (both of which you can make as random as you want).


With the necklace on, her every random thought becomes true and chaos ensues. Anything can happen and will happen. Just like the first one.

However, this isn't the first one. This is the prequel. So, in this one, none of the events of The Necklace's Curse and it's questionable canon have happened yet.


Sylvia can meet characters from the first one (in fact a character list is below), but they don't know of the necklace or events from the first one (unless the necklace informs them or something like that). Also, they can get the necklace as well, but please remember to keep focused on Sylvia.

I say that, because this story is based around her using the necklace as she discovers the twisted and crazy pasts you make up for her and the necklace. Also, this may or may not explain her behaviour in the normal story...


The Necklace's Beginning Character List:

Sylvia - A pretty 16 year old who happens to go to the same school as Steven, Benjamin and Jill from the first one. Technically, they'd be 16 as well in this one and in the same school. And she's an amnesiac with little knowledge of her past.

Oliver - An annoying 11 year old who happens to be both a prankster and Sylvia's foster brother. And he's a jerk.

Mom and Dad - Sylvia's foster parents. Sylvia doesn't know her real parents (though you can make them up in the story for her). They're usually really kind, but maybe that's all an act...

Other characters from The Necklace's Curse (a year younger due to this story taking place a year earlier):

Steven - 16 year old high school student. Has a stash of comic books. He's a fan, I suppose. Also, he's in love with Jill (though she doesn't care much about him).

Rachel - 11 year old sister of Steven. Loves anime and video games.

Steven's Mom and Dad seem to never be around (doesn't mean you can't bring them in).

Benjamin - 15 year old best friend of Steven. Loves TV and books. Didn't appear much in original, feel free to use him.

Jill - 16 year old cheerleader, ambitious, wants to be head cheerleader (in The Necklace's Curse, she is). Popular, pretty and probably evil.

Samantha - A little girl who likes animals.

Robert - A school jock, wants to be strong(er) and fast(er) and has a girlfriend named Betty in The Necklace's Curse. Betty's status currently is unknown, feel free to do what you want.

April - A beautiful con artist, who became a student at Steven's school at some points in The Necklace's Curse.

Jacob - A video game lover and school geek.

And that's...most of them, anyways.

(Feel free to add anyone from the original not here, but remember, they don't know about the necklace...yet. You could make them learn about the necklace and even use it. Somehow, things revert back to normal and they forget until next year in The Necklace's Curse. You can even explain this weird event if you want.)


The World Of Necklaces -

Similar to the normal story, except EVERYONE has a necklace. Everyone in the world.


College of Craziness -

Again, it's similar to the normal story, except all the underage and teenage characters have been survived the events of the "main story". They're now college age students and in college, but the necklace shows up again...and makes them all the same age (20).

NOTE: In this story, go crazy. As long as there is no underage stuff, do what you want. Due to the nature of this, there may be more "mature content" so you've been warned.
