151232.content:
(Original chapter by scriptboy)

Sylvia walked into math class and sat down. The teacher started the lecture, and she got her notebook and pencil out. She hated math, and she always felt like this class was difficult and boring.

After thirty minutes had passed, the teacher allowed for the students to get into small groups in order to work on a problem. Jacob, a geeky boy with glasses and short, black hair, pulled his desk facing Sylvia's and he said hi to her.

"Hi, Sylvia! Would you like me to help you out with the math problem?" Jake said to her.

"Yeah... I don't understand any of this line equation mumbo-jumbo..." she sighed. "it's all Greek to me..."

"It's not so hard! Here, look over here, at my notebook. The teacher didn't explain it right. Let me show it to you in such a way, you'll never forget it..." the boy explained cheerfully.

Using his pencil and a notepad with grid-paper, Jake patiently explained the concept to her, along with examples. He answered all her questions, and then he asked her some questions, just to see if she understood everything.

"Oh! That makes sense!" Sylvia replied. "Thanks!"

"My pleasure... I'm really good at math..." Jake replied shyly.

"You're such a geek... You look like it too... With those big glasses.... I bet you look great without them..." Sylvia whispered.

Jake removed the glasses, but then he squinted his eyes.

"Uhhh... I'm as blind as a bat...."

"What a shame! You're so cute! I wish you had 20/20 vision, Jake...." Sylvia said to him.

Suddenly, her necklace tingled. Jake felt a warm feeling in his eyes. Immediately, his vision was corrected, and he was able to see clearly without his glasses!

"Whoa!!" he gasped out loud. "I can see!"

"Of course you can, silly!"

"No! I mean... I can see without my glasses!" Jake said excitedly.

Then Jake put his glasses on, and everything was blurry. he immediately took them off again.

"You're so cute... and so smart... " Sylvia laughed. "It's so nice of you to help me with my math problem...."

"Yeah, but... That's all I got to offer... Just brains... Nothing more... I'm just a geek... Not a jock... " Jake said sadly.

"No need to be huge, Jake... A nice guy like you? You just need a nice chest and nice guns..." Sylvia giggled.

Immediately Jake felt a tingling sensation in his muscles...

15123221111.content:
Looking at his own body, he felt comfortable. He was big, but not too big. The question was, just what could he do to others? He hadn’t tried yet, but with so many people to choose from he figured he could experiment quite a lot. His mind wandered a bit as he caught site of his friend Sue. She was a year younger at 15, but was smart enough to be in some of his classes. At only 5 foot 2, she was quite geeky with mousy brown shoulder length hair and Wal-Mart clothes. The jeans and pink sweatshirt both looked too big. She was wandering the mall on her own and was currently looking at a display in the Video Game store. The DC Universe game was on display and as Jake neared he glanced at the display he thought about what it be like if they were in such a universe, or better yet, what if Sue were as powerful as all that.

As he approached her his mind started to picture Sue growing stronger and more powerful with big, bulging, earth shaking muscles. The necklace began to glow in anticipation as Jake moved up next to Sue.

“Hi Sue, what’s going on?”

Sue looked up at Jake and smiled. “Oh nothing, just checking out the latest games. Do you have the DC Universe game?”

Jake shook his head but returned her smile. “Ever think about being a superhero?”

Sue blushed and giggled. “Me? Well sure I guess. Why?”

Jake licked his lips. “Well today is your lucky day. I have the power to grant those wishes, or at least I think I do. Want to find out?”

Sue looked around to see if Jake were playing some kind of trick. Seemingly ensured that it was just the two of them paying attention, Sue nodded her head. Jake tried to remain calm as he pictured Sue growing muscles and gaining strength. And as he did he watched Sue’s face light up as she now sensed the power build within her.

Sue’s clothes began to shift as her once out of shape body began to tighten with feminine curves, the fat melted away and the muscles began to grow larger. Sue moaned with pleasure at the experience and grunted softly as the pace picked up. The muscles surged through Jake’s will and those once oversized clothes began to strain as her legs now pushed out with muscles to compete with the best sprinters in school and her upper body filled with more and more muscle across her back, shoulders, arms and chest. Sue’s once flat chest surged forward as Jake thought about not just female superheroes, but male one’s as well, giving Sue mounting mounds of pectorals that quickly surpassed any boy in school, any man in town and on to those only drawn in comics. The threads soon began ripping across both her jeans and her sweater as throbbing, super strong muscles continued to expand across her once frail frame.

Sue smiled knowingly as she felt her muscles grow harder and stronger as they pressed bigger. Her thighs and calves burst through the thick denim, reducing the once oversized jeans to rags hanging along her narrow waist. Those growing leg muscles danced and surged as more of her skin was exposed, causing Jake to gasp at the size and definition. Her sweater was splitting in several areas and now pulled taught against her thickening shelf of pectorals, exposing her narrow, muscled up abs of steel. Snickering, Sue reached down and tore off her jeans with ridiculous ease, exposing every inch of her mega muscled legs, leaving her in just her pink panties that seemed to be shrinking as her legs and glutes flexed into mounds of muscle. By reaching down the once oversized sweater tore in several more places and quickly became more rags across her massive chest. Sue smiled and brought her arms up and with a quick flex disintegrated the sleeves as twin balls of muscle the size of soccer balls exploded across her arms! Jake’s imagination had been going wild as movies of mushroom clouds were tattooed on her biceps, and the sound and fury of twin explosions rumbled from her muscles! Untold, uncompromising strength consolidated in those same girl muscles, sending out a shock wave that shattered the windows of the nearby stores and caused Sue’s hair to flitter and the rest of her sweater to sizzle off her 5 foot 2 inch teen-age girl body.

As Jake gasped, Sue’s entire body glowed with might as her biceps pressed upward, doubling in strength with every inch of new muscle.

Sue was staring at Jake, having tapped into his thoughts and driving her power upward. Jake had thought about Sue becoming the strongest girl in the world with muscles to put any man to shame, but Sue was now exceeding those thoughts, becoming as strong as 10 men, 100 men, a thousand men, stronger! Her biceps were now 36 inches around, gobs bigger than any man had ever flexed and still growing in strength and power! Her naked, palpitating chest was a massive, striated muscular mound of angular, super strong fright bigger than two basketballs with the strength to bench press a battle ship! Arcs of power danced between her nipples as Sue flexed those massive pectorals larger, pushing her chest out over two feet in front of her! As the shock wave of power subsided and Jake finally blinked, Sue’s expansion stopped and the glow of power dimmed.

Sue released her flex and stood there for a moment, breathing heavily as everyone nearby stared on in disbelief.

“My goodness Jake, what did you do to me? I’m more muscular than any man alive, hell, most comic book heroes would look puny next to me! Just how strong am I?”

Jake swallowed. “I’m uh, not sure.”

Sue pushed out her hip and smiled. “Well do you want to find out, or would you rather use your powers on my little sister?”

Jake nodded absently and Sue chuckled and looked at the DCU poster. “Well I know one person who we could test my new strength on. But if you want to wait a moment and help me out, my younger sister has bully problems. She’s only 10 and is over at the toy store.”

Jake gulped, enjoying Sue’s bulging muscles, but also wishing to help her out. “Well, why don’t we…”
15123221111.title: When Jake sees his friends, his muscles, and th...

choices: Make some of my friends big and muscular too
Give me even bigger muscles and super strength
151232211112.content:
“We could help out your little sister, but first let me get you an outfit and fix the windows.” With a thought, the necklace glowed and Sue had on a pink spandex tank top that barely covered the bottom of her super thick chest. The damage she had caused was also repaired.

Sue smiled, walked over to Jake and reaching around his comparably slender upper body, gave him a hug, pulled him up until his feet were off the floor. Jake blushed and grunted from the pressure, enjoying the feeling of her rock hard chest against his chest. Sue whispered in his ear before she let him go.

“Thanks for making me so strong. This could be fun!”

Sue giggled as Jake tried to compose himself and as people still stared with awe. Jake and Sue then walked toward the toy store. They soon found Sue’s sister Mindy outside the Toy store sitting on a bench looking sad.

Mindy looked up when she saw Sue and her eyes widened. “Sue! What happened to you?”

Sue smiled and explained what Jake could do. Mindy’s mood changed immediately. “Could you make me strong too? Those bullies are so mean. They kicked me out of the toy store.”

Jake smiled, happy to help out another girl. “Sure thing, what did you have in mind?”

“I want to big muscles too! Big, strong muscles to protect me and everyone at school from bullies!”

Jake looked at Mindy. The small, 4 foot 7 inch girl had long blonde hair and sparkling blue eyes. She was thin and was wearing a yellow tank top and blue shorts and yellow flip flops. But she wouldn’t have a thin body for long. With a thought, muscles started popping all over Mindy’s body. Her legs, abs and upper body soon looked like she were a top level gymnast with thick thighs and calves, a wicked eight pack set of abs, a wide muscular back, thick meaty pecs, and strong shoulders and arms. But even these impressive muscles didn’t represent the strength Jake had given her, which was now as great as two strong men!

Mindy tittered with excitement, flexing up a strong bicep the size of pool ball that was nearly as hard. “Wow! Thanks Jake! I’m sure to be able to take care of those boys now!”

Mindy rushed up to Jake and nearly knocked him over as she gave him a waist level high hug that pushed the air out of him. He reached down with his arms and returned the hug lightly on her back, trying not to show that she was hurting him a bit. Fortunately she released the hug and turned back to the store front just in time to see two of the boys that had bullied her come out. They were older boys and looked pretty tough. But now that Jake had amped Mindy up, she no longer felt afraid and was ready to take them on. Walking up to the boys she sneered.

“You two boys are going to stop bullying me from now on!”

The boys looked at each other and laughed. Both boys walked closer as one looked down at her, not paying attention to her new physique. “Oh yeah? Says who?”

Mindy smiled and reaching out with her small hands, gripped hands full of shirt on the two surprised boys. “Says me!”

Mindy then shocked the two as she pulled her arms up, and the boys with them! Their feet dangled above the ground and Mindy smiled with satisfaction. “In fact, if I catch either of you two bullying anyone again, I’m going to do more than just toss you away like this.”

Mindy then spun around once and tossed the two boys toward the nearby fountain. They skidded along the floor and hit the base of the fountain and slumped against the concrete, shaken up, but not hurt too bad. Mindy smiled and placed her fists on her hips, clearly satisfied with what she was now able to do. But as she stared at the downed boys, the leader of the group, Tom, snuck up behind her and pulling his large up back, he balled his hand into a fist and turned to Mindy’s side. His arm swung quickly toward her exposed abs and he smiled cruelly with anticipation.

Unfortunately for him, Jake saw what was happening and not wanting to see Mindy get hurt, wished for her muscles to be much harder with greater strength to match. This simple thought pushed incredible amounts of power into Mindy and she let out a surprised yelp just as Tom connected with her abs. Unfortunately for him, Mindy’s abs were much harder than anything he could hope to penetrate and his fist connected with a snap and bounced off her mid-section. Tom let out his yelp as he broke two fingers and his wrist. Mindy shook her head from both the feeling of new power coursing her body and the fact that Tom had hit her hard in the stomach and she barely felt it. She then smiled as Tom held his broken hand and winced with pain.

“So Tom, that wasn’t very nice sneaking up on a girl. You’re going to have to be taught a lesson.” She looked at his hand and chuckled. “Well a second lesson besides that fact that you now know that I’ve got abs of steel!”

As Tom’s eyes widened with surprise and fear, Mindy reached out to his good arm and gripping his forearm pulled him toward her, down to the ground and with a yank, up into the air and with amped up strength that came with her hardened muscles, began to spin Tom around above her head. Mindy smiled as Tom’s form became a blur above her and his yelling became louder. She looked over toward the fountain just as the two other boys were making it to their feet and with perfect aim, released Tom and he sailed toward the two boys, knocking all three into the fountain with loud splashes.

Mindy jumped up and down with excitement. “Bulls eye!”

She turned toward Tom and smiled, flexing her arms up into twin baseball sized biceps that glistened with the strength of ten men!

“This is so cool!”

Releasing her flex she cocked her head to the side. “But you know what? Maybe you could…”

"Oh rats..." Sylvia groans, now having another thought in her head "I left my workbooks at home!"

She places the necklace around her neck and rushes back. The strange piece of jewelry emits a faint glow of light but it doesn't catch Sylvia's attention as she goes back inside her foster home.

"Where did they go?" she said, digging through her room full of junk.

The necklace reacts and zaps the workbooks right within her immediate view. Sylvia gasps and falls to the floor in awe. Could this truly be the necklace that had been floating about in her dreams?

Unfortunately, she had no one to tell this news to. She had no friends and her foster family was currently out of the house.

"Let's see what else it does..." she says.

What does she have the necklace materialize?

Appearing magically out of nowhere was a huge harem of attractive men and boys. Many of them were from various anime/manga, video games, TV shows and comics, some were even real-life celebrities. Sylvia's eyes gleamed and she felt her heart beating as she drooled with great pleasure. She felt the manly abs and strong muscles of many of them and started at the pretty but radically feminine faces of others.

"I think I found myself a new plaything..." Sylvia smiles as she looked over the necklace.

So time passed as Sylvia had been resting in bed alongside her group of sexy male servants. She had forgotten all about school because of her newfound interest in the magic necklace.

What happens next?

151312.content:
Oliver walked in the room, seeing Sylvia and her harem of boys. "What the hell is happening here?" Oliver wondered aloud. Sylvia looked at Oliver and said, "What are you doing here?"

"I was going for a walk, and passed by your room, hearing all kinds of weird noises. I wondered what you were doing in here, and somehow you have a ton of boys, that are all crushing on you. I'll repeat again, what the hell is happening here?" Oliver asked.

"Oh, I found this necklace that allows me to do pretty much anything I want" Sylvia responded with a hint of cruelty.

"Seriously?"

"Of course. Would I lie to you? Would I ever do anything to you?"

"I think you would. So give me the necklace!"

Oliver jumped at Sylvia, in an attempt to grab the necklace. However, Oliver was blocked by Sylvia's harem.

"Poor Oliver...not quite a match for all my men, huh? To make matters worse, your behaviour is so poor...and you've treated me badly for too long. All those pranks. Maybe I should play a prank on you. But what to do? Maybe I could make you think you're me and I'm you, for all the times you've insulted me. Or maybe I could..."

Sylvia then thought she was being too cruel. This was due to the necklace corrupting her. Maybe she should just wish for her foster brother to be kind to her. However, the necklace wanted to play a prank of its own and:
151312.title: Oliver comes in

(Original Chapter by Doctor Devi)

"Wow..." Sylvia gasps as a portal is formed from the necklace's magical energy "I wonder what's inside..."

Sylvia is about to walk inside but she decides to quickly back out instead.

"I dunno..." she sighs "What's even in there? Is it somewhere scary? What should I do? Why do I keep talking to myself?"

She kept pondering about this but the necklace, somewhat having a mind of its own, was losing its patience with her. It creates a strong force that pushes Sylvia inside the portal.

"Ahhh!!!!" Sylvia screams as she fell down into an endless void "How long am I going to keep falling...?!"

Just then, she sees that the necklace has reappeared on her wrist. "Get me out of this, you stupid thing!" she yells. However, it doesn't respond.

"Great...now wh-Ugh!" she starts, but is interrupted as her head is planted face-first into the ground. She had finally landed from her fall but where?
15132.title: A portal to another world

1513221.content:
(Original chapter by Doctor Devi)

"Are you okay, miss?" Sylvia hears a masculine voice speak above.

"Ugh..." she grumbles for a few moments until she feels her own legs being pulled up. "W-what's going on-Aaah!"

Sylvia is briskly pulled back up to the surface and falls on top of something...or rather someone. She was still recovering from her fall and she needed time to collect her thoughts properly.

"Ew, I'm so dirty..." she groans, rubbing the soft dirt that was smeared all over her face.

"Yeah, you were stuck like that for a while until I rescued you."

Sylvia turns around to see that she was sitting on a boy. Both of their faces flush at the awkwardness of their positions.

"Oh, I'm so sorry..." she gasps, jumping off of him.

"No need to apologize" he smiled.

"Well, thank you for helping me" Sylvia responds, trying hard to crack a smile.

He was a young man who appeared to be around the same age as she was, maybe a little older. His warm, relaxing smile brought some relief for Sylvia but even still one question remained...

"Where the hell am I?"
1513221.title: Feudal Era

Steven figured that extreme pleasures had to be a good thing. And he wasn't selfish, so he wanted them for everyone he knew.

The effect was instant. He felt an agonising pleasure, more than anything he'd ever felt before. It was as if he'd been engaged in foreplay for hours with the sexiest woman imaginable, and yet he hadn't climaxed -- no release, no chance to relax. He wanted to laugh, he wanted to scream, he wanted to moan with ecstasy.

For a moment still able to focus on something beyond his own pleasure, he saw that he wasn't the only one so affected. Rachel was spreadeagled on the floor, alternately crying and screaming out that she was so happy. Benjamin was along the corridor, and fell to his knees, grinning inanely, but gasping as if struggling for breath.

But they weren't alone in the corridor. There were many other college students, who Steven didn't know. Completely unaffected, most hurried on, trying to ignore their ridiculously excited fellow scholars. One kindly girl, a plain girl with short mousy hair and thick-rimmed glasses, came up to Steven in concern. "Are you ok?", she asked.

"So -- so --- happy!" Steven almost screamed at her.

"OK, have you taken anything? Maybe I should get a doctor?" she asked.

The pleasure become overwhelming, and Steven struggled to say another word. He blacked out, his last wish that things would change. But what happened?

info.description:
I know, a LOT of reading. Read it before you start, please. Don't be intimidated, some you don't have to read like the updates. If it's in red, it's updates or contest stuff.



Update - I previously said I would not add anymore. I will now begin adding again, infrequently. I hope others still add :)

Thanks, Dutch91

(What you should read)

RULES:

It's 18+, but there are some rules.

1) DON'T write something like an underage sex orgy, sexual things with kids, etc.

2) NO bashing other authors or something drastically inappropiate.

3) Also, remember the focus of the story is basically random events. So, be as crazy as you want. Preferrably do not do the same type of thing over and over. Growth, age regression, whatever is fine, but if you add multiple chapters, please add all kinds of random chapters not just the same thing over and over.

4) Sex is allowed, just don't be too descriptive (as in, don't dedicate a whole chapter to description of it...at least have crazy choices that affect the whole story or something). (Except when noted otherwise)

NOTE: In "College Craziness" (See Option 5 on the main page, follow to Option 3), you can be as descriptive as you want.

5) Please refrain from lots of swearing and usage of the word f*** or anything overly offensive (just use discretion, if not, I may lightly edit).

Okay, with those out of the way, below is stuff about the story.


First off, the story may get kind of crazy so you have been warned.

In this story, you start off as a 17 year old student named Steven. You find a necklace in a dumpster and try it on. When you put it on, you find that you can change anyone and anything. Fun, right? Well, maybe not.

Because anything you even remotely think about happens. Let's say you're watching a cartoon. Then you think about a character from it. The character becomes REAL. Anything can change or become real. Anything.

Also, to top that off, if someone else gets the necklace...then they become the one changing everything. And if the necklace is broken, the world stays crazy (until it's fixed, if you want).

Plus, the more the necklace is used, the more it uses itself. In other words, things will go crazy by themselves as time goes on (the changes will still be based off the character wearing it, but they can't control them if they are wearing the necklace).

Due to the craziness the necklace makes, some characters may be scared to use it, since it may change things in ways they don't want. For example, if someone uses the necklace to save a puppy...but somewhere in their mind they're thinking of snakes, you could make it rain snakes. Or have the puppy become a snake. You can screw over the characters as much as you want.

Also, deaths/end of story chapters are allowed (ANYTHING is allowed) but, if the person with the necklace dies or loses it, just continue the story from whoever now has the necklace (or in some cases, it may be more interesting to continue the story from points of view of those trying to avoid things that happened because of the necklace...or something along those lines). Of course, if something so horrible happens that the story will end, then please leave at least one choice that can continue the story.

Basically, if you write in this, be as crazy as you want to be. If you want to make your favourite anime become part of the real world, go ahead. If you want your favourite comic book supervillain to go on a rampage, do it. Whatever fiction you can think of, you can incorporate. Also, feel free to allow whoever is wearing the necklace to change anything and anyone, including themselves (transformation fun!). And if you want, give the necklace to a fictional character...see what fun you can have there.

If you use fictional characters that you think not everyone may know, leave BRIEF descriptions of them in the chapter you first have them in. That way, people who don't know much about the character can still write about them. When I say brief, you can incorporate some need-to-know details into your writing. Just don't copy and paste wikipedia or something. (On the other hand, if you want to write about a character you don't know much about, just pull up wikipedia first. Sure, they aren't the most reliable source, but anything goes here, right? Or just find out about these characters in a different way, I'm only suggesting wikipedia)

Here is a list of the initial characters (remember, the cast can and will change vastly):

Steven is a 17 year old high school student. He has a stash of comics from when he was a kid (and maybe still likes them).

Rachel is a 12 year old, and Steven's little sister who highly enjoys anime and video games.

Steven's mom and dad never seem to be around, but feel free to include them (even in changed capacity...)

Jill is the 17 year old school head cheerleader and Steven really, REALLY likes her.

Benjamin is Steven's 16 year old best friend, though maybe he watches too much TV and reads too many books (even though some people think that is contradictory).

Sylvia is the protagonist from The Necklace's Beginning, the prequel. She's now 17. However, it seem in her appearances in these stories...she's different. Something has changed about her...be it good or bad.

Anyways, you can and probably will change the cast. There are no limits in story terms (other than the aforementioned "If the story has to end, leave one option to continue it" and "If someone else gets the necklace, continue from their point of view").

If you have to put something crazy though, go ahead, just think before you write. Check the rules at the top.

Although it is 18+, I don't want anything that could offend many people.

I'll be checking these updates, so if someone goes too far I may either a) edit/delete them or b) mail them or c) both. But I really don't want to, just go nuts but at least have some decency when you do.

All I can say now is go crazy!


(Below are updates, contest winners, etc.)
